S08bsu041_u:69_6: viṣṇumānaya / brahmādyāṃ devānānaya / mā vilamba mā vilamba / jhal jhal maṇḍalamadhye praveśaya /
S08bsu041_u:69_7: samayamanusmara / hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:69_8: eṣa saḥ paramaguhyakādhipate paramaguhyaḥ mahāvīryaḥ mañjuśrīḥ ṣaṇmukho nāma mahākrodharājā sarvavighnavināśakaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:69_10: kiṃ punarduṣṭavighnāḥ / anena paṭhitamātreṇa mahārakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:69_11: mudrā cātra bhavati mahāśūleti vikhyātā sarvavighnavināśikā /
S08bsu041_u:69_14: sarvaśatruṃ nāśaya stambhaya phaṭ phaṭ svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:69_15: anena mantreṇa sarvaśatrūṃ mahāśūlarogeṇa caturthakena vā gṛhṇāpayati /
S08bsu041_u:69_18: atha karuṇācittaṃ labhate / jāpānte muktirna syāt / mṛyata iti ratnatrayāpakariṇāṃ kartavyaṃ nāśeṣaṃ saumyacittānāṃ mudrāṃ mahāśūlaiva prayojanīyā /
S08bsu041_u:69_19: upahṛdayaṃ cātra bhavati / om hrīḥṃ kālarūpa huṃ khaṃ svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:69_23: hūṃ / eṣa sarvakarmakaraḥ / mudrā mahāśūlayaiva prayojanīyā /
S08bsu041_u:69_25: eṣa krodharāja sarvakarmeṣu prayoktavyaḥ maṇḍalamadhye jāpaḥ siddhikāle ca viśiṣyate /
S08bsu041_u:69_27: tadyathā - jayaṃ jaya sujaya mahākāruṇika viśvarūpiṇe gaccha gaccha svabhavanaṃ sarvabuddhāṃśca visarjaya /
S08bsu041_u:69_29: samayamanusmara / sarvārthāśca me siddhyantu mantrapadāḥ manorathaṃ ca me paripūraya svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:69_32: āsanaṃ cānena dāpayet / manasā saptajaptena visarjanaṃ sarvebhyaḥ laukikalokottarebhyo maṇḍalebhyaḥ mantrebhyaścaiva mantrasiddhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:70_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ punarapi taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya taṃ mahāparṣanmaṇḍalaṃ svakaṃ ca vidyāgaṇamantrapaṭalavisaraṃ bhāṣate sma /

S08bsu041_u:92_3: lahu lahu māvilamba sarvakāryāṇi me kuru kuru citrarūpadhāriṇe tiṣṭha tiṣṭha huṃ huṃ sarvabuddhānujñāta svāhā /

S08bsu041_u:97_1: sarvabhūtāni trāsayati, ākarṣayati, vaśamānayati, śoṣayati, ghātayati, yathepsitaṃ vā vidyādharasya tat sarvaṃ sampādayati /

S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.31_1: ya eva vaiṣṇave tantre kathitāḥ kalpavistarāḥ /

S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.32_0: eṣa mantro mayā proktaḥ sattvānāṃ hitakāmyayā /

S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.39_0: yāvanto laukikā mantrāḥ te 'smi kalpa udāhṛtāḥ /

S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.41_0: yathā hi dhātrī bahudhā bālānāṃ lālati yatnataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.42_0: daśabalai kathitaṃ pūrve adhunā ca mayoditam /
S08bsu041_u:105_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta sarvāvantaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanaṃ taṃ ca mahāparṣanmaṇḍalavalokya sarvasamayasañcodanīṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
S08bsu041_u:105_1: yatra samādheḥ pratiṣṭhitasya aśeṣasattvanirhāracaryāmanasaḥ sarvasattvā pratiṣṭhitāḥ bhaveyuḥ,
S08bsu041_u:105_2_2: bodhisattvaiḥ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhiteśvarairapi na śakyate maṇḍalaṃ likhituṃ vā,
S08bsu041_u:105_3: kaḥ punarvādo pṛthagjanabhūtaiḥ sattvai ta divyamāryamaṇḍalasamayanirhāravasthānāvasthitaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvapratyekabuddhāḥ,
S08bsu041_u:105_4_0: sarve āryaśrāvakāḥ, sarve bodhisattvāḥ, daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitāḥ, yauvarājyābhiṣekasamanuprāptā
S08bsu041_u:105_4_1: āryā pratipannāśca sarve sattvā sāśravā anāśravāśca mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasyādhiṣṭhānenācintyaṃ
S08bsu041_u:105_5: na śakyate tat pṛthagjanaiḥ sattvaiḥ samanasāpyālambayitum,
S08bsu041_u:106_1: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ, tā mahāparṣanmaṇḍalasamayamanupraviṣṭaḥ sattvānāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:106_2: śṛṇvantu mārṣāḥ / anatikramaṇīyametat tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca samayaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:106_4: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatimāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:106_5: nirdiṣṭaṃ bho jinaputrātikrāntamānudhyakaṃ samayaṃ mānasodbhavaṃ mānuṣyakaṃ tu vakṣye parinirvṛtānāṃ ca tathāgatānām,
S08bsu041_u:106_6: yatra sattvā samanupraviśya sarvamahālaukikalokottarā siddhiṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S08bsu041_u:107_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇirguhyādhipatiḥ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:107_1: bhāṣa bhāṣa tvaṃ bho jinaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.44_1: buddhatva iva sattvānāṃ tvadīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuvi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.45_0: dṛṣṭimātro hi loko 'smin mantrā siddhiṃ prajagmire /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.46_0: mantrā siddhiṃ na gaccheyuḥ brahmasyāpi mahātmanaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.48_0: mantrāḥ siddhiṃ na gacchanti kiṃ punarbhuvi mānuṣe /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.48_2: paṭhitamātrā hi sidhyante mātrā āryā ca laukikāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:108_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇirguhyādhipatiḥ taṃ mahāsattva madhye bhāṣate sma /
S08bsu041_u:108_1: saṃkṣepataḥ bho bho mahābodhisattva sattvānāmarthāya maṇḍalavidhānaṃ bhāṣasveti /
S08bsu041_u:109_0: evamuktastu guhyakādhipatinā mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya maṇḍalavidhānaṃ bhāṣate sma /
S08bsu041_u:109_1_0: ādau tāvat pratihārakapakṣe caitravaiśākhe ca māse sitapakṣe praśastadivase śuddhagrahanirīkṣite
S08bsu041_u:109_1_1: śubhanakṣatrasaṃyukte śuklapratipadi pūrṇamāsyāṃ vā anye vā kāle prāvṛṇmāsavivarjite
S08bsu041_u:109_1_2: pūrvāhṇe bhūmimadhiṣṭhātavyaṃ mahānagaramāsṛtya yatra vā svayaṃ tiṣṭhenmaṇḍalācāryaḥ
S08bsu041_u:109_2: samudrataṭasamīpaṃ vā mahānagarasya pūrvottare digbhāge nātidūre nātyāsanne maṇḍalācāryeṇa sattvānā saptāhaṃ pakṣamātraṃ vā ekānte uḍayaṃ kṛttvā prativastavyam /
S08bsu041_u:109_3_0: yaḥ tasmin sthāne sucaukṣaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ samantāccaturasraṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ
S08bsu041_u:109_3_4: taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ abhyukṣayeccaturdikṣu ityūrdhvamadhastiryag vidikṣu ca sarvataḥ
S08bsu041_u:109_4: tato taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ samantāccaturasraṃ ṣoḍaśahastaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ vā aṣṭahastaṃ vā,
S08bsu041_u:109_5: tatra ṣoḍaśahastaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ dvādaśahastaṃ kanyasaṃ aṣṭahastam /
S08bsu041_u:109_6: etat trividhaṃ proktaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sarvadarśibhiḥ rājyakāmāya tato jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ sambhogavardhanaṃ kanyasaṃ samayamātraṃ tu sarvakarmakaraṃ śivam /
S08bsu041_u:109_9: tatra pāṣāṇāṅgārabhasmāsthikeśādayo vividhā vā prāṇakajātayaḥ yadi dṛśyante,
S08bsu041_u:109_12: na cet parvatāgranadīpulinasamudrotsaṅgamahānadīpulinasikatādicayaṃ mahatā prayatnataḥ sa pratyavekṣitaṃ sucaukṣa niḥprāṇakaṃ kṛtvā likhet /
S08bsu041_u:109_13: taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ bhūyo niḥprāṇenodakena pañcagavyasanmiśreṇa nadīkūlamṛttikayā medhyayā valmīkamṛttikayā vā yatra prāṇakā na santi,
S08bsu041_u:109_15: pūrayitvā ca svākoṭitaṃ samatalaṃ samantāt trividhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yathepsitaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:109_18: pañcaraṅgikeṇa sūtreṇa saptābhimantritena krodhahṛdayena kṛtvā samantā tanmaṇḍalaṃ caturasrākāreṇa veṣṭayet /
S08bsu041_u:109_19: evaṃ madhyame sthāne evamabhyantare caturasrākāraṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:109_20: madhyasthānasthitena maṇḍalācāryeṇa vidyā aṣṭasahasraṃ mūlamantrā uccārayitavyā mahāmudrā pañcaśikhāṃ badhvā mūṃlamantreṇa sasakhāyarakṣā ātmarakṣā ca kāryā /
S08bsu041_u:109_21: japataśca niṣkasarvahimaṇḍalaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāṅmukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ manasi kurvāṇaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:110_0_1: ekarātroṣitena susakhāyasametena vidhiśāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā pañcaraṅgikena cūrṇena
S08bsu041_u:110_0_2: ślakṣṇojjvalena suparikarmakṛtena ṣaḍkṣarābhimantrite hṛdayenābhimantyaṃ taṃ cūrṇaṃ
S08bsu041_u:110_3: tadyathā - bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā dakṣiṇāṃ diśi vācayet /
S08bsu041_u:110_8: dharmaśravaṇāya tato maṇḍalācāryeṇotthāya candanakarpūrakuṅkumavyāmiśrakeṇa śvetasugandhapuṣpaiḥ mūlamantraṃ japatā sarvatastaṃ maṇḍalamabhikiret /
S08bsu041_u:110_10: saptāhāddhaviṣyāhāroṣitāṃ dvau trayo vā utpāditabodhicittaṃ upoṣadha upavāsocitāṃ citrakarā nipuṇatarāṃ praveśayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_2.51_0: kuta evaṃvidhā bhogā vidhireṣā tu kalpyate /
S08bsu041_u:111_1: mahāmudrāṃ pañcaśikhāṃ badhvā mūlamantraṃ japatā taṃ cūrṇaṃ mudrayet /
S08bsu041_u:111_2: apareṇa tu sādhakācāryeṇa maṇḍalabahirdakṣiṇapūrvāyāṃ diśi vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā agnikuṇḍaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:111_3_0: dvihastapramāṇaṃ hastamātranimnaṃ samantāt padmapuṣkarākāraṃ bahiḥ padmapuṣkarākārā
S08bsu041_u:111_3_2: sādrāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktā mūlamantraṃ ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena vā mudrāmuṣṭiṃ badhvā āhvayet /
S08bsu041_u:111_4: āhūya ca pūrvoktainaiva ekākṣaramūlamantrahṛdayena bhūyo aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:112_0: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa baddhoṣṇīṣakṛtaparikaraḥ ātmanā citrakarāṃśca nipuṇatarānātmanā kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:112_1: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa buddhabodhisattvāṃ manasi kurvatā pūrvoktenaiva dhūpamantreṇa dhūpaṃ daitā añjaliṃ kṛtvā sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ praṇamya,
S08bsu041_u:112_4: etena vidhinā prathamata eva buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ ratnasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanasthaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānamālikhet /
S08bsu041_u:112_5: likhitaśca maṇḍalācāryasyānusādhakena ātmarakṣāvidhānaṃ mūlamantreṇa kṛtvā sarvabhūtikā balirdeyā caturdikṣurdhvamadhaḥ bahirmaṇḍalasya kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:113_0: tato snātvā agnikuṇḍasamīpaṃ gatvā śucivastraprāvṛtena śucinā kṛtā rakṣāvidhānena ghṛtāhutīnāṃ kuṅkumamiśrāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyānmūlamantreṇa /
S08bsu041_u:113_1: tataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena japaṃ kurvataḥ tatraiva sthātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:113_3: anekākāravikṛtarūpaghorasvaravātavarṣadurdinamanyatamānyatamaṃ vā vighnamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā hutena sarṣapāhutayaḥ sapta hotavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:113_4: tato vighnāḥ praṇaśyanti / manuṣyavighnairvā pañcāhutayo hotavyā /
S08bsu041_u:113_5: stambhitā bhavanti aśaktivantaḥ puruṣā mṛyanti vā /
S08bsu041_u:113_9: itare vā vighnā yamāntakakrodhabhayā nirnaṣṭā vidravanti ito ita iti /
S08bsu041_u:114_0: tato 'nusādhakena tatraiva kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena yamāntakakrodharājānaṃ japaṃ kurvāṇa sthātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:114_1: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pratimāyā dakṣiṇe pārśve dvau pratyekabuddhau padmāsanopaviṣṭau paryaṅkenopaviṣṭau kāryau,
S08bsu041_u:114_2: tayoradhastād dvau mahāśrāvakau dharmaṃ śṛṇvantaḥ [Vaidya_28] kāryau /
S08bsu041_u:114_3: teṣāmapi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ śaratkāṇḍagauraḥ padmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:114_5_0: tasyāpi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavatī paṇḍaravāsinī padmahastā dakṣiṇena hastena bhagavantaṃ
S08bsu041_u:114_6: evaṃ tārā, bhrukuṭī svakasvakāsaneryāyathe susthitā kāryā /
S08bsu041_u:114_8: tathāgatalocanā, uṣṇīṣarājā svakāryāḥ / evaṃ bodhisattvāḥ ṣoḍaśa kāryāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:114_10: apāyajaha maitreyaḥ, camaravyagrahastaḥ, buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:114_11: vimalagatiḥ, vimalaketuḥ, sudhana, candraprabha, vimalakīrti, sarvavyādhicikitsakaḥ sarvadharmīśvararājaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:114_12: lokagatiḥ, mahāmatiḥ, patidharaśceti / ete ṣoḍaśa mahābodhisattvāḥ prasannamūrtayaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā lekhyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:114_14: sa ca yathāsmarattaḥ āgamataśca yathāsthāneṣu vā śeṣā lekhyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:114_15: ante ca sthāne caturasrākāraṃ sthānaṃ sthāpaye padmapuṣpasaṃskṛtam /
S08bsu041_u:114_16: yena smaritā vidyā devatā te 'smin sthāne tiṣṭhantviti /
S08bsu041_u:115_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ dvau pratyekabuddhau gandhamādanaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:115_1: upāriṣṭaśceti / evaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sarvataḥ praveśadvāraṃ kāryam /

S08bsu041_u:mmk_7.7_0: paṭaḥ svalpo viśeṣo vā madhyamo parikīrtitaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:232_0: bodhisattvapiṭakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrādāryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt saptamaḥ paṭalavisarāt caturthaḥ paṭavidhānapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:235_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:235_1: ye te mañjuśrīḥ tvayā nirdiṣṭā sattvā teṣāmarthāya idaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ visaramākhyātam /
S08bsu041_u:235_4: taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye /
S08bsu041_u:236_1: sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitā te 'smadvibhāvanodyotanakarīṃ mantracaryāguṇaniṣpattiprabhāvanakarīṃ vārṇām /
S08bsu041_u:237_0: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya smitamakārṣīt /
S08bsu041_u:237_1: atha bhagavataḥ śākyamunirmukhadvārāt nīlapītasphaṭikavarṇādayo raśmayo niścaranti sma /
S08bsu041_u:237_2_0: samanantaraniścaritā ca raśmayo sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ avabhāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S08bsu041_u:237_2_2: candrasūryau mahardhikau mahānubhāvau tayā prabhayā te 'pi jihmīkṛtau nāvabhāsyante,
S08bsu041_u:237_3: niṣprabhāṇi ca bhavanti / na virocante jihmīkṛtāni ca saṃdṛśyante sarvamaṇimantraupadhiratnaprabhāṃ niḥprabhīkṛtya punareva bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ mukhadvārāntardhīyate sma /
S08bsu041_u:238_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatraiva parṣanmaṇḍale sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:238_1: sa utthāyāsanāt sattvaramāṇarūpo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
S08bsu041_u:238_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya /
S08bsu041_u:239_2: yathā vadasi tat tathā / nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatānāṃ vidyate smitam /
S08bsu041_u:239_3_0: asti hetuḥ asti pratyayaḥ / yo idaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ mañjuśrīmūlakalpā vidyācaryānuṣṭhānakarmasādhanopayikasamavaśaraṇadharmameghāniḥśritaṃ
S08bsu041_u:239_3_1: samanupraveśānuvartakaṃ kariṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti śraddhāsyanti pustakalikhitaṃ
S08bsu041_u:239_4: antaśaḥ anumodanāsahagataṃ vā cittasantatirvā pratialapsyante romaharṣaṇaṃ sañjanaṃ vā kariṣyanti vidyāprabhāvaśaktiṃ vā śrutvā saṃhṛṣyante anumodiṣyante caryāṃ vā pratipatsyante /
S08bsu041_u:239_5: vyākṛtāste mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodho sarve te bhaviṣyanti /
S08bsu041_u:239_6: buddhā bhagavantaḥ / ata eva jināḥ smitaṃ kurvanti nānyathā iti /
S08bsu041_u:240_0_0: ādau tāvad dṛṣṭasamayaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ labdhābhiṣekaḥ asmin kalparājamūlamantrahṛdayaṃ
S08bsu041_u:240_0_1: upahṛdayaṃ vā anyataraṃ vā mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekākṣaraṃ vā anyaṃ vā yathepsitaṃ mahāraṇyaṃ
S08bsu041_u:240_0_2: gatvā triṃśallakṣāṇi jape phalodakāhāraḥ mūlaparṇabhakṣo vā kṛtapuraścaraṇo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:241_1: tato parvatāyamabhiruhya jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:241_2_0: ātmanā pūrvābhimukho kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ śvetapadmānāṃ śvetakuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ lakṣamekaṃ
S08bsu041_u:241_5_1: paṭasyāgrataḥ agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā padmākāraṃ śvetacandanakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kuṅkumakarpūraṃ
S08bsu041_u:242_0: tataḥ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ raśmayo niścaranti samantācca paṭaḥ ekajvālībhūto bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:242_1: tataḥ sādhakena sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa paṭaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ praṇamya paṭaṃ grahītavyam /
S08bsu041_u:243_3_0: yatrāsau bhagavāṃ saṅkusumitarājendrastathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ
S08bsu041_u:243_3_1: ca deśayati āryamañjuśriyaṃ ca sākṣāt paśyati dharmaṃ śṛṇoti anekānyapi bodhisattvaśatasahasrā
S08bsu041_u:243_3_2: paśyati tāṃśca paryupāste mahākalpasahasraṃ ajarāmaralīlī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:243_4_0: paṭastatraiva tiṣṭhati sarvabuddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhito bhavati teṣāṃ cādhiṣṭhānaṃ
S08bsu041_u:243_4_1: sañjānīte kṣetraśatasahasraṃ cākrāmati kāyaśatasahasraṃ vā darśayati anekaṛddhiprabhāvasamudgato
S08bsu041_u:243_4_2: bhavati āryamañjuśriyaśca kalyāṇamitro bhavati niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavatīti /
S08bsu041_u:247_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvatī parṣanmaṇḍalopaniṣaṇṇāṃ devasaṅghānāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:247_1_0: śṛṇvantu bhavanto mārṣā mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya caryāmaṇḍalamantrasādhakamopayikaṃ
S08bsu041_u:247_4: mañjuśriyo 'pi kumārabhūto 'nena vidyārājñā ākṛṣṭo vaśamānīto sammatībhūtaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:247_7: sarvavighnāṃśca nāśayatyeṣa mahāvīryaḥ prabhāvaḥ ekavīryaḥ eka eva sarvamantrāṇām agramākhyāyate /
S08bsu041_u:247_9_0: katamaṃ ca tat / ekākṣaraṃ sarvārthasādhakaṃ, sarvakāryakaraṇaṃ sarvamantracchedanaṃ
S08bsu041_u:247_10: tadyathā - kaḷlhīṃ / eṣa sa mārṣā paramaguhyatamaṃ sarvakarmikaṃ ekākṣaraṃ nāma vidyārājā anatikramaṇīyaḥ sarvasattvānām /
S08bsu041_u:247_11_0: adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sādhakaḥ sarvamantrāṇāṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānām
S08bsu041_u:247_11_1: īśvaro sarvavitteśānāṃ maitrātmako sarvavidviṣṭānāṃ kāruṇiko sarvajantūnāṃ nāśakaḥ
S08bsu041_u:247_11_2: sarvavighnānāṃ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā karoti asādhito 'pi
S08bsu041_u:247_12: mantrajapatā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśyo bhavati vastrāṇyabhimantrya prāvaret subhago bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:247_15: akṣiśūle saindhavaṃ cūrṇayitvā saptavārānabhimantrya akṣi pūrayet akṣiśūlamapanayati /
S08bsu041_u:247_16: karṇaśūle gajaviṣṭhotthitāṃgarjānasambhavāṃ chatrikāṃ kedhukapatrāvanaddhāṃ mṛdvāgninā pacet /
S08bsu041_u:247_17: sukelāyitāṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ saindhavacūrṇapūtāṃ kṛtvā saptābhimantritena karṇāṃ pūrayet /
S08bsu041_u:247_18: tatkṣaṇādupaśamayati / prasavanakāle striyāyā vā mūḍhagarbhāyāḥ śūlābhibhūtāyāḥ āṭaruṣakamūlaṃ niṣprāṇakenodakena pīṣayitvā nābhideśaṃ lepayet /
S08bsu041_u:247_19: sukhenaiva prasavati naṣṭaśalyo vā puruṣaḥ purāṇaghṛtaṃ aṣṭaśatavārānabhimantrya pāyayellepayed vā tatpradeśaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva niḥśalyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:247_20: ajīrṇaviśūīcikāyātisāre mūleṣu sauvarcalaṃ saindhavaṃ vā anyaṃ lavaṇaṃ saptavārānābhimantrya bhakṣaye tasmāvdyādhermucyate tadaha eva svastho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:247_21: ubhayātisāre sadyātisāre vā mātuluṅgaphalaṃ pīpayitvā niṣprāṇakenoidakena tasmādābādhānmucyate /
S08bsu041_u:247_22_0: sakṛjjaptena tu japtena vā vandhyāyāḥ striyā vā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ prasavamākāṃkṣatā
S08bsu041_u:247_22_1: aśvagandhamūlaṃ gavyaghṛtena saha pācayitvā gavyakṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā gavyakṣīreṇaivādvālya
S08bsu041_u:247_22_2: pañcaviṃśatparijaptaṃ ṛtukāle pāyaye snānānte ca paradāravarjī gṛhī kāmamithyācāravarjitaḥ
S08bsu041_u:247_23_0: svapatiṃ vā janayate sutaṃ tripañcavarṣaprasavanakālātirekaṃ vā anekavarṣaviṣṭabdho
S08bsu041_u:247_24: tataḥ supiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā śarkareṇa saha yojya harītakīmātraṃ bhakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:247_25: saptadivasāni ca śarkaropetaṃ śṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ pāyayed abhimantrya punaḥ punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:247_26: mastakaśūle kākapakṣeṇa saptābhimantritena umārjāyet svastho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:247_27: strīpradarādiṣu rogeṣu ālambuṣamūlaṃ kṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā nīlikāmūlasaṃyuktamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṣīreṇāloḍya pāyayet /
S08bsu041_u:247_28: evaṃ cāturthaekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikasātatikaṃ nityajvaraviṣamajvarādiṣu pāyasaṃ ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ bhakṣāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:248_1: svastho bhavati / evaṃ mātaravālapūtanavetālakumāragrahādiṣu sarvāmānuṣaduṣṭadāruṇagṛhīteṣu ātmano hastamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā gṛhītakaṃ mastake spṛśet /
S08bsu041_u:249_0: ekajaptenātmarakṣā dvijaptena sahāyarakṣā tṛjaptena gṛharakṣā caturjaptena grāmarakṣā pañcajaptena yāmagocaragatarakṣā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:249_2: etāni cāparāṇi anyāni ca kṣudrakarmāṇi sarvāṇi karoti asādhite 'pi /
S08bsu041_u:249_4_0: ekāntaṃ gatvā viviktadeśe samudragāminīṃ saritsamudbhave samudrakūle gaṅgānadīkūle
S08bsu041_u:249_4_1: vā athavā mahānadīkūlamāśritya śucau pradeśe uḍayaṃ kṛtvā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī
S08bsu041_u:249_4_2: maunī bhikṣabhaikṣāhārasādhakaḥ yāvakapayo phalāhāro vā triṃśallakṣāṇi japet siddhinimittaṃ
S08bsu041_u:249_5_0: jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ tatraiva deśe tasmiṃ sthāne paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā suvarṇarūpyamayī
S08bsu041_u:249_5_2: pratyagravastrakhaṇḍābhiḥ khaṇḍābhiḥ kṛtavartibhiḥ lakṣamekaṃ paṭasya pradīpāni nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:249_6: sarvāṇi samaṃ samantāt samanantarapradīpitaiḥ pradīpamālābhiḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti /
S08bsu041_u:250_0: tato vidyādhareṇa sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa sādhakapaṭāntakoṇaṃ pūrvalikhitapaṭaḥ niḥsṛtaṃ arghaṃ dattvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhāṃ praṇamya grahetavyam /
S08bsu041_u:250_1: tato gṛhītamātreṇa sarvapradīpagṛhītaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samutpatati ekādhikavimānalakṣaṇaṃ vā gacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:250_2: divyatūryapratisaṃyukte madhuradhvanigītavāditanṛtyopetaiḥ vidyādharībhiḥ samantādākīrṇaṃ taṃ sādhakaṃ vidyādharacakravartirājye abhipecayanti /
S08bsu041_u:250_5: ta evāsya kiṅkarāḥ / taiḥ sārdhaṃ vicarati / sarvavidyādhararājāsya dāsatvenopatiṣṭhante /
S08bsu041_u:250_7: cirañjīvī adhṛṣyo bhavati / sarvasiddhānāṃ paramasubhago bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:250_14_0: uttaptataram / [Vaidya_59] tata ekānte gatvā vigatajane niḥsaṅgasaṅgarahite mahāraṇyamanupraviśya
S08bsu041_u:250_14_1: yatra sthāne padmasaraṃ saritopetaṃ ekaparvatāśritaṃ parvatāgramabhiruhya ekākṣaraṃ
S08bsu041_u:250_14_2: vidyārājaṃ mañjuśrīkalpabhāṣitaṃ vā tathāgatānyabodhisattvabhāṣitaṃ vā anyataraṃ
S08bsu041_u:250_14_3: mantraṃ gṛhya teṣāṃ yathepsataḥ padmamūlaphalāhāro payopayogāhāro vā vidyā ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣāṇi
S08bsu041_u:250_15_0: japānte ca tenaiva vidhinā pūrvanirdiṣṭena jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmapuṣpāṇāṃ
S08bsu041_u:251_0: tato homāvasāne bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti /
S08bsu041_u:252_0: bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakād mahāyānavaipulyasūtrād āryamañjuśrīmūlakalpānnavamaḥ paṭalavisarād dvitīyaḥ uttamasādhanopayikakarmapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:255_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi karmasādhanottamaṃ bhāṣate sma /
S08bsu041_u:255_1: iha kalparāje anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā gaṅgāmahānadīmavatīrya nauyānasaṃsthitaḥ gaṅgāyāḥ madhye kṣīrodanāhāraḥ triṃśallakṣāṇi japet yatheṣṭadivasaiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:255_3: tataḥ sādhanamārabhe tatraiva naumadhye agnikuṇḍaṃ kārayet padmākāram /
S08bsu041_u:255_4_0: tato nāgakesarapuṣpaiḥ paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S08bsu041_u:255_4_1: ātmanaśca pūrvābhimukhaṃ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ nāgakesarapuṣpaṃ ekaikaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ
S08bsu041_u:255_5: yāvat triṃśasahasrāṇi śvetacandanakuṅkumapūtānāṃ nāgakesarapuṣpāṃ nānyeṣāṃ nāgānāṃ darśanamavekṣyaṃ siddhadravyaiśca pralobhayanti /
S08bsu041_u:256_6: sa mūrdhni spṛśati spṛṣṭamātraśca pañcābhijño bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:256_9_0: gaṅgāmahānadīmavatīrya ekakāṣṭhenaiva vilvavṛkṣamayena nauyānaṃ kṛtvā sudṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ
S08bsu041_u:256_9_1: tatra samābhirūhya bilvakāṣṭhakamayaṃ vāhanaṃ tenaiva tāṃ nau anusādhakenaiva vyaktena
S08bsu041_u:256_10_0: tiryag dīrghaṃ vā / ato 'nyataraṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā mūlamantraṣaḍakṣarasakṛt aṣṭākṣara
S08bsu041_u:256_10_1: ekākṣaraṃ vā krodhadūtīdūta aparā vā anyataraṃ vā mantraṃ gṛhītvā jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ
S08bsu041_u:256_10_2: tatraiva aścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ātmanaśca pūrvāmukhaṃ prathamataḥ paścād yatheṣṭaṃ
S08bsu041_u:256_10_3: bhavati kṣīrayāvakaphalāhāro vā udakakandamūlaphalāhāro vā maunī triḥ kālasnāyī tricelaparivartī
S08bsu041_u:256_11: prathamaṃ tāvat paṭasyāgrataḥ yathopadiṣṭapūrvadṛṣṭavidhiḥ vidyāṃ ṣaṣṭilakṣāṇi japet /
S08bsu041_u:257_0: tato sādhakenopakaraṇāni saṅgṛhya pūrvasthāpitakāni kuryāt tatraiva nauyāne /
S08bsu041_u:257_2: nāpi nivārayitavyā / na ca śakyante nivarttāpayituṃ varjayitvā sādhakaśāt /
S08bsu041_u:258_1: kiṃ punaḥ svalpamadhvānam / tatra praviṣṭaḥ saritālaye sādhanakarmamārabhet /
S08bsu041_u:258_2_0: khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya pūrvakāritāgnikuṇḍe kumbhakārakārite vā mṛdbhāṇḍe
S08bsu041_u:259_0: juhvataśca laṅkāpurivāsino rākṣasā bahurūpadhāriṇaḥ hāhākāraṃ kurvantāḥ nāgapuribhogavatīvāsināśca nāgarājānaḥ uttiṣṭhante vividharūpadhāriṇo krūratarāḥ saumyatarāśca /
S08bsu041_u:259_1: te nāgarākṣasāśca evamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭhatu bhagavānuttiṣṭhatu bhagavāniti /
S08bsu041_u:259_2: asmākaṃ svāmī bhavat / evaṃ asurāḥ yakṣāḥ devāḥ mahoragāḥ siddhāḥ sarvamānuṣāśca pralobhayanti /
S08bsu041_u:259_4: tato vidyādhareṇa mantraṃ japatā vāmahaste tarjanyā tarjayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:259_5: tato vidravanti itaścāmutaśca prapalāyante naśyanti ca /
S08bsu041_u:259_6: tato homāvasāne sā nautaṃ sādhakaṃ gṛhītvā kṣaṇenākaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ gacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:259_7: aparāṇyapi lokadhātuṃ gacchatyāgacchati ca bodhisattvacittavido bhavati pañcābhijñaḥ maharddhiko bhavati mahānubhāvaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:259_9: sarvanāgāḥ sarvarākṣasāḥ sarvadevāḥ sarvāsurāḥ sarvasattvā cāsya vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:259_10: ājñākarāḥ sthāpayitvā sarvabuddhabodhisattva pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakānāmiha mantrasiddhānāṃ ca /
S08bsu041_u:259_11: te cāsya maitrātmakā bhavanti anumantāraḥ yāvatsarvasattvānāmadhṛṣyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:260_4: tasmiṃśca nauyāne viṃśottaraśataṃ puṣpāṇāṃ pradīpavyagrahastānāṃ nauyānamabhirūḍhānāṃ śuklāmbaravasanānāṃ kṛtarakṣāṇāṃ jyeṣṭhapaṭapūrvavidhisaṃsthāpitakasyāgrataḥ saṃsthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:260_5: tato paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā nāgakesaracūrṇānāṃ kuṅkumaśvetacandanakarpūravyāmiśrāṇāṃ khadirānale āhūtīsahasrāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśa juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:261_0: tato homāvasāne sā nau kṣaṇamātreṇa brahmalokaṃ gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:261_1: āgacchati ca / yatheṣṭaṃ vicarate / āryamañjuśriyaṃ sākṣāt paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:261_2: dṛṣṭamātraśca bhūmiprāpto bhavati pañcābhijñaḥ cirakālajīvī mahākalpasthāyī mahāvidyādharacakravartirājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:261_4: sahāyakā taiḥ sārddhaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ vicarate svacchandagāmī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.3_1: ete deśeṣu sidhyante mantrā vai jinabhāṣitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.6_2: devatā siddhimāyānti tasmiṃ sthāne tu nānyathā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.9_1: kaśmīre cīnadeśe ca nepāle kāviśe tathā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.11_1: sattvā dayālavo yatra siddhisteṣu dhruvā bhavet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.13_0: siddhyante tatra mantrā vai kṣipraḥ sarvārthakarmasu /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.14_0: śāntiṃ gataḥ muniḥ śreṣṭho tatrāpiḥ siddhi dṛśyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.15_0: kapilāhvaye mahānagare vare vane lumbini puṅgave /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.16_0: gṛdhrakūṭe tathā śaile sadā sītavane bhuvi /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.16_1: kusumāhvaye puradhare ramye tathā kāśīpurī sadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.17_0: madhure kanyakubje tu ujjayanī ca purī bhuvi /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.17_1: vaiśālyāṃ tathā caitye mithilāyāṃ ca sadā bhuvi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.19_0: ete cānye ca deśā vai grāmajanapadakarvaṭā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.19_1: pattanā puravarā śreṣṭhā puṇyā vā saritāśritā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.26_0: ekaliṅge tathā prānte sarve mantraṃ tu mantravit /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.26_1: ātmarakṣāṃ sakhāyāṃ tu kṛtvā vai sa puraścarī //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.31_0: tasmiṃ sthāne sadājāpī bhajeta suvigāṃ śuciḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.32_1: śucirjapet mantraṃ vai prayoge caiva savrataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.34_1: na puṇyaṃ tatra vai kiñcid dṛśyate lokaceṣṭitam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.35_1: anyatra vā tato gacche samaye somagrahe travat //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_10.36_1: anyatra vā tato kṣipraṃ gacche śaktā tu mantravit //
S08bsu041_u:262_1: eṣāmalābhena yatra vā tatra vā sthāne śucau pūrvasevāḥ kāryā śraddhāvimuktena sādhanopayikottamakarma samācaret /
S08bsu041_u:263_0_0: ādau tāvajjyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ pañcānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ātmanaśca pūrvābhimukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S08bsu041_u:263_0_1: valmīkāgramṛttikāṃ vā gaṅgānadīkūlamṛttikāṃ vā gṛhya uśīraśvetacandanakuṅkumaṃ vā
S08bsu041_u:263_1_0: taṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ sthāpayitvā acchinnāgraiḥ kuśaiḥ śucideśasamudbhavaiḥ cakrākāraṃ
S08bsu041_u:263_1_1: kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā vāmahastena mayūraṃ śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ rātrau
S08bsu041_u:263_1_2: paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā karpūradhūpaṃ dahatā tāvajjaped yāvatprabhāta iti /
S08bsu041_u:264_0: tataḥ sūryodayakālasamaye tanmṛnmayaṃ mayūraḥ mahāmayūrarājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:264_1: cakraścādīptaḥ / ātmanaśca divyadehī divyamālyāmbarābharaṇavibhūṣitaḥ uditādityasaṅkāśaḥ kāmarūpī /
S08bsu041_u:264_2: sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ praṇamya paṭaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya paṭaṃ gṛhītvā tasmiṃ mayūrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ muhūrtena brahmalokamatikrāmati /
S08bsu041_u:265_0_4: puṣpalohamayāni anye vā yatkiñcit sarvopakaraṇabhāṇḍaprabhṛtayo puṣpalohamayāṃ vālmīkamṛttikanadīkūlamṛttikamayāṃ
S08bsu041_u:265_0_5: vā tāṃ sarvāṃ pañcagavyena prakṣālayitvā abhyukṣayitvā vā aṣṭaśatenābhimantritaṃ
S08bsu041_u:265_0_6: kṛtvā saṃśodhanamantreṇaiva ekākṣareṇa mantreṇa vā anyatareṇa vā mantreṇehakalparājoktena
S08bsu041_u:265_0_7: varjayitvānusādhanopayikena mantreṇa yatheṣṭataḥ yathābhirucitaṃ ātmano kṛtarakṣaḥ
S08bsu041_u:265_0_8: sahāyakāṃśca kṛtaparitrāṇaḥ saguptamantratantrajñaḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭeṣu sthāneṣu paścānmukhaṃ
S08bsu041_u:265_0_9: pratiṣṭhāpya ātmano pūrvavat paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā [Vaidya_65] jyeṣṭhasya karpūradhūpaṃ
S08bsu041_u:265_0_11: śuklapuūrṇamāsyāṃ rātrau anyataraṃ saṅgṛhya teṣāṃ rātrau tāvajjapet yāvatsūryodayakālasamayam /
S08bsu041_u:266_1: yadi vāhanaviśeṣaṃ sādhakena gṛhīto bhavati tadābhiruhya yatheṣṭaṃ gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:266_2: yadyābharaṇaviśeṣo praharaṇaviśeṣo vā taṃ gṛhītvā vandyo vā vidyādharacakravartīṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:266_3_0: yatheṣṭa gacchati divyarūpī uditādityasaṅkāśaḥ mahāprabhāmālī vidyudyotitamūrttiḥ
S08bsu041_u:266_3_2: divyamahāmaṇiratnacārī yena vā vāhanena pūrvaparikalpitena dṛṣṭa yena siddho sa evāsya
S08bsu041_u:266_4_0: tamevāsya vāhanaṃ sa evāsya sahāyakaḥ paramantrāṇusiddhiḥ nivārayitvā ātmamantrasiddhiṃ
S08bsu041_u:266_4_1: samprayojitamaitrātmako hitakāmaḥ satatānubaddhaḥ ya evāsya praharaṇābharaṇaratnaviśeṣāḥ
S08bsu041_u:266_4_2: āsanaśayanayānasattva prabhṛtayo ta evāsya mahārakṣāvaraṇaguptaye nityānubaddhā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:266_7: sādhukāraṃ ca dadāti / mūrdhniraparāmṛṣṭena kalyāṇamitratāṃ ca pratilabhate /
S08bsu041_u:266_9: pūjyaśca bhavati / sarvasattvānāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ adhṛṣyo bhavati sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūtakoṭīvaṃśānucchedakaḥ bhūmiprāptaśca bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:266_10: daśabalānāṃ bodhisattvaniyāmatāṃ ca samanugacchatīti saṃkṣepato uttamakarmāṇi sarvāṇi uttamasthānasthite uttamapaṭasyāgrataḥ uttamapūjābhirataḥ uttamānyeva karmāṇi kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:266_11_7: vidhimārgeṇa saṃkṣepato ihānyakalpabhāṣitairapi karmabhiḥ sādhanīyo 'yaṃ paṭarājā /
S08bsu041_u:266_12: āśusteṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ siddhirbhavatīti yanmayā kathitaṃ tadavaśyaṃ sidhyatīti /
S08bsu041_u:267_0: bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakād mahāyānavaipulyasūtrād āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād daśamaḥ uttamapaṭavidhānapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāptaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:270_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:270_1: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyeṃ madhyamaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ madhyamakarmopayikasādhanavidhiḥ samāsato tāṃ bhāṣiṣye /
S08bsu041_u:270_2: taṃ śṛṇu / sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S08bsu041_u:270_3: bhāṣiṣye / atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantamevamāhaḥ - tad vadatu bhagavāṃ lokānukampako śāstā sarvasattvahite rataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:270_4: yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase / asmākamanukampārthamanāgatānāṃ ca janatāmavekṣya /
S08bsu041_u:271_0_0: evamukte bhagavāṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavānetadavocat - śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ ādau
S08bsu041_u:272_0: ādau tāvad vidyāvrataśīlacaryāsamādānaṃ prathamata eva samādadet /
S08bsu041_u:272_2_0: tvadīyaṃ kalparājoktaṃ vyaktaṃ medhāvinaṃ labdhvācāryābhiṣekatvaṃ śāsanābhijñaṃ kuśalaṃ
S08bsu041_u:272_2_1: vyaktaṃ dhārmikaṃ satyavādinaṃ mahotsāhaṃ kṛtajñaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ nātivṛddhaṃ nātibālaṃ
S08bsu041_u:272_2_2: nispṛhaṃ sarvalābhasatkāreṣu brahmacāriṇaṃ kāruṇikaṃ na lobhamātreṇa bhogahetorvā
S08bsu041_u:272_2_3: anunayahetorvā na mṛṣāṃ vadate kaḥ purnarvādo svalpamātraiṇaiva lobhamohaprakāraiḥ
S08bsu041_u:272_2_4: dṛḍhapratijñā samatā sarvabhūteṣu dayāvāṃ dānaśīlaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tvadīyaguhyamantrānujāpī
S08bsu041_u:272_2_6: kāryāvāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ śreyasapravṛttaḥ abhīru acchambhinamamaṅkubhūtaḥ dṛḍhavīryaḥ
S08bsu041_u:273_0: sādhakaśca tatsamaḥ nyūno vā kiñcidaṅgaiḥ tādṛśaṃ maṇḍalācāryamabhyarthya prārthayet /
S08bsu041_u:273_3: tatastena maṇḍalācāryeṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭena vidhinā śiṣyāṃ yathāpūrvaṃ parīkṣya praveśayet /
S08bsu041_u:273_4: pūrvavadabhiṣekaṃ dattvā, mantraṃ dadyāt / yathāvat kramaśo samayaṃ darśayet /
S08bsu041_u:273_5: rahasyatantramudrākarmāṇi ca prabhūtakālenaiva suparīkṣya āśayaṃ jñātvā darśayet /
S08bsu041_u:273_7: tataḥ śiṣyeṇa maṇḍalācāryasya yathāśaktitaḥ ācāryo vā yena tuṣyeta,
S08bsu041_u:273_10: putravat pratipattavyam / mātuśca bhogā upasaṃhartavyā iti /
S08bsu041_u:274_0_0: tatastena sādhakena anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekāntaṃ gatvā pūrvanirdiṣṭe sthāne
S08bsu041_u:274_1: āhūya arghamāsanaṃ dattvā trisandhyā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī jāpaṃ [Vaidya_67] kuryāt pratyahaṃ tatra sandhyākālaṃ nāma rātryantāt prabhṛti yāvad yugamātrādityodayam /
S08bsu041_u:274_3: madhyandine ca āditye ubhayānte yugamātraṃ pramāṇaṃ vyomni sanniśritaṃ ravimaṇḍalaṃ madhyaṃ sandhyamucyate /
S08bsu041_u:274_4: astamanakāle ca yugamātraśeṣaṃ tritīyaṃ sandhyamucyata iti /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.8_1: laukikā ye ca mantrā vai vajrāntakulayorapi /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.13_0: tathā viśiṣṭo ācāryo prārthanīyo sadā tu vai /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.14_0: abhiṣekaṃ tu tenaivaṃ dattaṃ bhavati mahat phalam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.15_0: alaṅghyaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śiṣyaiḥ kartavya yatnataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.16_0: svalpamātrā prabhūtā vā yena vā tuṣṭi gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.17_0: tathaiva śiṣyo dharmajño ācāryāya dade dhanam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.18_0: puṣkalaṃ gatimāpnoti śiṣyo pūjyastu ta gurum /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.20_0: sarve devāstu tuṣyante satkriyā tu gurau sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.21_0: samayānupraveśināṃ pūrvaṃ prathamaṃ vā sādhakena tu /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.21_1: jano vā tatsamo vāpi utkṛṣṭo vā bhaved yadi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.22_1: tenāpi tasya tantre 'smiṃ upadeśaḥ sadā tu vai //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.23_1: na matsaro bhavet tatra śiṣye 'smiṃ pūrvanirmite //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.25_1: snigdhasantānānudharā nu mantraṃ dadyāttu tatra vai //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.26_0: ācāryo śiṣyamevaṃ tu śiṣyo vā gurudarśane /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.27_0: teṣāṃ nityaṃ tu mārgaṃ vai mantracaryānudarśane /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.28_0: dhṛtiṃ tuṣṭiṃ ca lebhe tau tathā śiṣya guruḥ sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.32_1: śiṣyeṇaiva tu tasmai tu mantraṃ gṛhya yathātamam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.34_0: pitṛvat praṇamya śirasā vainato gacchaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.36_1: mahāraṇyaṃ parvatāgraṃ tu nadīkūle śucau tathā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.42_1: prātarutthāya śayanāt snātvā caiva śuce jale //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.44_0: mantrapūtaṃ tato kṛtvā jalaṃ caukṣaṃ sanirmalam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.45_0: tatotthāya taṭe sthitvā hastau prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.48_0: sugandhapuṣpaistathā śāstu ardhaṃ dattvā tu jāpinaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.48_1: praṇamya śirasā buddhāṃ tadā tu śiṣyasambhavāṃ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.50_1: japaṃ kuryāt pratatnena akṣasūtreṇa tena tu //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.51_0: yathālabdhaṃ tu mantraṃ vai nānyamantraṃ tadā japet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.51_1: atihīnaṃ ca varjītaṃ atiutkṛṣṭa eva vā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.52_1: atyuccaṃ varjayed yatnād vacanaṃ cāpi cetaram //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.53_1: nātyuccaṃ nātihīnaṃ ca madhyamaṃ tu sadā japet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.54_2: gupte cātmavide deśe japenmantraṃ tu madhyamam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.55_0: tathā jape tu prayuktaṃ syāt kaścinmantrārthasuśrutaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.57_0: caturthe rātribhāge tu tadardha ardha eva tu /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.59_0: ato vyomne dite bhānoḥ mantrajāpaṃ tadā tyajet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.59_1: mantrajāpaṃ tadā tyaktvā visarjyārghaṃ dadau vratī //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.61_0: pustakā daśabhūmākhyāḥ pūjyā vācyāstu vai sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.62_0: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca tato gacchenna jīvikam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.64_0: gṛhe tu dhārmike sattve praviśed bhikṣāṃ japī sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.66_1: arīn mardayate nityaṃ ripubhirna ca hanyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.67_0: evaṃ mantrī sadā grāmaṃ praviśed bhikṣānujīvinaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.67_1: rañjanīyaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ śabdāṃstu vai śubhām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.69_1: krimibhiḥ klinnaḥ śmaśānasthaṃ anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ kalevaram //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.70_0: bāliśā yatra mūḍhā vai bhramanti gatipañcake /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.73_1: sīdanti ciramadhvānaṃ yatra sattvā śuce ratāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.74_1: na kṣayaṃ janma teṣāṃ vai duḥkhavārisamaplutām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.75_0: duḥkhamūlaṃ tathā hyukto striyā buddhaistu kevalaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.77_0: narakaṃ tiryalokaṃ ca pretalokaṃ ca sāsuram /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.77_1: mānuṣyaṃ lokaṃ vai divyaṃ divyaṃ caiva gatiḥ sadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.79_0: strīṣu saktā narā mūḍhāḥ kuṇameṇaiva kroṣṭukāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.79_1: yatra sattvā ratā nityaṃ tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ sahanti vai //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.81_1: tejasvino jitamitrāḥ teṣāṃ duḥkho na vidyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.85_0: na tasya gatirutkṛṣṭā na cāpi gatimadhyamā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.86_1: na cāpi mārgaṃ dideśaṃ vai nirvāṇapuragāminam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.87_0: kutaḥ sidhyanti mantrā vai bāliśasyeha kutsite /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.88_0: na cāpi nākapṛṣṭhaṃ vai na ca saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.89_0: chinno vā tālavṛkṣastu mastake tu yadā punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.90_1: duḥśīlo pāpakarmastu strīṣu saṅgī punaḥ sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.92_0: nānyeṣāṃ kathitā siddhiḥ bāliśāṃ strīṣu mūrchitām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.96_1: niḥprāṇake tadā ambhe prathamaṃ jaṅghameva tu //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.97_1: apasavyaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā hastaṃ prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.98_0: pūrvasaṃsthāpitaiḥ śuddhaiḥ śucibhiḥ sapta eva tu /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.101_0: ya jāpino yadā mantrī tat kuryāttu sadā punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_11.102_0: dakṣiṇe lokanāthasy maṇḍale tu sadā iha /

S08bsu041_u:385_2: taṃ bhāṣiṣye 'ham / yaṃ jñātvā sarvamantracaryāniyogayuktāḥ sarvasattvā sarvamantrāṇāṃ kālākālaṃ jñāsyanate /
S08bsu041_u:385_3: taṃ śṛṇu / sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S08bsu041_u:386_0_0: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S08bsu041_u:386_0_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ siṃhāsanaṃ tenāñjalimupanāmya trirapi
S08bsu041_u:386_0_2: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantametadavocat /
S08bsu041_u:387_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt /
S08bsu041_u:387_1: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraśnitavyaṃ manyase /
S08bsu041_u:388_0: atha bhagavāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadamavalokya sarvabhūtarutapracodanī nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
S08bsu041_u:388_1_0: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ ye kecit sattvānantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sthitā
S08bsu041_u:388_1_1: sarve te buddharaśmyāvabhāsitā sarvāṃśca tāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ śirasā praṇamya anantāparyantalokadhātusthitāṃ
S08bsu041_u:388_1_2: abhyarcayena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śuddhāvāsabhavanoparisthitaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tenopajagmuḥ /
S08bsu041_u:388_2: yena ca sahā lokadhātuḥ tena ca pratyaṣṭhāt /
S08bsu041_u:388_3: tatra ca sthitā sarvabhūtagaṇā buddhānubhāvena svakaṃ svakaṃ rutaṃ vidarśayantaḥ bhagavataḥ pādamūlasamīpopagatā dharmaśravaṇāya /
S08bsu041_u:388_4: bhagavantaṃ praṇamya mabhyarcya ca yathāsthāneṣu ca sanniṣaṇṇā abhūvaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S08bsu041_u:389_0_0: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ śākyasiṃho śākyarājādhitanayaḥ teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dhārmyā
S08bsu041_u:389_0_1: kathāyā sandarśayati samuttejayati sampraharṣayati teṣāṃ sarvabhūtasureśvarāṇāṃ tathā
S08bsu041_u:389_0_2: tathā dharmadeśanā kṛtavāṃ yathā taiḥ sarvaiḥ kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaucityānyutpāditāni /
S08bsu041_u:389_1: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ voko kaiścicchrāvakatve kaiścitkaiścit satyāni dṛṣṭvāni kaiścidarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kaiścid daśakuśale karmapathe sthitvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam /
S08bsu041_u:389_2: anantāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ anantāṃ kalpakoṭīṣvajopasthānaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapradānaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanapariṣkāraṃ pradadyāpa iti niyatā ca bhaviṣyāmo buddhabodheriti /
S08bsu041_u:390_0: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāmāśayaṃ jñātvā mantraṃ bhāṣate sma sarvabhūtarutābhijñā nāma /
S08bsu041_u:390_1: yaṃ sādhayitvā sarvabodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvāśca rutaṃ vijāneyuḥ ekakṣaṇena sarveṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ yathāgocaramasthitānām /
S08bsu041_u:392_1: kalpamasya bhavati / ādau tāvanmahāraṇyaṃ gatvā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ mūlaphalaśākāhāro vā akṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:392_2: triḥkālasnāyinā valkalavāsasā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vidhinā kartavyam /
S08bsu041_u:392_4: tataḥ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā akṣaralakṣasyānte tatraiva sādhanamārabhet /
S08bsu041_u:392_5_0: vināpi paṭena / agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā dvihastapramāṇaṃ caturhastavistīrṇaṃ samantāccaturaśraṃ
S08bsu041_u:392_5_1: sarvapuṣpaphalairarghyaṃ datvā prāṅmukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ navamagnimutpādya kṣīravṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ
S08bsu041_u:393_0: tato pūrvāyāṃ diśi mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā buddho bhagavānāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:393_2: aparāmṛṣṭe sādhake tatkṣaṇādeva bhagavato vācā niścarate - siddhastvaṃ gaccha yatheṣṭam,
S08bsu041_u:394_0: tataḥprabhṛti sādhakaḥ pañcābhijño bhavati mahāprabhāvadivyamūrttiḥ bodhisattvācāraḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ yatheṣṭagatiḥ sarvabhūtarutajñaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:394_1: ekakṣaṇamātreṇa sarvabhūtānāṃ rutaṃ vijānīte prabhavaśca bhavati yatheṣṭagāmī /
S08bsu041_u:394_3: viṃśatibhiḥ sādhanapraveśairniyataṃ sidhyatīti nātra vicikitsā kāryā prasādhitasyāpi na mantraṃ japatā pūrvamāditaścaiva madhye caiva nibodhatām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.1_0: rutajñānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ caiva kīrtyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.2_0: bhāṣitaṃ kathyate loke madhyadeśe ca kīrtitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.3_1: tathā te devarāṭ sarve mantrāṃ vavre svabhāvataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.4_0: tridaśo madhyadeśe ca vatsa paśya daśārṇavā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.4_1: amante yathā vācā tathā deśeṣu jāyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.9_1: tathā sarvato vakrā dṛṣṭyā caiva supūjitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.10_0: bhavante te sadā devā madhyadeśe savācakā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.11_0: meghagarjanā teṣāṃ vācaiṣā tāṃ tu lakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.13_0: abhāvādāśrayāt teṣāṃ na vācāṃ jagmire surāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.13_1: adhaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ surāḥ sarve madhyadeśeṣu vācakā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.14_1: atha devāmatha bhūmyā vai yakṣāścaiva maharddhikāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.17_1: sarvadevagaṇā śreṣṭhā vācā hyeṣā tu kīrtyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.20_0: tathā devālaye vāṇī madhuraṃ cāpi sūktajitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.20_1: rutaṃ mataṃ tathā jñeyaṃ karmeṣveva niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.21_2: tathā daityagaṇā śreṣṭhaṃ rutaṃ cāpi niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.23_1: sarveṣāṃ janapadāaṃ vā tathā teṣāṃ tu kalpayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.24_1: devānāṃ ca tathā nityaṃ purogānāṃ parikīrtayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.25_1: nāgāṃścaiva sadā kāle yathā vācā nibodhatām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.26_0: lāḍodreṣu tathā sindhau yathā muttarato tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.26_1: janeṣveva hi sarvatra tāṃ tu teṣāṃ niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.27_0: nāgānāṃ ca yathā lāḍī vācā hyuktā manīṣiṇī /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.27_1: yakṣāṇāṃ tu tathā vācā uttarāṃ diśi ye narāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.28_0: garuḍānāṃ yathā hyedre kinnarāṇāṃ tu kīrtyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.28_1: nepāle sarvato vācā yathā sā tāṃ nibodhatām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.29_1: vindhyajātā manuṣyāṇāṃ mlecchānāṃ ca yā vācā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.30_0: pūtanānāṃ tu sā jñeyā vācaiṣāṃ parikīrtitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.30_1: rākṣasānāṃ yathā vācā tāṃ vavre surottamā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.32_0: tāṃ tu vācā samālakṣye rākṣaseṣveva niyojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.33_1: sarvato trividhā jñeyā deśabhāṣāśca te tridhā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.34_0: triḥprakāraṃ tathā karma trideśaṃ caiva yojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.34_1: trividhaḥ sarvato jñeyaḥ trividhaṃ karma rutaṃ smṛtam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.39_1: liṅgamarthaṃ tathā pātraṃ devaṃ caiva niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.40_0: śreyasā śreyase caiva āveśānāṃ tu lakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.42_0: te tu vyaktaṃ narā jñeyā mlecchabhāṣāratā hi te /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.43_1: dakṣiṇātyā yathā vācā cañcalā bhavati ninditā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.44_1: bahudhā rutayā jyeṣṭhā āviṣṭānāṃ tu trijāparām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.45_0: ākṛṣṭā mantribhiḥ kṣipraṃ svayaṃ vā iha māgatā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.45_1: bahudhā gṛhṇanti sattvānāṃ mātarā sagrahā surā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.49_1: teṣā nordhvaṃ gatā dṛṣṭi ardho dṛk nordhvagatā hi te //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.52_0: garuḍānāṃ tathā vācā āviṣṭānāṃ tu lakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.56_0: svena svena tu kāyena yo liṅgena tu lakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.56_1: tena tena tu liṅgena taṃ taṃ sattvaṃ vinirdiśet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.57_0: kaśmalā kathitā sarve adho dṛṣṭigatā hi te /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.58_2: āviṣṭānāṃ bhuvi martyānāṃ kathitā liṅgāni vai sadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.59_1: tathaiva tad yojayet kṣipraṃ bhūmirmānuṣatāṃ gatāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.60_0: nirīkṣante tathā cordhvaṃ diśāṃ caiva samantataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.61_1: prasannaglatyā tathā sarve suraśreṣṭhā nu lakṣayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.64_1: teṣāṃ rūpadharā kāntiḥ āśrayā te parivartaye //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.69_0: ṛṣiṇā kathitā hyete saṃyatā te ṛṣavasthitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.69_1: āviṣṭānāṃ tadā liṅgā ṛṣīṇāṃ kathitā mayā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.71_0: mātarāṇāṃ tadevaṃ tu keṣāṃ ceva tu dṛśyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.71_1: kravyādā nagnakā tiṣṭhe sacelā niścelatāṃ gatā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.77_1: teṣāṃ ca kathitaṃ liṅgaṃ caritaṃ tu vibhāvitam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.79_1: āviṣṭānāṃ tathā liṅgā kathitā bhūtale nṛṇām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.83_0: tat sarvaṃ bodhayet kṣipraṃ mantriṇe cintitaṃ tu yat /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.84_1: nabhāṣa madhuraṃ vācaṃ na yajño satvarā surāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.85_0: niḥśreṣṭhā vivaśā caiva sthitā te maunamāśritāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.85_1: na vācā kiñcanasteṣāṃ na cittā nāpi mānitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.86_0: tasmāt taṃ na cākṛṣye taṃ jāpī parivartayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.87_0: nākṛṣyaṃ vidyate kiñcid duṣkaraṃ teṣāṃ japtamantrārthatāpinām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.91_0: nānye mantrarāṭ śaktā laukikā ye maharddhikā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.92_0: varṇituṃ gaṇayituṃ gantuṃ taṃ sthānaṃ yatra te sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.94_0: tasmāt taṃ na cālaye yatnā na vṛthāmarthena yojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.95_0: aśaktā sarvamantrā vai gantuṃ yatra te tadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.97_1: dhīro gambhīratāṃ yāto alpabāṣpo bhavet tadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.112_0: parāmṛśyantaṃ tadā vajraṃ mudrāṃ vadhnāti mātmanām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.112_1: tuṣṭo varado martyāṃ bhogāṃ dāpayate sadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.113_0: mahātmā kṛṣṇavarṇo vai īṣi dṛśyati tatkṣaṇāt /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.114_0: nṛṇāṃ kimarthametaṃ vo karmavaraṃ dāsyāma vo bhuve /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.115_0: varadā saprabhā mantrā phalaṃ dadyustadā tadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.117_0: nirmāṇā kathyate bimbaṃ na bimbaṃ nirmāṇamāśṛtam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.122_0: laukikānāṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ mantranāthaṃ tu yojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.123_0: taṃ niyuñjya tadā mantrī mantreṣveva ca sarvataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.124_0: svaliṅgā vācayā caiva taṃ niyuñjyatha mantriṇām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.124_1: bahuliṅgā tadā caiṣā svaliṅgā caiva sādhaye //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.126_0: eṣa kālakramo yoge āveśe caiva yojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.127_0: niyuñjyāt sarvato mantrī japtamātrāṃ ca cetarām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.129_0: itarāṃ laukikāṃ devāṃ āhvaye caiva maharddhikām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.130_1: anyamantrā na cāhveyā nānye devagaṇā sadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.131_0: svayamevāgatā ye tu samaye tāṃ niyojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.132_0: taṃ tasmā netarāṃ karmaṃ āveśāṃ cāpi varjayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.132_1: ākṛṣṭā maharddhikā devā divyā āryāśca bhūmijā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.135_0: sāgarā bhramate kṣipraṃ patate ca muhurmuhuḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.136_0: vividhā nāgavare hyete antāntā teṣu nibodhatām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.136_1: kecid bhāvayato hṛṣṭo kecit tiṣṭhanti niścalam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.137_1: patanti vividhākāraṃ plutaṃ cāpi karoti vai //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.141_0: te tu mantrā sadā yojyā daṣṭāviṣṭeṣu sarvataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.143_1: aśeṣaṃ kathitaṃ hyetaṃ daṣṭaviṣṭaṃ va lakṣaṇam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.144_1: nārakānāṃ tu bhāṣāṃ vā kathyamānāṃ nibodhatām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.146_0: tadā te kathaye vācāṃ rephaṃyuktāṃ sabhairavām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.147_0: kathayanti bhayaṃ tatra kṣudhā caiva ca darśayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.148_0: krūrāṃ darśayed vācāṃ bhayaṃ tatra nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.149_1: tadā te kathayantyete tāṃ vācāṃ bhayabhairavām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.150_1: teṣāṃ kṣīrasamaṃ deyaṃ toyaṃ caiva sukhodayam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.155_0: rodamāne tadā sarve sattvānāṃ ca niveditā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.156_1: āgatya grāmavāse 'smiṃ kathayanti yathā hi tam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.158_0: yadā dakṣiṇato gacche mṛgā gacchetha magratam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.158_1: siddhiṃ ca nirdiśante tāḥ mṛgāścaiva supuṣkalām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.159_1: na gacchet tatra medhāvī jambūkaiśca nivāritaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.159_2: praviśet svālayaṃ kṣipraṃ kathayāmāsa te tadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.162_0: cāṣā ca pakṣiṇā sarve mṛgāścaiva sajambukā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.163_1: kathayāmāsa te sarvaṃ gaccha pūjyo bhaviṣyasi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.164_1: mārge yadi dṛśyate sthānagacchet kutra vā kvacit //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.165_1: gacchatāṃ svakamāvāsaṃ svastho tiṣṭhati sve gṛhe //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.166_0: na gacchet tatra mantrajño uragaistu niveditam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.166_1: yadi gacchet tadā kālaṃ udvego mṛtyu vā bhavet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.168_1: kecit tiryagatā divyāḥ mānuṣā bhāṣiṇo tadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.169_0: yo 'yaṃ nivedaye vācāṃ taṃ tathaiva niyojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.174_0: sa jñeyā mānuṣī vācā rutaṃ caiva svabhāvataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.176_0: bhṛśaṃ tatra haret kṣipraṃ taruṃ tasya sudāruṇam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.176_1: rudyate paśurājā vai karuṇaṃ dīna nivedayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.178_0: paścime mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt dakṣiṇe śāntikāmatām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.181_0: catvāro matha pañcā vā sapta ṣaṣṭha nibodhitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.183_0: yathā siṃhe tathā sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇiṣu yojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.183_1: śarabhaiḥ śārdūlākhyairvai yathā tata sarva nibodhatām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.184_1: kintu prāsādikaṃ jñānaṃ katthyate tāṃ surottamām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.184_2: kroṣṭukeṣu ca sarvatra tāṃ tathaiva niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.185_0: pūrvapaścimato bhāge yadā hastī ruded bhṛśam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.185_1: tasmānmahad bhayaṃ vidyāt tatra deśeṣu jantunām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_22.187_1: gacchato vāmataḥ kāko bhṛśaṃ rauti sudāruṇam /
