S08bsu041_u:431_2: vidyā svayamevopatiṣṭhati / anena ca bhagavato 'gratastrisandhyamagarudhūpaṃ daśalakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:431_4: hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped, yāvat prajvalitamiti / taṃ gṛhītvā vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:431_5: māse māse paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcabhiḥ pakṣaiḥ prātihārikapakṣe siddhyati /
S08bsu041_u:431_7: sarvābhijña pratilabhate / sarvabuddhabodhisattvābhinanditaḥ sarvasattvānupraveśaḥ siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:432_0: athoṣṇīṣaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ hastamātre daṇḍe sauvarṇarajatatāmramayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalitamiti /
S08bsu041_u:433_0: atha bhadraghaṭaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇaṃ bhadraghaṭaṃ kṛtvā sarvabījaratnauṣadhiparipūrṇaṃ śuklavastrāvakuṇṭhitaṃ tamanena sādhayed ekasmiṃ prātihārakapakṣe karmārabhed,
S08bsu041_u:433_1: aparasmin siddhyati / tasmiṃ haste prakṣipya yamicchati taṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:434_0: atha cintāmaṇiratnaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇadaṇḍo jātyamaṇiṃ sphaṭikamaṇiṃ ca sauvarṇaṃ vā vastrāvalambantaṃ kṛtvā anenaiva vidhānena sādhayed,
S08bsu041_u:434_3_0: atha bhagavataḥ koṭiṃ japet, svaśarīreṇotpatati / divyabahumahākalpaṃ jīvati / anye
S08bsu041_u:434_3_1: vā yorasitātapatraprakhyādayaḥ tadapyanena bhagavato daśalakṣajaptena karmāṇi kartavyāni
S08bsu041_u:434_4: evamapratihataḥ tathāgatoṣṇīṣaḥ parakalpavidhānenāpi yathā yathā prayujyati,
S08bsu041_u:434_5: tathā tathā siddhyati / acirādeva bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaḥ daśalakṣajaptaḥ sarvaṃ sādhayati sarvavidyāmantrādhipaticakravartī /
S08bsu041_u:435_0: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ ekasūcikaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:435_1: athavā puṣpalohamayaṃ kṛtvā, pañcagavyena prakṣālya, śuklapañcadaśyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:435_2: ghṛtapradīpān prajvālya, gandhodakena prakṣālya, yakṣā vaśyā bhavanti / sarvabuddhabodhisattvānamātmānaṃ niryātya,
S08bsu041_u:435_3: anenoṣṇīṣarājā parivāreṇa tejorāśisitātapatreṇa vā rakṣāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:435_6: prathame yāme 'tikrānte dvitīye yāme upaviśya ekāgracittaḥ tāvajjaped,
S08bsu041_u:435_7: yāvat prajvalitamiti / atrāntare sarvavidyādharā sarve devanāgayakṣāḥ sannipatanti /
S08bsu041_u:435_13: dharmaṃ śṛṇoti / mṛto yatrecchati, tatropapadyate / yadicchati vajrapāṇisakāśādutpadyate /
S08bsu041_u:436_0: atha khaḍgaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, nirvraṇaṃ khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā, ahorātroṣito bhagavatodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:437_0: ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ apanthadāyī agamyaḥ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ antarakalpaṃ jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:438_1: vīrakrayeṇa krītvā puṣpayogatrirātroṣitaḥ saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ bhikṣāṃ bhojayitvā ājñā dāpayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:438_4: trirātroṣitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittamutpādya ātmānaṃ niryātya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped,
S08bsu041_u:438_8: kiṅkarā bhavanti / varṣasahasraṃ jīvati / dhūmāyamāne tilakaṃ kṛtvā, antarddhīyate / yadicched devānāmapyadṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:438_9: kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena dṛśyate / punarantardhīyate / sarvāntarddhānikānāṃ rājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:438_10: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati jvalitena vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:438_11: saparivāra utpatati / vidyādhararājā bhavati / devakumāravapuḥ adharṣaṇīyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ kaḥ punarvidyādharāṇāṃ kalpasthāyī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:439_0: atha triśūlaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, puṣpalohamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:439_1: saṃvatsaraṃ japet / tato vālukāmayaṃ hastapramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:439_2: tasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, udāraṃ ca baliṃ nivedya, dakṣiṇahastena tṛśūlaṃ gṛhītvā,
S08bsu041_u:439_3: tāvajjaped, yāvat paryaṅkaṃ badhvā yāva sphurati,
S08bsu041_u:439_8: yaiśca dṛśyate, taiḥ sahotpatati / trinetraḥ dvitīya iva maheśvaraḥ sarvavidyādharanamaskṛtaḥ mahākalpasthāyī nirīkṣitamātreṇa duṣṭacittāṃ pātayati /
S08bsu041_u:439_9: na kasyacid gamyo bhavati / sadevake loke prāgeva vidyādharāṇāṃ cyutaḥ sukhāvatyāvupapadyate /
S08bsu041_u:440_0: atha vetāḍaṃ sādhayati / akṣatāṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā, caturakhadirakīlakaiḥ yantritasyorasyupaviśya,
S08bsu041_u:440_1: ratnacūrṇa juhuyāt / tasya jihvāgre cintāmaṇiratnaṃ dṛśyate /
S08bsu041_u:440_3: yāni praharaṇāni cintayati, tāni manasaivopapadyante / yojanaśataṃ prabhayāvabhāsayati /
S08bsu041_u:440_4: icchayā kālaṃ karoti / yatrecchati, tatra gacchati / lokadhātvantare 'pi vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:441_0: dvitīyaṃ vetālasādhanam / akṣatāṅgaṃ vetaḍaṃ gṛhītvā, badarakīlakaiḥ kīlayitvā, tasya mukhe lohacūrṇaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:441_1: tasya jihvā nirgacchati / taṃ chitvā, śataparivāra utpatati / antarakalpaṃ jīvati / sumerumūrddhani krīḍati, ramati / yadā mṛyate, tadā ekadeśiko rājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:442_0: athāṅkuśaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ, kuśamayamaṅkuśaṃ kṛtvā, kṛṣṇamayorekatareṇa pañcagavyena prakṣālya,
S08bsu041_u:442_2: udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, vajrapāṇerghṛtapradīpaśataṃ prajvālyayitaṃ kartavyam /
S08bsu041_u:442_3: vajraṃ kuryāt tathaiva sitātapatrasya ātmano rakṣā kartavyā /
S08bsu041_u:442_4: tejorāśinā maṇḍalabandhaṃ vikareṇena kīlakāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:442_5: caturdiśaṃ nikhānayitavyā / athābandhaṃ sthānaṃ ca parigrahaṃ kṛta bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:442_6: tato dvitīye prahare ekāgramanāḥ paryaṅkaṃ badhvā,
S08bsu041_u:442_7: aṅkuśaṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya kṛtarakṣaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ namaskṛtya aṅkuśaṃ hastena gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvadatrāntare narakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ vedanānyupaśāmyante /
S08bsu041_u:442_11: kalpasthāyī yadā mṛyate, tadā vajrabhavanaṃ gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:442_12: vajrapāṇiṃ paśyati / yadi paṭaṃ sādhayati, tena jvalitena vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:442_13_0: yamicchati kalpaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mantrasya nāmaṃ grahāya lakṣaṃ japedante ekārātroṣitaḥ
S08bsu041_u:442_13_1: udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya tilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ
S08bsu041_u:442_14: homānte āgacchati / dhanaṃ yamicchati taṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:443_0: atha maheśvaraṃ kartukāmaḥ maheśvarasya mahatiṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrttau arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:443_1: hāhākāraśabdaṃ bhavati / na bhetavyaṃ tata āgacchati bravīti kiṃ karttavyā sarve maheśvarā vidyā mama siddhā bhavantu /
S08bsu041_u:443_2: yadvaraṃ rocati taṃ dadāti / evamastviti kṛtvā antarddhiyate /
S08bsu041_u:445_1: atha yakṣiṇī ākarṣayitukāmaḥ tasya nāmaṃ gṛhya saptāhamaśokapuṣpāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:446_2: ante ekarātroṣitaḥ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabaliṃ codanāni nivedya yakṣakarṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmīti manasi kṛtvā vaṭavṛkṣasamidhāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:446_5: vakṣyanti kiṃ kartavyaṃ te / vaktavyāḥ ekaikaṃ dine yakṣa ājñākaraṃ yakṣaṃ preṣayeti /
S08bsu041_u:446_8: prabhāte tatraiva nayante / śataparivṛtasya bhaktaṃ prayacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:447_0_0: atha vajrapāṇiṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ caturguṇaṃ saptaguṇaṃ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā prātihārakapakṣe
S08bsu041_u:447_0_1: sakalāmudāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat pūrṇamāsīti pūrṇamāsyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣavaḥ
S08bsu041_u:447_0_2: saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ bhojayitvā āryavajradharasthaiva anumoditavyā tata udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā
S08bsu041_u:447_0_3: prathame yāme 'tikrānte dvitīye yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā upaviśyaikāgramanasaḥ vajradharaṃ
S08bsu041_u:447_0_4: drakṣyāmīti cittaṃ saṅkalpya guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ rātrāvekayāmaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:447_2: bhūḥ prakampati / meghā gulugulāyanti / sarve vidyādharāḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti /
S08bsu041_u:447_3_0: atrāntare bhagavāṃ vajrapāṇirāgacchanti sarvavidyābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ vidyottamapramukhaiḥ
S08bsu041_u:447_3_1: vidyārājaiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sarvanāgaiḥ sarvayakṣaiḥ sarvagandharvaiḥ kinnarairbodhisattvaiḥ
S08bsu041_u:447_4: tatkṣaṇaṃ nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ tīvravedanā vyuparatā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:447_5: gandhodakena arghyo deyaḥ / praṇipatya sthātavyaṃ ato vajradharo vakṣyati kiṃ te varaṃ dadāmi /
S08bsu041_u:447_6: vidyādharacakravarttitvaṃ bilapraveśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ antardhānaṃ yadvā rocate tasyaiva bhagavataḥ sakāśāllabhyate /
S08bsu041_u:447_7: yadvā rocati vidyādharacakravartittvaṃ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ cakravarttī vajrakāyo vajrapāṇisadṛśaḥ cittamātreṇa sarvapraharaṇānyutpadyante /
S08bsu041_u:447_8: mahākalpasthāyī / yadā mṛyate tadā vajrabhavanaṃ gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:447_9_0: anyeṣāmapi vidyādharāṇāṃ eṣa eva vidhiḥ saṃkṣepato yāni vajrapāṇikalpe yāni avalokiteśvarakalpe
S08bsu041_u:447_9_1: yāni ca bhagavatā proktāni kalpāni yāni brahmakalpe yāni maheśvarakalpe saṃkṣepato
S08bsu041_u:447_12: anena sārddhaṃ japtavyāḥ saptarātraṃ niyataṃ darśanaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:447_13: atha na dadāti vinaśyati / maheśvarapramukhānāṃ devānāṃ agrataḥ yadi japati saptarātrābhyantareṇa darśanaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:447_14: yadi na dadāti trisaptadhā mūrdhnā sphuṭati /
S08bsu041_u:448_1: atha dravyaṃ sādhayitukāmasya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhya mānuṣakṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā pañcagulikā karttavyā /
S08bsu041_u:448_3: candragrahe sūryagrahe vā balividhānaṃ kṛtvā yadā sarṣapa ciṭiciṭīyanti tathā prathamā siddhā yā vā sarvajanavaśīkaraṇaṃ tayā sarvasya laukikeyā vidheyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:448_6: antarakalpaṃ jīvati / jvalite tadā devakumāravapuḥ taruṇārkatejo vidyādhararājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:449_0: athāñjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ śrotāñjanaṃ nīlotpalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ candanaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā tāmrabhājane saṃsthāpya candragrahe tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
S08bsu041_u:449_1: tenāñjitanayanaḥ antarddhīyate kāmarūpī sarvāntarddhānikānā rājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:450_0_0: atha khaḍgā sādhayitukāmaḥ nirvraṇaṃ khaḍgamādāya kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā
S08bsu041_u:450_0_1: paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā balividhānaṃ ca kṛtarakṣaḥ khaḍgaṃ dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā
S08bsu041_u:450_3: apratihatabalaparākramaḥ yairdṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati /
S08bsu041_u:451_0_0: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ puṣpalohamayaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ ubhayatriśūcakaṃ
S08bsu041_u:451_1_0: ante trirātroṣitaḥ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaśataṃ
S08bsu041_u:451_1_1: prajvālya kuśapiṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vajramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti /
S08bsu041_u:452_0: evaṃ śūlacakraśaraśaktiprabhṛtaya sarve praharaṇāḥ paṭapādukadaṇḍakāṣṭhayajñopavītādīni parakalpavidhānena sādhayitavyāni /
S08bsu041_u:453_0: śāntikaṃ kartukāmaḥ padmākāraṃ vediṃ kṛtvā yājñikaiḥ samidbhiragniṃ prajvālya sruveṇa paramānnāhutīnāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:453_7: prātihārakapakṣe śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ candragrahe kṛṣṇagokṣīra aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibed rasāyanaṃ guṇopetaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:453_11: sarvavrīhigandhodakaparipūrṇaṃ navaṃ kalaśaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭaśatajaptena vināyakopadrutaṃ spṛṣṭvā snāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:453_14: maṇḍalakarmāṇi karoti / grahakarmāṇi śatasahasrajaptena mayūrapicchakena sarvaviṣāṃ nāśayati /
S08bsu041_u:454_0: samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya raktacandanāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ pravāhayet /
S08bsu041_u:454_2: dīyamānamakṣayaṃ bhavati / bilvāhutīnāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:455_0: devāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ agarusamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt aṣṭasahasraṃ /
S08bsu041_u:456_1_2: pretānāṃ śrīvāsakahomena kinnarāṇāṃ sarjarasahomena vināyakānāṃ sarveṣāmaṣṭaśatiko
S08bsu041_u:456_1_3: homaḥ saptāhaṃ rājānasya rājasarṣapatailāktānāṃ aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:456_2: trisandhyaṃ saptarātraṃ ādityābhimukhaṃ lakṣaṃ japet sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyati /
S08bsu041_u:457_0: sarvavidyānāmāpyayanaṃ kartukāmaḥ gomūtrayāvakāhāraḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklapuṣpairabhyarcya kṣīrāṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:457_1: kṣīreṇa ca snapayet / aṣṭaśatajaptena agarudhūpaṃ dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:457_2: āpyāyito bhavati / sukṛduccāritena ātmarakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:457_3: dviruccāritena parasya triruccāritena dravyasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:458_0_0: chinnabhinnanaṣṭakīlitānāṃ āpyāyanaṃ kartukāmaḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklaṣuṣpairabhyarcya
S08bsu041_u:458_0_1: anena uṣṇīṣarājena paṭasyāgrataḥ rājasarṣapāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ
S08bsu041_u:458_2_0: pāpijanātiriktāṃ vidyāṃ jñātvā gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhya tataḥ ātmamantramaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ
S08bsu041_u:458_2_1: kṛtvā bhagavataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā anena bhagavatā sārddhaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ japtvā
S08bsu041_u:459_0: atha padmaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā trirātroṣitaḥ taṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti /
S08bsu041_u:460_1: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamiśrayā mṛttikayā vālukamiśrayā vajraṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāhāraḥ maunī apatthadāyī vajraṃ gṛhya trīṇi lakṣa japet /
S08bsu041_u:460_3: taṃ vajramante siddhārthakamadhye sthāpya candragrahe candragrahe sthātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:460_5: vajraṃ siddhaṃ bhavati / tena vajreṇa gṛhītena sarvakarmaṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:460_6_0: parvataśikharāṇi cūrṇayati / nāgahradaṃ śoṣayati / nadīḥ pratisrotamānayati / nāgāṃ
S08bsu041_u:460_6_1: vidrāpayati / viṣāṇi nirviṣīkaroti / sarve prāṇinaḥ stambhayati / mohayati / pātayati /
S08bsu041_u:461_0: uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaṃ sādhayato na kaścicchaknoti vighnaṃ kartum /
S08bsu041_u:461_2: asya ca jāpakāle satataṃ buddhalocanāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca japtavyam /
S08bsu041_u:462_0: atha samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya padmānāṃ lakṣa nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:462_2: rāṣṭraṃ dadāti / atha trīṇi lakṣāṇi nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:462_3: sārvabhaumiko rājā bhavati / jambūdvīpādhipatirbhavati / vivarasyāgrataḥ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣāṇi trīṇi japet /
S08bsu041_u:462_4: sarvayantrāṇi patanti / nirviśaṅkena praveṣṭavyam / praviśya rasarasāyanaṃ niḥkāśayati /
S08bsu041_u:462_7: manasena utthāpayati / na kadācidapi praviśati tasmiṃ /
S08bsu041_u:463_0: śuklapratipadamārabhya triḥkālaṃ jātīkusumaiḥ sakṛjjaptena bhagavatā pādāṅguṣṭhe tāḍayitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:464_0: atha samudrataṭe paścānmukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya nāgakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya samudrasyauddiśya nāgapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:464_1: samudre ūrmaya āgacchanti / siddhinimittaṃ na bhetavyam /
S08bsu041_u:464_4: vaktavyam / vaśyo me bhava / tato yaducyate tat sarvaṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:465_0: padmaṃ bhūmyāṃ likhya sahasrapatraṃ tasyoparyupaviśya śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:465_1: bhūmiṃ bhittvā uttiṣṭhati / sahasraparivāra utpatati mahākalpasthāyī vidyādhararājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:466_0: prātihārakapakṣe jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājasyopari lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:466_1: ekaikaṃ japtavyam / tāvad yāvaduṣṇīṣād raśmi niścarati /
S08bsu041_u:466_4: daśalakṣajaptaḥ yathā yathā prayujyati tathā tathā anenaiva bhagavatā sārddhaṃ yadi vidyā japyate sā niyatamāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:466_5: sākṣādasya japyamānā yadi na vāgacchati sa mūrdhnā sphuṭati /
S08bsu041_u:467_1: ayaṃ ca ekākṣara uṣṇīṣacakravartī tathāgata eva sākṣāt ko 'nyaḥ sadevake loke sarvamantravidyānāṃ rājā tathāgata eva /
S08bsu041_u:468_0_0: atha nidhānamuddhāṭayati / yatra nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra gatvā akālakalaśaṃ gṛhya
S08bsu041_u:468_0_1: sarvagandhairlipya śvetacandanodakaṃ kumbhe prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā
S08bsu041_u:468_1: yadi nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tadā sa bhūmiḥ sphuṭati /
S08bsu041_u:468_2: yadi nidhānaṃ puruṣamātre tiṣṭhati udakena spraṣṭavyam /
S08bsu041_u:469_0: atha siṃhaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya piṇḍikāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvacalati /
S08bsu041_u:469_1: calitena siddho bhavati / pṛṣṭhamāruhya ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ ātmapañcamotpatati /
S08bsu041_u:470_0: evaṃ hastyaśvamahiṣaśca sādhayitavyā / yadā siṃhanādaṃ nadati tadā devā āsanebhyaścalanti //
S08bsu041_u:471_2: rājakanyāṃ labhate / jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ samudragāminyāṃ nadyāṃ pravāhayet kanyāṃ labhate yāmicchati /
S08bsu041_u:472_0: anenoṣṇīṣacakravartinā sa yatra gacchati indro 'pyasyāsanaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:472_1: sarve ca devarājānaḥ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā bhītā trastā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:472_2: sarveṣāṃ ca devarājānāṃ prabhāṃ prabhāṃ vyāmīkaroti /
S08bsu041_u:473_0: ayaṃ cakravartī tathāgata eṣa devaloke sarve ca kalpasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ ekākṣarasya vaśe vartanti /
S08bsu041_u:473_1: tannimnāśca sarve mantratantrāḥ sakalpakāḥ savistarā ityāha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ siṃho narottama iti /
S08bsu041_u:474_0: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt caturviṃśatimaḥ ekākṣaracakravartikarmavidhipaṭanirdeśapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:477_0_0: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya tatrasthāṃśca devasaṅghāṃ
S08bsu041_u:477_0_1: sarvāṃśca buddhabodhisattvā pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṃ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate
S08bsu041_u:477_1_0: nirdiṣṭo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ dharmakośaṃ cintāmaṇipratiprakhyaṃ
S08bsu041_u:477_1_1: lokānāmāśayasaphalīkaraṇārthaṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame śūnye buddhakṣetre parinirvṛtānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:477_1_2: tathāgatānāṃ saddharmanetrī antarddhānakālasamaye tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sarvatathāgatānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:477_2: japyamāno vidhinā sārabhūto 'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvatathāgatamantratantrāṇāṃ tvadīye ca kumārakalparāje 'grabhūto bhaviṣyatyayaṃ ekākṣaracakravarttī /
S08bsu041_u:477_3: anena japyamānena sarve tāthāgatā vidyārājānaḥ japtā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:478_0: aparamapi mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyakalparāje nidhānabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ agrabhūtaṃ jyeṣṭhabhūtamekākṣaraṃ pūrvamāsīt /
S08bsu041_u:478_1_0: atīte kāle atīte samaye dvāṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīsikataprakhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendro
S08bsu041_u:478_1_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S08bsu041_u:478_2: yasya smaraṇādeva nāmagrahaṇamātreṇa pañcānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:478_3: niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇā bahavaḥ sattvāḥ ye nāmamātraṃ śroṣyante /
S08bsu041_u:478_5: avaśyaṃ ca sarvamantrajāpibhiḥ ayaṃ bhagavānamitāyurjñānaviniścayarājā tathāgataḥ prathamata eva manasi karttavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:478_6: vācā ca vaktavyā - namastasmai bhagavate amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrāya tathāgatāyārhate samyak sambuddhāya /
S08bsu041_u:479_0: tato 'mitābhaṃ ratnaketuṃ tataḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yathepsitaṃ mantrā japtavyā /
S08bsu041_u:479_1_0: āśu siddhiṃ prayacchanti / yat kāraṇaṃ mahāpuṇyābhivṛddhaye mantrāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:479_1_1: saṃjñāparikīrttanaṃ namaskāraṃ ca sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo
S08bsu041_u:479_3: mantrā ca tasya āśu siddhiṃ prayacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.3_1: na tasya deyaṃ mantraṃ vai siddhistasya na dṛśyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.7_0: ṣaṭsaptatyaḥ tathā koṭyaḥ purā gītaṃ svayambhunā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.11_0: sāṣṭaṃ karmasahasraṃ ca kurute ca dhruvaṃ tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.14_0: ta imaṃ yugāntake loke śāstariḥ parinirvṛte /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.14_1: siddhiṃ ca yāsyate kṣipraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.17_1: sa dadyuḥ mantravaraṃ mukhyaṃ buddhaputrasya dhīmate //
S08bsu041_u:481_0: eṣa saḥ mārṣā amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena bhāṣitam /
S08bsu041_u:481_1_0: amitavyūhavatyāṃ lokadhātau sthitena sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai
S08bsu041_u:481_1_1: mahato janasyārthāya anāgatānāṃ ca janatāmavekṣya śāsanāntarddhānakālasamayaṃ viditvāṃ
S08bsu041_u:481_1_2: ante yugādhame ratnatrayāpakāriṇāṃ duṣṭarājñāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ jyeṣṭhamaurasaṃ putraṃ
S08bsu041_u:481_3: samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya dattavāṃ /
S08bsu041_u:481_4: tato mañjuśriyeṇa kumārabhūtena sarvasattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ mahākaruṇāvaśena hṛdayasthaḥ svamūrttau sthāpitavāṃ /
S08bsu041_u:481_5: anāgatakālamavekṣya yugādhame śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye ahamapaścimakastathāgataḥ duṣṭe kāle kalau yuge mama śāsanasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kariṣyatyayaṃ mantravaraḥ /
S08bsu041_u:482_1: śṛṇu kumāra mañjusvara susvara tavaitanmāhātmyaṃ kalpavistaram /
S08bsu041_u:483_1_0: pūrvasevā kṛtā bhavati / kṣīrāhāreṇa mauninā nānyatra mantragatacittena tṛśaraṇaparigṛhītena
S08bsu041_u:483_2: tataḥ karmāṇi bhavanti / ādau tāvat paṭaṃ likhāpayitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:483_3_0: upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiḥ anyatareṇa śucinā celakhaṇḍena paṭṭake
S08bsu041_u:483_3_1: vā candanakarpūrakuṅkumaparyuṣitena śucau deśe śucinā citrakareṇa triśuklabhojinā
S08bsu041_u:483_4: parato varjayet / evaṃ divase divase yāvat parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:484_1_0: hastamātre paṭe sugatavitasticaturasre paṭṭake vā samantādamitāyurvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ
S08bsu041_u:484_1_10: tasya dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśriyaṃ ratnopalasthitakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ pañcacīrakopaśobhitaṃ
S08bsu041_u:484_1_12: yajñopavītaṃ tathāgatadṛṣṭiṃ īṣatprahasitavadanaṃ saumyākāraṃ cārurūpaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ
S08bsu041_u:484_2: tasyādhastād yathā ce liṅgaṃ veṣī saṃsthānadhārī sādhakaḥ padmamālāṃ gṛhya jānukorparasaṃsthitaḥ avanataśiraḥ paṭakoṇāntadeśe likhāpayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:484_5: vāmapārśve upariṣṭād dvau tathāgatau abhilikhāpayitavyau sālendrarājā ratnaketuśca /
S08bsu041_u:484_6_0: samantaprabhā samantajvālā kanakavarṇāḥ sarvākāravaropetā sarvapuṣpābhikīrṇā niṣaṇṇā
S08bsu041_u:484_6_1: padmāsaneṣveva nānyāsaneṣu dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭāḥ saumyākārā bhagavataḥ
S08bsu041_u:484_6_2: upariṣṭāt puṣpa varṣaṃ pravarṣayamānaṃ meghāntargatalīnaṃ tathāgatavigrahamutpatamānaṃ
S08bsu041_u:484_7: sarvākāravaropetaṃ samantaprabhājvālāmālinaṃ dakṣiṇahastena varapradaṃ vāmahastena cīvarakarṇakāvasaktam /
S08bsu041_u:485_0: etad bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya paṭavidhānam /
S08bsu041_u:485_4: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣarājānaṃ mahācakravartinamekākṣarasya ca yāni kalpavistarāṇi uktāni tāni sarvāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:485_7: īpsitaṃ bhavati / manasā yadabhirucitaṃ asya paṭasya darśanādeva niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:486_0: tasyaiva bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasyādhiṣṭhānena sarvatathāgatahṛdaya ityucyate sarvatathāgata uṣṇīṣarājamityucyate /
S08bsu041_u:486_6: eteṣāṃ nāsti siddhiḥ / ratnatrayopakāriṇāṃ tatpratiyatnopaghātināṃ ca /
S08bsu041_u:486_10: katame ca te? ādau tāvadekajaptaḥ ātmarakṣā /
S08bsu041_u:486_11: dvijaptaḥ pararakṣā / trijapto mahārakṣā bhavati / mahābodhisattvenāpi daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitena na śakyate saṃkṣobhayitum /
S08bsu041_u:486_14: śukrabandhaḥ kṛto bhavati / svapnopaghātaṃ cāsya na bhavet /
S08bsu041_u:486_15: varjayitvā tu svecchayā tadaha eva rātryāmeko yadi rocate dine dine kartavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:486_16: atha na rocate bhasma saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā nābhideśaṃ spṛśet /
S08bsu041_u:486_18: pañcajapto buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyātvā yaṃ spṛśet sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:486_19: candramasagrahe śaśigrahe śaśimaṇḍale arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vināpi paṭena pūrvābhimukhaḥ ājyāhutīnāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:486_20: rājakulasamīpe nimnagānāntarite devāvasathe vā nāntaritaṃ yasmiṃ deśe rājā tiṣṭhati tatra samīpe homakarmaḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:486_23: yadā na paśyate tadā tasya cittaṃ nyastaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:486_27: yatra vā tatra vā kāle / tataḥ prabhṛti svastho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:486_28: etat karma śrāddhānāṃ ratnatrayaprasannānāṃ utpāditabodhicittānāṃ na kartavyam /
S08bsu041_u:486_31: duṣṭacittānāṃ raudracittānāṃ dinedine darśanaṃ ca dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:486_32: saumyacittā bhavanti / yadi na bhavanti mahatā arthena viyujyante /
S08bsu041_u:487_0: punarapi karmaṃ bhavati / candragrahe palāśasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutīnāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:487_1: prabhāte deśasvāmī rājā bhavati mantrāpayati mantritavyam /
S08bsu041_u:487_2: sadbhāvamupadarśayate / upadeṣṭavyaṃ ṣaṇmāsābhyantareṇa sahasrapiṇḍaṃ grāmaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:487_4: yadi sarvayāmikaṃ rātriṃ juhoti māsenekena labhate /
S08bsu041_u:487_5: yadi māsaṃ juhoti rātryāṃ rātryāṃ viṣayaṃ pratilabhate /
S08bsu041_u:487_6: viṣayapratitulyaṃ vā grāmaṃ anyaṃ vā yat kiñcid vitam /
S08bsu041_u:487_7: arayo na prabhavanti / yadi samprabhavanti punarapi karma bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:488_0: candragrahe apāmārgakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya palāśasamidhānāṃ brāhmaṇāre dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:488_2: prabhāte saumyā brāhmaṇā rājā vidviṣṭo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:489_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / candragrahe yathopapannakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutīnāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:489_1: homānte ca yasyāṃ diśi prabhustiṣṭhati tasyāṃ diśi tad bhasma kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:489_2: sa vaśyo bhavati / yaṃ vā taṃ vā yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā kāle rocate bhogāṃ vistarataiḥ sāhāyyatāṃ ca pratipadyate /
S08bsu041_u:489_3: svalpamalpaṃ vā mahāntaṃ vā grāmamanuprayacchati viṣayaṃ vā /
S08bsu041_u:490_0_0: atha kruddhacittaścaturvarṇyo anyataraṃ vikṛtasthāne vā yāto vikṛṣṭapradhānaliṅgena
S08bsu041_u:490_0_1: vā anyadevatābhaktaṃ laukikeṣu yasmiṃ diśi te tiṣṭhanti tadeva veśma so 'sya deśāntaraṃ
S08bsu041_u:490_1: udvignaśca bhavati / rātrau prapalāyate vā / kuṭumbaṃ vāsya bhidyate / pratyāyanaṃ kṣīrāṣṭasahasrāhutayo hotavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:491_0_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / candragrahe tenaiva vidhinā buddhabodhisattvapratimāpaṭasya
S08bsu041_u:491_0_1: vā saddharmapustake vā sadhātukagarbhacaitye vā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena ahorātroṣitena
S08bsu041_u:491_1: śuṣkapuṣpaiḥ sugandhaiḥ candanakuṅkumaparipūrṇaḥ karpūradhūpadhūpitoddeśaṃ taṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:491_2_0: [Vaidya_239] yatra karma prayujyate brāhmaṇāreḥ palāśakāṣṭhaiḥ kṣatriyāre aśvatthakāṣṭhaiḥ
S08bsu041_u:491_2_1: vaiśyāreḥ khadirakāṣṭhaiḥ śūdrārestadanyaiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya tadeva karma
S08bsu041_u:491_3: brāhmaṇasya palāśasamidha kṣatriyasyāśvatthasamidhaṃ vaiśyasya khadirasamidhaṃ śūdrasya apāmārgasamidhaṃ tadanyairvā yathālabdhaiḥ rājyahomānte kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:491_5: aṣṭasahasraṃ ghṛtāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ ante ca tasyāṃ tadeva bhasmaṃ kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:491_7: duṣṭacitta āgacchati vā uṣṇīṣacakravarttī ekākṣaramudraṃ badhvā kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:491_9: bhagnacakro vā bhavati / anyad vā yatkiñcinmahotpātaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:492_0: etāni vā parāṇi ca yatheṣṭāni karmāṇi bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:492_2: subhago bhavati / akṣiṇyabhimantrya añjayet / sarvajanapriyo bhavati / saptābhimantritaṃ kuryāt / akṣiṇī mukhaṃ ca sarvataḥ kṛtvā kruddhasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:492_3: sa vaśyo bhavati / saumyaśca puṣpaphalaṃ anyaṃ vā yatkiñcitsagandhaṃ saptābhimantri kṛtvā rājño nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:492_5: anyo vā yaḥ kaścit sattvaḥ sa darśanamātreṇaiva vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:492_7: svastho bhavati / etāni karmāṇi kuryānna duḥkhitebhyaḥ sattvebhyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.21_0: anāthe patite klībe vratine ceha śāsane /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.22_0: strīṣu karma na kuryād vai bālavṛddhe tathāture /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.23_0: na kuryāt karmamevaṃ tu mahāsattve prayojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.23_2: atimānine pracaṇḍe ca kuryāt karma īdṛśam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.26_1: tadeva bhasma kruddho vai yāṃ diśaṃ kṣipate japī //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.28_0: mahāmāryopasargaṃ ca tasmiṃ deśe tu dṛśyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.28_1: na kuryāt karma evaṃ tu sa kṛcchrapatito 'pi hi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.29_1: yāvat tatkarmaṇā pūrṇe dvisaptāhā tu saṃharet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.30_1: tṛsaptāhe tathā mṛtyuḥ tasmāt taṃ parivarjayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.31_1: trisaptāhe tathā nāśaṃ na kuryāt karma īdṛśam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.32_1: na bhṛśaṃ sampadaṃ hyete buddhā te śuddhamānasāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.35_1: śaktaṃ śubhodayaṃ nityaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāsya śubhapradam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.36_0: vyatimiśraṃ tathā karmaṃ vyatimiśraṃ tu paṭhyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.37_0: tāṃ jāpī varjayet kṛṣṇaṃ vyatimiśraṃ karma eva vā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.38_0: prāṇoparidhānnarakaṃ tu jāpī yāti punaḥ punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.39_0: svarga tathā siddhiḥ mantrāṇāṃ ca śubhā gatiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.41_0: mantrā tasya siddhyante jāpinasya śubhe sthite /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.43_0: yatheṣṭaṃ sahasrakarmaṃ tu sādhikāṣṭhaṃ ca siddhyate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.43_1: kṣudrakarma prakurvīta uttamaṃ tu na labhyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_27.45_1: utkṛṣṭarūpī tapasvī ca labhate uttamaṃ tathā //
S08bsu041_u:493_0: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt pañcaviṃśatimaḥ ekākṣaramūlamantra āryamañjuśrīhṛdayakalpapaṭavidhānavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:496_0: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:496_1: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi tvadīyapaṭavidhānaṃ sādhanaupayikaṃ sarvakarmārthasādhakam /
S08bsu041_u:496_2: etenaiva tu ekākṣareṇa hṛdayamantreṇa ṣaḍākṣareṇa vāmakarāntena tvadīyena mūlamantreṇa vā ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena omkārādyena ekākṣareṇa vā paṭasyāgrataḥ asyaiva kalpaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:496_3: paścime kāle paścime samaye mayi tathāgate parinirvṛte śūnye buddhakṣetre yugādhame prāpte atrāṇe loke aśaraṇe aparāyaṇe idameva kalparājā trāṇabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S08bsu041_u:497_0: ādau tāvat pūrvamevānāhate paṭe keśāpagate saptahastāyate tṛhastapṛthake sadaśe kuṅkumacandanarasaparyuṣite buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ likhayet /
S08bsu041_u:497_2_0: dakṣiṇe pārśve sudhanaṃ subhūmiṃ āryākṣayamatiṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca bhagavato namaskāraṃ
S08bsu041_u:497_2_1: kurvantaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṅgaṃ vāmapārśve samantabhadraṃ āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ
S08bsu041_u:497_6: upariṣṭācca vidyādharakumārau mālādhāriṇau meghāśca varṣamāṇāḥ savidyutā lekhayitavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:497_7: sarve ca bodhisattvā puṣpamāṇā yo bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayantaḥ kartavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:498_0: tamīdṛśaṃ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye sthāpya paścānmukhamakṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:498_1_0: asya mañjuśriyaḥ kāṣṭhamaunī triḥkālasnāyī tṛcelaparivarttī satatapoṣadhikaḥ śākayāvakayathābhaikṣabhaikṣāhāraścaturbhāgamannaṃ
S08bsu041_u:498_1_1: kṛtvā ratnatrayasya bhāgamekaṃ anyaḥ mañjuśriyaḥ anyat sarvasattvānāṃ śeṣamātmano
S08bsu041_u:498_2: akṣāntakāyo manasi bhagavantaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānālambanena manasā nātmārthamahaṃ kiñcit karomi kariṣyāmyanyatra sarvasattvānāmarthāyeti dhyātvā jāpaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:498_3: snānaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ pradīpāṃśca dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:498_4: snāpanaṃ paṭacchāyāyāḥ gandhānadhastāt puṣpāṇi ca baliṃ ca satataṃ dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:498_6_2: āryavajradharasya āryatārāyāḥ āryamahāmāyūryā āryaparājitāyāḥ bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāśca
S08bsu041_u:498_6_3: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ ca sarvameteṣāṃ pūrvaṃ datvā paścāt paṭasya dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:499_0: paścād bahirekasmiṃ pradeśe sarvoṣṭragardabhaśvahastirūpāṇi vināyakāni valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā teṣāṃ cāśeṣaṃ dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:499_3: manasā jāpaṃ kuryāt / anyatra vivikte kuśasaṃstare śayyāṃ kalpayet /
S08bsu041_u:499_6: śukrabandhaṃ ca kuryāt / śobhanāni ca svapnāni nānyasya prakāśayet /
S08bsu041_u:500_3: japakāle bhagavato 'tha mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mukhamavalokya jāpaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:500_4: anākulākṣarapadaḥ / akṣasūtrānte ca namaskāraṃ kṛtvā nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:500_5: anena vidhinā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā paṭaṃ kvacit svasthe sthāne sthāpya karma kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:501_0: paścād bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ śvetacandanamayaṃ padmāsanasthaṃ bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ ekahaste dadhānaṃ dakṣiṇena phalaṃ dadhānaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:501_1: tamekasmiṃ śucau pradeśe paścānmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā tasyāgrato 'gnikuṇḍaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:501_2: sarvakarma sacaturasraṃ dvivitastipramāṇaṃ adhaśca gandhāṃ sarvadhānyāni ca kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:502_0_0: anena vidhinā navamagnimutpādya aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ athavāśokasya vā ghṛtatandulodanaṃ
S08bsu041_u:502_0_1: kṣīradadhi madhu ca sarvamupahṛtya tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā aṣṭasahasraṃ parijapya
S08bsu041_u:502_1: paścādanyasmiṃ dine śuklapratipadamārabhya karma kuryāt aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vigatadhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā agnimāvāhayet /
S08bsu041_u:502_2: āgaccha haripiṅgala dīptajihva lohitākṣa haripiṅgala dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:503_1: paścād bhagavantamāvāhayet / āgacchagaccha kumārabhūta sarvasattvārthamudyato 'haṃ sāhāyyaṃ me kalpaya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca pratigṛhṇa svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:504_1: āgatasya cārgho deyaḥ sugandhapuṣpapānīyena paścāddhomaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:504_3: evaṃ saptadivasāni ghṛtatandulāni tilayāvakena cāpyāyanaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_4: rājā vaśyo bhavati / padmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_5: dravyaṃ labhate / śamīsamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya tilāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_6: dhanapatirbhavati / satatamudakamudake juhuyāt / prātarutthitaḥ sarvajanapriyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_9: bahuputrikāṃ juhuyāt / kanyāṃ yāmicchati tāṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:505_16: putraṃ labhate / akākolīne jātīkusumānāṃ pānīye juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_17: saptāhena grāmaṃ labhate / jātīkusumānāṃ jale ekaikaṃ puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_18: avaśeṣaṃ khaṇḍaṃ yasya ghrāṇāya dīyate sa ghrāṇamātreṇa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_19: kuṅkuma kastūrikālavaṅgapuṣpaṃ ca mukhe prakṣipya japet /
S08bsu041_u:505_20: yena saha mantrayate sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_21: marīcamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya kruddho 'pi vacanena priyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_22: śikhāmanenaiva badhnīyāt / adṛśyo bhavati / śakraṃ dṛṣṭvā manasānusmared vigatakrodho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_24: mahati pratyūṣe 'bhyutthāya jātīkusumasahitaṃ pānīyaṃ śucau pradeśe bhūmau juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_25: mantrī bhavati / anatikramaṇīyavacanaḥ / [Vaidya_244] bhaye samutpanne manasi kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_26: bhayaṃ na bhavati / parasya kruddhasyāpi maitrīṃ bhāvayittvā anusmṛtya mukhaṃ vyavalokayet /
S08bsu041_u:505_27: vigatakrodho bhavati / sarvasugandhapuṣpaiḥ homaṃ kuryād yamuddiśya karoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_31: puṣpāṇyabhimantrya yasya dadāti sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_34: dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / vīrakrayakrītāṃ guggulusarjarasaṃ gandharasaṃ śrīvāsakaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_35: pañcamyāṃ pañcamyāṃ ṣaṇmāsam pūrṇe sahasraguṇaṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:505_36: sarvagandhaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā tīkṣṇaśastreṇaikadhāreṇa cchitvā cchitvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:505_37: dakṣiṇena pādā puruṣasya vāmapādaṃ striyaḥ yamicchati sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:505_39: gāvo labhate / arkakāṣṭhairdhānyaṃ śirīṣapuṣpairaśvāṃ aśokapuṣpaiḥ suvarṇaṃ vyādhighātakapuṣpairvastrāṇi labhate /
S08bsu041_u:505_40: yad yadicchati tat sarvaṃ jātīkusumahomena karoti /
S08bsu041_u:505_43: saptajaptaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāmaṭati bhikṣāmakṣayāṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:505_44: rātryāmutthāya parijapyātmānaṃ svayaṃ śobhanāni svapnāni paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:506_0: atha rājānaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya pādapāṃsuṃ gṛhītvā sarṣapaistailaiśca miśrayitvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:507_0: rājñīṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ sauvarcalāṃ śatapuṣpāṃ vārāhīṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:507_2: rājamātyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ bhallātakānāṃ tilāṃ vacāṃ ca pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:507_4: purohitaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ brahmadaṇḍīṃ śatapuṣpāṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:507_7: sarve vaśyā bhavanti / atha kṣatriyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:507_9: saptāham / vaiśyānāṃ vaśīkaraṇe yāvakāṃ guḍasahitāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:507_10: vaśyo bhavati / piṇyākaṃ juhuyāt / śūdrā vaśyā bhavanti / sarvānekataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt sarve vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:507_11: catuḥpathe ekaśūnye gṛhe vā baliṃ nivedya yo 'sya glānaḥ sa tasmād vinirmukto bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:508_2: sarvarogebhyaḥ mūśrakaṃ badhvā śikhā bandhaṃ kṛtvā svaptavyaṃ /
S08bsu041_u:508_3: sarvarogā apagacchanti / vyādhinā grastaḥ japamātreṇa mucyate /
S08bsu041_u:509_0: pūrvoktena vidhānena anāhate paṭe keśāpagate āryamañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ ābhilekhyaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:509_5: rājā bhavati / candanasamidhānāṃ kuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:509_6: rājā bhavati / agarusamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:509_7: rājā bhavati / jātīkusumānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ koṭiṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:510_1: yatpramāṇānāṃ padmānāṃ rāśiṃ juhoti tatpramāṇānāṃ dīnārāṇā rāśī labhate /
S08bsu041_u:510_2: yāvad yāvat tāvajjapyamānāṃ na gṛhṇāti tāvad vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:510_11: śamīpatrāṇi juhuyāt / sarvakāmado bhavati / agastipuṣpāṇi kṣīrāktāni juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:510_14: dhuttūrakapuṣpāṇi juhuyāt / śūdravaśīkaraṇe / arkapuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:511_0: anenaiva vidhinā puṣpāṇāṃ sugandhānāṃ lakṣaṃ pādamūle nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:511_1: nityasukhī bhavati / aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya śamīpuṣpāṇāṃ sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:511_2: nakṣatrapīḍā vyupaśāmyati / gorocanayā mantramabhilekhya śirasi badhvā saṅgrāme 'vataret /
S08bsu041_u:511_3: śastrairna spṛśyate / hastiskandhe mañjuśriyamagrato balasya dattvā darśanamātreṇaiva parabalasya bhaṅgo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:511_9: pradīpānāṃ sahasraṃ dattvā ekapradīpaṃ padmasūtravarttiṃ kṛtvā madhuyaṣṭiṃ veṣṭayitvā prajvālya paśyed yathābhūtaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:512_0: sauvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vā kumāraṃ kṛtvā varadaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
S08bsu041_u:512_1: vāmena bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadhānaṃ tamīdṛśaṃ sadhātukakaraṇḍakaṃ purataḥ sthāpyākṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:512_5: pūrvoktena vidhānenāvāhanavisarjanaṃ padmamudrāṃ badhvā jāpaṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:512_6_0: dhvajamudrāyā āvarttanaṃ svastikamudrayā āsanaṃ pūrṇamudrāyārghaṃ ekaliṅgamudrāyāṃ
S08bsu041_u:512_6_1: puṣpāṇi manorathamudrāyāṃ pradīpaṃ yamalamudrāyā dhūpaṃ mayūrāsanamudrāyā gandhaṃ
S08bsu041_u:512_6_2: yaṣṭimudrāyā baliṃ anena vidhānena rātrau dinedine kuryād yāvajjāpaparisamāptiriti /
S08bsu041_u:513_1: viṣayaṃ labhate / rātrau jātikusumaughaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svapet /
S08bsu041_u:513_2: bhagavantaṃ paśyati dharma deśayamānaṃ bodhisattvaparivṛtaṃ yamuddiśya karoti tadeva kama kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:513_3: nānyasya kuryāt / upoṣadhikena śuklapratipadamārabhya śrīvāsakadhūpaṃ madhumiśraṃ juhuyāt rājyaṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:513_4: koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ svayameva paśyati dharmadeśanāṃ ca karoti /
S08bsu041_u:513_5: yadi kenacit sahollāpayati sammukhamavabhāṣate avaivarttikaśca bodhisattvo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_1: raktacandanamayaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ ekena pārśvena priyaṃkaraṃ anyena vīramatī sāśokavṛkṣāśrayāṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:514_2: tamekapārśve sthāpayitvā lavaṇasarvaparājikāvyāmiśreṇa raktacandanapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā cchitvā juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_3: udumbaraphalāni yasya nāmnā juhuyāt sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_4: kākodumbarikāphalāni juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_5: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ juhuyāt brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe padmamūlāni kṣatriyavaśīkaraṇe kaśerukāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:514_8: trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_9: nimbapatrāṇi kaṭutailāktāni juhuyāt āhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:514_10: sarveṇa homena vaśīkaraṇam / bṛhatīkusumānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt suvarṇaṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:514_15: brāhmīrasaghṛtasahitaṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā tāvajjaped yāvad daśasahasrāṇi paścāt pibet sarvavādino vijayate /
S08bsu041_u:514_16: yasya kruddhasyāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā loṣṭaṃ kṣipet purataḥ sa krodhaṃ muñcati /
S08bsu041_u:515_0: anāhate paṭe keśāpagate upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśriyaścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:515_1: padmāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ darkṣiṇapārśve āryamahāmekhalā vāmapārśve cāryaprajñāpāramitā jāpavatī sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā śuklavastranivasanā /
S08bsu041_u:515_2_0: tasyādhastāt padmasaraḥ, bahuvidhapuṣpasaṅkīrṇaḥ nāgarājānau akāyavinirgatau padmadaṇḍadhṛtahastau
S08bsu041_u:515_2_1: āryāparājitā caikasmiṃ vighnavināyakāṃ nāśayantī agnijvālāmukhī bhṛkuṭīkṛtalocanāṃ
S08bsu041_u:515_2_2: anyasmiṃ pārśve āryaparṇaśabarī pāśaparaśuvyagrahastā kṛṣṇaraktanetrā mayūrapṛṣṭhabhirūḍhā
S08bsu041_u:515_3: sādhakaśca padmamālāvyagrahastaḥ bhagavato mañjuśriyamukhaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ upariṣṭāccāmarapuṣpamālādundubhidhāriṇau devaputrau lekhayitavyau /
S08bsu041_u:516_0: taṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ sthāpya sadhātuke caitye koṭiṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:516_1: japānte ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvā daśasahasrāṇi japet /
S08bsu041_u:516_3: paścāt paṭaṃ kampate / rājyaṃ labhate / cakṣuśca labhate / vidyādharo bhavati / hasate cakravarttī bhavati / bhāṣaṇe bodhisattvaḥ prathamabhūmipratilabdho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:517_0: tasyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goghṛtaṃ gṛhya tāmrabhājane sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati /
S08bsu041_u:517_1: dhūmāyati / prajvalati / ūṣmāyamānaṃ pītvā paramamedhāvī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:517_3: āmaśarāvasampuṭe sthāpya vacāṃ jātīkusumairveṣṭayitvā tāvajjaped yāvadaṅkurībhavati /
S08bsu041_u:517_5: anyāṃ koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ sākṣāt paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:518_1: sauvarṇapadmaṃ śatapatraṃ kārayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti /
S08bsu041_u:518_2: tena gṛhītamātreṇa vidyādharāṇāṃ cakravartī bhavati parairadharṣaṇīyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:518_3: manaḥśilāṃ haritālamañjanaṃ vā śrīparṇīsamudgake prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat khuṭkhuṭāśabdaṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:518_5: khaḍgaṃ gṛhya sallakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇaṃ avraṇaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadahiriva phaṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhati /
S08bsu041_u:518_7: manaḥśilāṃ tṛlohapariveṣṭitāṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyatīti /
S08bsu041_u:518_8: adṛśyo bhavati / khaḍgahartā adṛśyaḥ sarvāṇi kuśalopasaṃhitāni karoti /
S08bsu041_u:518_9: varjayitvā kāmopasaṃhitam / śamīvṛkṣarūḍhasyāśvatthasya sāraṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyati /
S08bsu041_u:518_11: rajataṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā asuravivarasyāgrataḥ tāvajjaped yāvaccakraṃ asurajantrāṇi bhittvā praviśati /
S08bsu041_u:518_14: lohamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃ vivaradvāre jāpaṃ karoti tatra sarvayantrāṇi sphuṭanti /
S08bsu041_u:518_16: kalpasthāyī bhavati / maitreyaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:519_0: śvetārkamayaṃ aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā arkapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:519_1: sāmantarājyaṃ pratilabhate / śvetakaravīramūlamayaṃ kṛtvā aṅguṣṭhamātrameva tatpuṣpāṇāmekāṃ koṭiṃ nivedayet mantrī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:519_2: karahāṭavṛkṣamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ kārayitvā tatpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:519_3: senāpatyaṃ labhate / śvetacandanamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā jātīkusumānāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:519_4: purohityaṃ labhate / aśvatthavṛkṣamayaṃ aṅgulamātrapramāṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā akākolīne pānīyakumbhaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:519_5: bahujanasammato bhavati / sarvagandhamayaṃ kṛtvā sarvagandhapuṣpairniveditaiḥ yamicchati tamāpnoti /
S08bsu041_u:519_6: satattasamitamagarusamidhānāṃ juhuyāt mantrī bahujanasya sammato bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:519_9: dharmadeśanāṃ cāsya karoti / utthāyotthāya aṣṭaśataṃ japet sarvasattvānāmadhṛṣyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:519_11_0: prasādavāṃ bhavati / yamuddiśya karmakaro tatrasthaṃ saptabhirdivasaiḥ grāmāntarasthaṃ
S08bsu041_u:519_11_1: ekaviṃśatibhirdivasaiḥ viṣayāntarasthaṃ caturbhiḥ māsaiḥ nadyantaritaṃ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ
S08bsu041_u:519_11_2: svakulavidhānenānyamantravidhānena cāśeṣaṃ karmaṃ karoti varjayitvā kāmopasaṃhitam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_28.3_1: mamaitat kathitaṃ kalpaṃ tasmiṃ kāle sudāruṇe //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_28.7_2: etat karmasya māhātmyaṃ sādhakānāṃ tu jāpinām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_28.9_0: amoghaṃ darśayet siddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame /
S08bsu041_u:520_0: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ karmavidhānāryamañjuśrīyaparivarttapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:522_2: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:522_3: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīye kalpavidhānaparivarte saptamaḥ paṭakarmavidhānaṃ yo tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye yugānte sādhayiṣyanti amoghā tasya siddhirbhaviṣyati /
S08bsu041_u:522_4: saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyā sarvadurgatinivāraṇīyā niyataṃ tasya bodhiparāyaṇīyā siddhirbhaviṣyati /
S08bsu041_u:523_0: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya hṛdayaṃ bhāṣate sma -
S08bsu041_u:524_0: katamaṃ ca tat / om vākyeda namaḥ //
S08bsu041_u:525_0: asya kalpaṃ bhavati / śākayāvakabhikṣabhaikṣāhāro vā triḥkālasnāyī tricelaparivarttī akṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:526_0_0: tataḥ acchinnāgradaśake paṭe poṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśrīścitrāpayitavyaḥ
S08bsu041_u:526_0_1: padmāsanasyo dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ kumārarūpī muktottarāsaṅgaḥ
S08bsu041_u:526_0_2: tasya vāmena āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ padmahastaḥ cāmaravyagrahastaḥ dakṣiṇena āryasamantabhadraḥ
S08bsu041_u:526_0_3: upari meghagarbhavinirgatau vidyādharau mālādhāriṇau likhāpayitavyau adhastāt sādhako
S08bsu041_u:527_0: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca prajvālya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasreṇa ekaikamabhimantrya mañjuśrīmukhe tāḍayet /
S08bsu041_u:527_2: paṭo vā prakampate / huṅkāraśabdena sārvabhaumiko rājā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:527_4: sarvalokaikaśāstrajñaḥ / atha na siddhyati sarvakarmasamartho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:528_0: agarusamidhānāmadhyarddhamaṅgulapramāṇānāṃ nirdhūmeṣu khadirāṅgāreṣu kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ turuṣkatailāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:529_0: tasyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ candanadhūpamavyavacchinnaṃ dahaṃ kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:529_1: tataḥ āryamañjuśrīḥ [Vaidya_250] sākṣāmāgacchati gambhīrāṃ dharmāṃ deśayati /
S08bsu041_u:529_2: tāmadhimucyati / adhimucya sarvavyādhivinirmuktaḥ vaśitā prāpto bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:530_0_0: raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍaṅgulapariṇāhaṃ sanālaṃ raktacandanena mrakṣayitvā
S08bsu041_u:530_0_1: sahasraṃ sampātāhutaṃ sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ padmapatre
S08bsu041_u:530_0_2: sthāpya hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalita iti /
S08bsu041_u:530_1: tena gṛhītena dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ taptakāñcanaprabhaḥ bhāskarasyopiraketejā devakumāraḥ sarvavidyādharanamaskṛtaḥ mahākalpaṃ jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:531_0: candragrahe śvetavacāṃ gṛhyaṃ pañcagavyena prakṣālya aśvatthapatrairavaṣṭambhayitvā tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati dhūmāyati jvalati /
S08bsu041_u:531_1: sarvajanavaśīkaraṇaḥ sarvavādivijayī dhūmāyamāne antarddhānaṃ triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:532_0: kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ ghṛtaṃ gṛhya tāmrabhājanaṃ saptabhiraśvatthapatraiḥ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiriti /
S08bsu041_u:533_0: puṣkarabījaṃ mukhe prakṣipya candragrahe tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyati /
S08bsu041_u:534_3: bhikṣāhāraḥ kāṣṭhamaunī lakṣaṃ jape antarhito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:534_4: koṭiṃ japedāryamañjuśrīstathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathā caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:535_0: sarvagandhairyasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā juhoti sa saptarātreṇa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:535_1: guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt dīnāralakṣaṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:536_2: kṣayaṃ na gacchati / gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ kuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:536_3: rājā vaśyo bhavati / tilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:536_9: sarvajanapriyo bhavati / śikhāṃ saptajaptāṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāvadhyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:536_11: sarvavyādhirmucyate / dinedine saptavārāṃ japet / niyatavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayati athāṣṭaśatajapena maraṇakālasamaye samastaṃ sammukhaṃ āryamañjuśriyaṃ paśyatīti /
S08bsu041_u:537_0: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt saptaviṃśatimaḥ mañjuśrīpaṭavidhānaparivartakarmavidhiḥ saptamakapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāptamiti /
S08bsu041_u:540_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:540_1: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyamantratantre vidyārājñāṃ cakravarttiprabhṛtīnāṃ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣapramukhānāṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ siddhisthānāni bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:540_2: tatrottarāpathe sarvatra tāthāgatī vidyārājñaḥ siddhiṃ gacchanti saṃkṣepataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.1_1: ye ca tasya mantrā vai siddhiṃ yāsyanti tatra vai //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.3_1: uttarāṃ diśi niḥsṛtya mantrā siddhyanti śreyasāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.4_0: ye ca gītā purā buddhaiḥ adhunā ca pravarttitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.5_1: janapade śreyase bhadre śāntiṃ kartu samārabhe //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.7_1: gāndharvā ye tu mantrā vai siddhisteṣāṃ samoditā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.9_0: lauhityāṃ tu taṭe ramye vaṅgadeśeṣu sarvataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.12_0: sidhyante tatra vai sthāne pūrvadeśe samantataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.18_1: vajrakrauñco mahāvīryaḥ siddhyante tatra vai diśe //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.19_1: siddhyante tatra mantrā vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśimāśritāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.22_1: aśubhaṃ phalaniṣphattiṃ dṛśyate tatra vai diśe //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.23_1: aindrā mantrāḥ prasidhyante paścime diśi śobhane //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.28_1: uttarāyāṃ diśi sidhyante mantrā vai jinasambhavā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.29_0: pūrvadeśe tathā siddhiḥ mantrā vai padmasambhavā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.32_0: kulākhyaṃ teṣu dṛṣṭaṃ vai tatra sthāneṣu sidhyati /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.33_0: kulākhyaṃ bahumataṃ loke siddhisteṣu tatra vai /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.37_1: etat kṣetraṃ tu nirdiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ tat parikīrtyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.43_1: siddhā eva sadā mantrā asiddhā sattvamohitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.45_1: jyeṣṭhaṃ ca buddhaputraṃ taṃ mañjughoṣo mahaujasam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.46_1: yasmiṃ kāle sadā buddhaḥ dhriyante lokanāyakāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.47_0: tasmiṃ kāle tadā siddhiḥ uṣṇīṣādyāṃ prakīrttitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_30.49_2: tasmiṃ kāle bhavet siddhiḥ mantrāṇāṃ sarvabhāṣitāmiti //
S08bsu041_u:544_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:544_1: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ kumārapūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ padaṃ sattvāviṣṭānāṃ caritaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ nimittaṃ ca vakṣye /
S08bsu041_u:545_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ utthāyāsanād bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya murdhnimañjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantametadavocat /
S08bsu041_u:545_1_0: tat sādhu bhagavāṃ vadatu sattvānāṃ parasattvadehasaṅkrāntānāmāryadivya etisiddhagandharvayakṣarākṣasapiśācamahoragaprabhṛtīnāṃ
S08bsu041_u:545_2: yasyedānī kālaṃ manyase / evamukto mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūto tūṣṇīmbhāvena svake āsane tasthuḥ adhyeṣya jinavaraṃ lokanāyakaṃ jinasattamaṃ gautamamiti /
S08bsu041_u:546_0: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ sattvānāṃ cittacaritanimittajñāna cihnaṃ kālaṃ ca bhāṣate sma //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.3_0: vītarāgā tathā nityaṃ kāruṇyāt samayā punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.5_1: rātryāṃ ca prathame yāme sitapakṣeṣu dṛśyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.6_0: praśastā śubhakarmāṇāṃ ye narā dhārmikāḥ sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.8_1: paripūrṇe tathā candre avatāraṃ teṣu dṛśyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.13_0: misṛtaṃ udakaṃ dadyādarghaṃ pādyaṃ tu tatkṣaṇam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.15_0: yathepsaṃ tu tataḥ pṛcche mantrajñe hi viśāradaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.15_1: na bhetavyaṃ tatra kāle tu mañjughoṣaṃ tu saṃsmaret //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.16_1: diśābandhaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā dityūrdhvamadha eva tu //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.19_0: yastenoditā vācā satyaṃ taṃ nānyathā bhavet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.19_1: siddhisādhyaṃ tathā dravyaṃ yoniṃ sa nicayaṃ gatim //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.22_1: tat sarvaṃ labhate kṣipraṃ mantrasiddhiśca kevalā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.23_0: visarjya mantrī tat kṣipramarghaṃ datvā tu sammatām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.24_0: patitaṃ dehamatvā vai śayānaṃ caiva mahītale /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.27_0: rakṣā ca mahatī hyeṣā jantūnāṃ pātrasambhavām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.29_1: tato hīnā gatiścihnā vācā caiva samādhurā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.30_1: vācā kāśipurīṃ teṣāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ ca samāgadhim //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.31_1: pūrvīṃ vācā bhavet teṣāṃ garuḍānāṃ mahaujasām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.32_0: tathā vaṅge samā jātā yā vācā tu pravarttate /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.32_1: kinnarāṇāṃ tathā vācā sā vācā parikalpitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.34_0: ṛṣīṇāṃ tu kāmarūpī tu vācā viśvarūpiṇām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.34_1: pañcābhijñaṃ tu sā vācā ṛṣīṇāṃ parikalpitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.35_0: yā tu sāmā taṭī vācā yā ca vācā harikelikā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.38_0: vācā rakārabahulā tu vācā asphuṭatāṃ gatā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.40_0: ḍakāre rephasaṃyuktā sā vācā rākṣasī smṛtā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.42_1: daśārṇavī cāpi pārvatyā śrīkaṇṭhī cāpi gaurjarī //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.44_1: khaṣadroṇyāṃ tu sambhūte jane vācā tu yādṛśī //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.49_1: vītarāgāṃ tu ye cihnā te cihnā jinasambhavā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.50_0: yatra deśe bhaved vācā tatrasthā gaticeṣṭitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.50_1: tadeva nirdiśet sattvaṃ taccihnaṃ tu sarvataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.52_1: śrīparvate tathā śaile sambhūtā ye ca jantavaḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_31.54_1: tatra deśe tu ye cihnā taddeśe gaticeṣṭitā //

S08bsu041_u:697_0: atha vainateyo buddhādhiṣṭhānena svakīye āsane niṣadya,
S08bsu041_u:698_1: tadyathā - om śakuna mahāśakuna vitatapakṣa sarvapannaganāśaka khakha khāhi khāhi samayamanusmara /
S08bsu041_u:699_2: sarvaviṣakrāmaṇaṃ, vācā manasā buddhyā vā, poṣadhiko trirātroṣitaḥ, śukladvādaśyāṃ nadītīre śucau deśe pañcaraṅgikasūtreṇāṣṭahastaṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:699_3: aṣṭapadmapratiṣṭhitaṃ, tatra madhye bhagavāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ likhet /
S08bsu041_u:699_4: tasya dakṣiṇenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavato mukhamavalokayamānaṃ likhet /
S08bsu041_u:699_5: bhagavato buddhasya vāme nārāyaṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ likhet sarvapraharaṇahastam /
S08bsu041_u:699_8: āryamañjuśriyasya pṛṣṭhataḥ āryākṣayamatiṃ sudhanaṃ subhūtiṃ ca likhet kṛtāñjalipuṭā /
S08bsu041_u:699_10: pūrvadvāre bāhyataḥ śulkabhasmanā vajraṃ samālikhet dakṣiṇena kṛṣṇavarṇikayā khaḍgam uttareṇa pītavarṇikayā gadaṃ likhet /
S08bsu041_u:700_7: arghyo deyaḥ / evaṃ siddhirbhavati / [Vaidya_358] svamantramāvartya vadet - mama siddhiṃ vidhāya gacchata /
S08bsu041_u:700_8: tato gacchanti / tato visarjya mūlamantreṇaiva samabhyukṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:700_9: tataḥ karmaṃ samārabhet / sarvaṃ ca balidravyamapsu kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:701_0: vidveṣaṇaṃ kartukāmaḥ sarpāsthīni viṣāktāmekaviṃśatyāhutiṃ juhuyāt / vidveṣo bhavati //
S08bsu041_u:702_2: strīpuruṣavaśīkaraṇe sarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāmekaviṃśatyāhutiṃ juhuyād vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:702_3: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vaśīkaraṇe paramānnasya ghṛtāktasya ekaviṃśatyāhuti juhuyād vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:702_4: loṣṭakamabhimantrya, agnau prakṣipet na tapati / tṛṇena mokṣaḥ / uktena matsyā na badhyanti / cetanamacetanaṃ vā sattvaṃ choṭikayā ākarṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:702_7: apāvṛtaṃ bhavati / tameva daṇḍaṃ nīlapaṭaprāvṛtaṃ gṛhya saṅgrāme gacchet,
S08bsu041_u:702_11: yasya nāmaṃ gṛhya karoti, sa mūko bhavati / gaṇḍaviṣaṃ sakṛjjaptena udakena hanet /
S08bsu041_u:702_12: gaṇḍaṃ saṅkucati / patati ca paravidyā / anena badhnīta / tathaiva mokṣayati / iṣṭakamabhimantrya māvarttya japet /
S08bsu041_u:702_18: yāvaddiśaṃ kṣipati; tatra aśanaṃ saṅkrāmati / agnidāhepyeṣa eva vidhiḥ / udakamavataraṇamevaṃ kartavyam /
S08bsu041_u:702_19: nāgānutsārayati / mṛnmayaṃ sarpaṃ kṛtvā yamicchati taṃ daśāpayati /
S08bsu041_u:702_21: punarapi mokṣayati / sarṣapān saptajaptān caturdiśaṃ kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:702_22: sarpā āgacchanti / maṇḍalabandhaḥ kāryaḥ / pānīyenābhyukṣya visarjayet /
S08bsu041_u:702_23: udakena mokṣaṇaṃ leṣṭunā nāgākārṣaṇaṃ pāṃsu parijapya udake kṣipet;
S08bsu041_u:702_24: nirviṣa bhavanti / dhanuṃ gṛhya alohāścatvāraḥ śarāḥ caturdiśaṃ kṣeptavyā /
S08bsu041_u:702_26: sa ca nāgo vaktavyaḥ / viṣaṃ pratipibeti / pibati daṣṭakottiṣṭhati / atha sarpāṇi śallayituṃ pānīye pānīyenābhyukṣya tasya tasya śarāḥ patanti /
S08bsu041_u:702_27: sarpaścākṣato bhavati / valmīkamṛttikayā cattvāro nakulā kartavyā /
S08bsu041_u:702_31: pibanti mṛtaka uttiṣṭhati / aṅgāramabhimantrya, rekhāṃ kṛtvā, arkalatayā tāḍayet; tataḥ sarpo vadhyairākṛṣyamāṇo āgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:702_32: viṣaṃ pratipibeti pibati / daṣṭako nirviṣo bhavati / dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vābhimantrayet /
S08bsu041_u:702_33: yāvanto mṛtakāḥ viṣapītakāśca sarve nirīkṣya nirviṣā bhavanti vāditramabhimantrya vādayet /
S08bsu041_u:702_34: śrutvā nirviṣā bhavanti / pāṃsunā pañcaraṅgikeṇa maṇḍalamālikhya tālaśabdaṃ dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:702_36: te maṇḍalaṃ praviśanti / na bhetavyam / śikhābandhamātmarakṣāṃ ca kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:702_38: tatkṣaṇādeva patati / sarpa [Vaidya_359] iva rūpeṇa kurute /
S08bsu041_u:702_39: mukte mokṣaḥ / evaṃ vācayā daṣṭamadaṣṭaṃ vā veśayati mokṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:702_40: viṣṇunirmālyamabhimantrya yatra rathyāyāṃ gṛhe vā kṣipati,
S08bsu041_u:702_47: udakenāpi vyajanenāpi manasā siddhirmantramāvartya bhūmau pāṃsuṃ dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:702_48: mṛtaka uttiṣṭhati / mahāmāṃsa ghṛtena saha dhūpaḥ puṣṭikaraṇam /
S08bsu041_u:702_53: kapālacūrṇamadhūkacūrṇaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā madhunā saha dhūpaḥ utsādane /
S08bsu041_u:702_55: gopittaṃ mānuṣāsthi ca ghṛtena śatrormāraṇe dhūpaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.2_1: eṣa praviśatasya dhūpo deyaḥ akārṣaṇamataḥ param //
S08bsu041_u:703_0: ghṛtagugguluṃ dadyāt / dhūpo roganāśanam / tilasarṣapairdhūpaṃ datvā tānyeva juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:703_3: mahāpuruṣavaśīkaraṇam / kapālacūrṇaṃ sahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yamicchati taṃ cūrṇena saṃspṛśya vaśamānayati /
S08bsu041_u:703_4: śmaśānabhasmasahitena yaṃ cūrṇayati taṃ jvareṇa gṛhṇāpayati mokṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:703_5: nakularomāṇi sarṣapāṇi ca sarpanirmokaṃ yasya nāmnā dhūpo dahati sa sarvalokavidviṣṭo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:703_6: tilairvaśīkaraṇaṃ, arthotpādanāni ca kurute / tilataṇḍulairghṛtāktairnārī vaśamānayati /
S08bsu041_u:703_8: devāṃ varṣāpayati / mṛṇmayaṃ garuḍaṃ kṛtvā karasampuṭena gṛhya aṃsamātramudakamavatīrya arddharātraṃ japet,
S08bsu041_u:703_10: śmaśāne taṇḍunāṃ prakīrya devahṛdayaṃ sthāpya praharaṇaṃ japet vṛttiṃ kalpayati,
S08bsu041_u:703_15: śatapuṣpā devadāruṃ purīṣaṃ maṇḍūkaṃ caṭakasya dhūpo vaśyārthaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:703_16: yavāstilā dūrvā ca gomūtreṇa dhūpo vaśīkaraṇe /
S08bsu041_u:703_17: haritālaṃ kākajihvā ca śoṇitena dhūpaḥ mūkīkaraṇe /
S08bsu041_u:703_22: ājñākaro bhavati / turuṣkaṃ [Vaidya_360] candanaṃ karpūreṇa saha añjanaṃ rājavaśīkaraṇam /
S08bsu041_u:703_23: pūjābalividhānaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇupratimāyā agrataḥ upariṣṭānmahāmāṃsāhutīnaṣṭau hutvāṣṭasahasraṃ japet trirātram,
S08bsu041_u:703_24: dravyaṃ yamicchati / śmaśānabhasmanā pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā mahāmāṃsadhūpaṃ dattvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ japet rātrau śmaśāne,
S08bsu041_u:703_25: yamicchati tamānayati / ājñāṃ karoti / uccāṭane karpāsātuṣāṃ juhuyāt kākapakṣaiḥ kṣaṇāduccāṭano bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:703_26: śmaśāna udumbarasamidhābhiragniṃ prajvālya kapālopaviṣṭaḥ sarpakañcukaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:703_27: annamakṣayaṃ bhavati / śmaśānāsthicūrṇaṃ sarṣapasahitamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt yasya nāmnā,
S08bsu041_u:703_28_0: sa yojanaśatādāgacchati / sarvakāmeṣu kartavyaḥ / devo śvetacandanena vitatapakṣa
S08bsu041_u:703_28_1: sarvanāgābharaṇaṃ tīkṣṇaghoraṃ vikṛtānanaṃ vikṛtanakhaṃ padmopaviṣṭaṃ adhodattadṛṣṭiṃ
S08bsu041_u:703_28_2: nimnataraṃ kāṣṭhe kuṭye bhittau vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa kārāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:703_30: palāśe puṣṭikāmena, bailvaṃ vaśyārthahetunā, udumbaraṃ ca putrakāmāya, gokāmaḥ śirīṣamayaṃ madhukaṃ vā dravyakāmaḥ kārayed vidhivat /
S08bsu041_u:703_31: sūkaramāṃsena phalakāmam / aśvamāṃsenāpatyaṃ bhavati / kṛṣṇasāramāṃsena śriyārthī, pṛthutamānukīrtikāmo vā strīkāmaḥ pṛthivīkāmo vā,
S08bsu041_u:703_32: vyāghramāṃsaṃ vyavahāradivijayārthī mahāmāṃsam vastrārthī hastibalā rājavaśikaraṇe atibalā rājāmātyavaśīkaraṇe aśvagandhāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:703_33: utsāde hastiromāṇi, picumardamabhicāre tu ete kāṣṭhā proktāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:704_1: rajatādīṃ kīrtivṛddhaye / kākapakṣahomenotsādayati / gṛdhrapakṣairmārayati / kauśikapakṣairvidveṣayati / mayūrapakṣairvidveṣayati / mayūrapakṣairdhanāni dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:704_3_1: ābhicāruke mahāmāṃsena, śāntike mṛgaromāṇi kanyārthī ulūkaromāṇi deśaghātecchā galaromāṇi
S08bsu041_u:704_3_2: vidveṣaṇe mānuṣaromāṇi ābhicāruke mānuṣyaromāṇi śatrunāśane sarveṣveva teṣu trisandhyaṃ
S08bsu041_u:704_6: yo mama bhagavaṃ asmiṃ kalparāje mantraṃ sādhayamānaḥ trisandhyamudīrayiṣyati,
S08bsu041_u:705_0: atha tasmin samaye svarūpamudrāṃ bhāvayati sma /
S08bsu041_u:705_1: aṅguṣṭhau parasparaveṣṭitau kṛtvā śeṣāṅgulyo pakṣavat saṃsthitā syād /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.6_0: aṅguṣṭhau madhyataḥ sthāpya niṣpīḍyāṅgulyaṃ tu yatnataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.11_1: te vai mantramukhye tu prayoktavyāḥ karmavistare //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.12_0: iha kalpavare mūle pratiṣṭhā kṣmātalena te /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.20_0: eṣa devo mahātmā vai mahādeveti kīrtyate /
S08bsu041_u:707_2: trailokyagurūṇāmacintyādbhutarūpiṇām / śivodbhavodbhava bhuvanatrayapūjitāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.28_1: diṅmandirāśrayā ye ca vidikṣu ścāpi cāriṇaḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.32_0: yatrasthā ye 'tra nāgā vai ye tu bhūtagaṇāśrayā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.32_1: vicitrarūpiṇo ye vā tataḥ sthā ye samāgatā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.42_1: caritaṃ cāpi bhūtānāṃ rutaṃ cāpi japet sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.43_1: mañjuśriyaṃ tathā nityaṃ sarvāṃ buddhasutān tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_41.43_2: uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ pakṣirāṭ sa mahābalaḥ //
S08bsu041_u:711_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya,
S08bsu041_u:711_2: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyasarvasādhanopayikamaṇḍalavidhāne sarvamantratantreṣu mudrāpaṭalasamayarahasyam yaiḥ sarvasantrāsamayaṃ nātikramanti,
S08bsu041_u:711_4: yairvinā na śakyante sarvamantrā ārādhayituṃ sādhayitum /
S08bsu041_u:711_6_0: etarhi ahaṃ ca bhāṣiṣye sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.1_1: yathā tathā svayaṃ vācyaṃ purā gītamṛṣisattamaiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.8_0: maṇḍale bhuvi martyānāṃ daridrā vātha duḥkhitām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.8_1: ālikhantānāṃ bhuvi mudrāṇāṃ sānnidhyaṃ vo bhaviṣyatha //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.9_1: śrāvakānāṃ tu ye mudrāḥ kathitā munivaraiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.11_0: yat pūrvaṃ kathitaṃ mantraṃ sarvaṃ maṇḍale ca karmasu /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.11_1: sthānaṃ homo japaḥ karma taṃ tathaiva prayojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.14_0: eṣa mudro mahāmudro buddhānāṃ mūrddhajo varaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.19_0: tadante kuṇḍalau jñeyau bhūṣālau śobhanau tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.27_0: buddhamudre tu vāme vai padmo lokeśasambhavaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.36_0: yo yasya maṇḍale mantraḥ saṃyoktā lokaviśrute /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.37_0: tanmadhye maṇḍale cāpi rūpakaṃ mudrameva vā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.45_0: tatottare tu tathā rekhe brahmaṇaḥ padmajodbhava /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.50_1: taṃ tathaiva tathā mudro nirdiṣṭo lokapūjitaiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_42.52_1: ālekhya tu bhuvi marttyaistu jāpibhiḥ siddhikāmadaiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:713_0: bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt catvāriṃśatimaḥ mahākalparājavisarāt sarvakarmasādhanopayikaḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:716_2_0: asti mañjuśrīḥ tvadīye maṇḍalavidhāne sarvakarmeṣu sarvatantramantreṣu āhvānana visarjana
S08bsu041_u:716_2_1: japa niyama homa sādhana rakṣāvidhānādiṣu sarvakarmeṣu mahāmudraṃ eka eva mahāvīramasaṅkhyeyeṣu
S08bsu041_u:716_2_2: sabuddhakoṭibhāṣitaṃ cābhyanumoditaṃ ca katamaṃ ca tat /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_43.3_1: śivaṃ śāntaṃ tathā jyeṣṭhaṃ śītībhūtaṃ parāyaṇam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_43.5_0: ūrjitaṃ ca tridhā divyaṃ bhaumadivyā yeṣvapi /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_43.10_0: punarnayati tāṃ lokaṃ punarnāśayate hi tām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_43.31_0: navārisrute śuce śauce ubhe haste 'tha pūjite /
S08bsu041_u:720_0_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya sarvatathāgatadharmavarotvacintyaguṇavyūhālaṅkārabhūtakoṭiniṣṭhāsaṅkhyeyajinamudrāmudritaṃ
S08bsu041_u:720_1: yathā yathā sādhyate tathā tathā sādhayate /
S08bsu041_u:720_3: pūrvaṃ bhāṣitavāṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ bhāṣiṣyante 'nāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:720_6: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru mañjurava manojñapratibhānavāṃ vakṣye 'haṃ vakṣye 'hamiti /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.5_1: nāmnā samantabhadro vai ityuvāca girāṃ varām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.6_1: śākyasya kulajo dakṣaḥ śrīmāṃ buddho nirīkṣyate //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.11_1: kathaṃ tu sarvamantrā vai siddhyanti japināṃ dhruvam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.12_0: kathaṃ vai hyavikalpena amoghān gacchanti prāṇinām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.15_0: daśabhūmyāśritā ye ca saugate vartmani sthitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.18_1: anāgataṃ ca yathātatthyaṃ nidarśanaṃ cāpi varṇitam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.19_1: siddhiṃ cāpi tathā kṣipraṃ dadyānmudraiśca pūjitāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.21_1: laukikā ye ca mantrā vai tathā lokottarā pare //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.22_0: ye ca siddhāstathā yakṣā gandharvā matha kinnarā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.22_1: asurā surā sadā sattvā sarvasattvā tridhā sthitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.24_0: siddhiṃ gaccheyu tat kṣipraṃ imairmudraiḥ sumudritā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.28_0: pūraṇārthaṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ mudrāṇāṃ ca maharddhikam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.28_1: sarveṣāṃ lokottarāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ laukikānāṃ ca sarvadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.29_0: mañjughoṣasya tantre tu agrā hyagratamā matā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.30_1: ādau hastau tha kṛtvā vai suṣirākārasampuṭau //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.32_1: mudrā evacīrā tu mūrdhni sthāneṣu yojitā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.34_2: śiraḥsthāne sadā nyastā mudrā śiravarā bhavet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.35_1: mahāvīrā tu sā jñeyā mahāmudrā maharddhikā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.37_1: lokottarāṃ tu sarvā vai laukikānāṃ ca sarvataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.38_1: susiddhā siddhatamā hyetā agrā jyeṣṭhāśca bhāṣitā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.41_1: sadā yajñaṃ prājñayuktaṃ ca vidhivat karmamācaret //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.42_1: mudreyaṃ kurute hyarthāṃ yatheṣṭā cāpi puṣkalām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.45_0: sarveṣāṃ tu mudrāṇāṃ tridhā mantreṣu yojitām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.45_1: agrā hyagratamā loke ete mudrā prabhāvataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_44.47_1: yasmiṃ sthāne tu vaścaitāḥ svayaṃ mañjuravaḥ sadā //

S08bsu041_u:750_3: madhye sārthavāhaśca mudrāmaṇḍalākāraṃ induvarṇābhaṃ pūrvottare koṇe jayā mudrā ardhacandrākārasitaṃ dakṣiṇapūrvakoṇe vijayā mudrā tṛkoṇākāraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ,
S08bsu041_u:750_4: paścimadakṣiṇakoṇe ajitāyā mudraṃ bandhākāraṃ raktāvabhāsaṃ uttarapaścimakoṇe aparājitāyā mudraṃ vajrākāraṃ kṛṣṇanirbhāsaṃ sarvataśca mudrāṇāṃ jvālāmālinaḥ karttavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:751_0: pūrvavacaukṣasamācāreṇa bhūtvā catuḥkoṇa catvāraḥ pūrṇakalaśāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ āmrapallavapracchāditamukhāḥ sarvavrīhiratnaparipūrṇagarbhāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:751_1: madhye tu sārthavāhasya tumbureḥ pañcamaṃ kalaśaṃ tathaivāmrapallavapracchāditamukhaṃ pratyagravastrāvakuṇṭhitāśca kāryāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:751_2: tacca tathaiva balinivedyapuṣpādayo yathā mudrāstathaiva kāryā /
S08bsu041_u:751_3: tadvarṇaśca pūṣpadhūpagandhādayaḥ tat sarvaṃ tathaiva kāryam /
S08bsu041_u:751_5: ardharātre madhyāhne cābhicāruke pratyūṣe pauṣṭike aparāhne śāntikamastaṃ gate vā savitari karmatrayaṃ cāpi yathākālopadiṣṭamaṇḍalahomajapasādhaneṣu prayoktavyam /
S08bsu041_u:752_0: śucino dakṣaśīlāścaṃ strīpuruṣādayaḥ avyathitāśca praveśayitavyāḥ saradārikāśca guhyamantradhāriṇo ādau praveśayitavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:752_1: prāṅmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā vijayāyā mūlamantreṇodakamabhimantrya saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā sarveṣāmabhyaṣiñcet /
S08bsu041_u:752_2_0: sakṛdahorātroṣitānāṃ śucivastraprāvṛtānāmaṣṭau prabhṛti yāvadekaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ paścāddvāreṇa
S08bsu041_u:752_2_1: praveśayet pratyagramukhapracchāditāṃ kṛtvā ekaikaṃ vijayāyā mudraṃ baddhvā añjaliṃ
S08bsu041_u:752_3: vijayāyā mantraṃ kṛtvā mukhamutsādya maṇḍalaṃ darśāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:752_4: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kārāpayet / sarveṣāṃ mudrāṃ darśayet / tato 'nupūrvataḥ sarve praveśayitavyā yāvadaṣṭāviti /
S08bsu041_u:753_0: pūrvaṃ tāvad devīnāmāhvānanamantreṇa bhrātṛsahitānāṃ mūlamantreṇa yathocittaiḥ puṣpairāvāhayet /
S08bsu041_u:753_1_0: pūrvaṃ paścād dhūpaṃ datvā yathocitaṃ namaskāraṃ kṛtvā yatrotsahate śiṣyaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā
S08bsu041_u:753_1_1: vā sa tasmiṃ maṇḍale bahirabhiṣecayitavyaḥ rājavat sarvopakaraṇaiḥ yathābhirucitairvā
S08bsu041_u:753_1_2: mantraṃ maṇḍalācāryasya tuṣṭiryena vā tuṣyeta tayābhiṣecayet /
S08bsu041_u:753_2: abhiṣicya ca eka vā trayo vā abhiṣecanīyaḥ āryābhiṣekeṇa /
S08bsu041_u:753_3_0: ekaṃ ca vaktavyam / śṛṇu kulaputrakuladuhiturvā labdhābhiṣekastvamanujñātaḥ sarvadevatābhiśca
S08bsu041_u:753_3_1: sabhrātṛsahitaiśca svamantratantreṣu yatheṣṭaṃ maṇḍalamālikhya svamantrāṇāṃ vidhiniyamacaryākalpavistarāṃ
S08bsu041_u:753_5: dvitrayo vā janāḥ / śeṣāstu svamantracaryāyāḥ śikṣāpayitvā visarjayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:754_1: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa candanodakenābhyukṣya arghaṃ dattvā svamantreṇaiva dhūpapuṣpādibhiḥ devatāṃ visarjayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:754_3: gṛhya ca svaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ tritīyabhāgaṃ sarvamanāthebhyo dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:754_4: śeṣamudake plāvayitavyam / taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ suliptaṃ kṛtvā suśobhitaṃ vigatarajaskaṃ yatheṣṭayo gantavyam /
S08bsu041_u:754_6: sarve śiṣyāḥ pracchanne rahasi vigatajanasampāte svadevatāmudrāṃśca bandhāpayitavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:754_7: taireva mantraiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairmantraiḥ suviśeṣataḥ sarvamantrā siddhiṃ gacchantīti /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.16_0: tathaiva mudrāṃ sarvatraṃ bhīmāṃ caiva viyojayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.17_1: tathaiva mukhaveṣṭaṃ vā raktacchatraṃ tathaiva ca //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.18_0: āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ raktaṃ caiva samālabhet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.25_0: striyaṃ vā yadi vā puṃsaṃ dārakaṃ vātha dārikām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.28_0: sādhyamānā hi siddhyante sarve māheśvarā gaṇāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.31_0: jyeṣṭhamaṣṭastathā hastaṃ sapta ṣaṭ pañca madhyamāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.32_0: jyeṣṭhe śāntikaṃ kuryā tathā madhye tu pauṣṭikam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.36_0: aparājitā tu devyā vai praṇamya jinavarātmajam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.41_1: tathaiva tat kuryāt sarvaṃ varjayitvā tu varṇato //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.43_0: madhyasthe savasṛje deśe tatrasthe tu mahītale /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.44_1: tat sarvaṃ kṣiprato mantrī sarvaṃ caiva niyojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.48_0: ālikhya maṇḍale hyatra kṛṣṇavarṇā tu bhūtale /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.49_1: tat sarvaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā paścāt karma samārabhet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.54_0: tantre tu sarvato mantraiḥ kravyādaistu sakaśmalaiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.55_1: tumburākhyaṃ vāmato martyāṃ vajradhṛk taṃ nibodhatām //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.59_1: pracchanne rahasi visrabdhe svagṛhe vāvavarake 'pi ca //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.66_0: tat sarvamālikhed dhīmāṃ mantraṃ yatnāddhi cetasā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.69_0: ālikhet sarvato mantrī catuḥkoṇe tu sarvataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.75_0: yathaiva maṇḍale sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ ālikhet paṭe /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.76_1: punnāgaṃ caiva mantrajñaiḥ nityaṃ pratimāsu yojayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.77_1: saralaṃ devadāruṃ ca kāśmīraṃ caiva saghaṇṭakam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.80_0: vakulaṃ tilakaṃ caiva kāṣṭhaṃ saptacchadaṃ tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.82_2: aśvatthe śāntikaṃ vindyāt kāṣṭhe cāpi mahītale //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.90_0: diśāṃ ca sarvato mantrī yatheṣṭaṃ vā karma samārabhet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.94_0: dīrghaśo vitastimātraṃ vā nāvaṃ caiva sukārayet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.95_0: jayā kārayed dhīmān tumburuṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.96_0: aparājitā kṛṣṇavarṇā vai śuklāṃ caiva anāmikām /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.97_1: ajitā saumyaveśā tu kartavya tha sarvataḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.100_0: raupyaṃ tāmramayīṃ vāpi pratimā khyātā vaśāvahā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_48.100_1: ākarṣaṇaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ kāṃsī hyuktā mahītale //
S08bsu041_u:757_0: atha tumburuḥ sārthavāhaḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhanavidhānaṃ samācakṣate sāmānyataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:757_1: dantamayīṃ pratimāṃ kṛtvā devīnāṃ kanyasāṅgulipramāṇāmatigupte pradeśe āhūya mūlamantraiḥ vāmahastena dhūpaṃ datvā jayāyā mūlamantraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:757_2: aṣṭasahasramaṣṭaśataṃ vā japaṃ kṛtvā yanmanīṣitaṃ tat sarvaṃ svapne kathayati /
S08bsu041_u:757_6: yatheṣṭaṃ vā sattvavaśīkaraṇe uttamasādhanādiṣu karmāṇi nimittāni darśayati /
S08bsu041_u:757_10: yāmicchati rājakanyāṃ mahādhanopetāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇīṃ tāṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:757_11: jātīpuṣpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kusumaiḥ pratimā ekaikā āhantavyā trisandhyaṃ saptadivasāni aṣṭaśati /
S08bsu041_u:757_15: ūrumadhye saṃnyaset / paramasaubhāgyaṃ labhate / gṛhītvādhvānaṃ vajret / corairna muṣyate / parabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā stambhayati /
S08bsu041_u:757_16: saṅgrāmamavataret / śastrairna hanyate / ariṃ mohayati / parasainyaṃ hasttyaśvarathaparyaṭatīṃ stambhayati /
S08bsu041_u:757_19: gorocanāmabhimantrya ātmavaktre tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ prekṣati so 'sya vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:757_21_1: sarvopakaraṇaviśeṣāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā ātmanā parairvā kārāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:757_23_0: māṣajambulikāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā pracchanne sthāne devīnāmagrataḥ agnauḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ
S08bsu041_u:757_23_1: juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ sapta divasāni sarve raṇḍāḥ sarve ḍākinyaḥ sarve bhūtagrahāḥ
S08bsu041_u:757_24: kiṅkarānuvartino yojanaśatagamanāgamane ca gomūtreṇa piṣṭvā pūrvāhe piṇḍārakabandakaṃ āmrabandakaṃ ca gṛhya sahasrasampāditaṃ kṛtvā pādaṃ lepayet /
S08bsu041_u:757_25: divyodakena jyeṣṭhodakena vā sarvakarmasu yojya sarvapūjiteṣu ca kalpeṣu paramantravidhānenāpi /
S08bsu041_u:757_26: kintvaya viśeṣaḥ / yatra maṇḍale sārthavāhasya tumbururbhagavāṃ dharmasvāmī buddhaḥ sarvasattvānāmagraḥ śākyamunirabhilikhitaḥ tasmiṃ maṇḍale dṛṣṭasamayasya karmāṇi kartavyāni /
S08bsu041_u:758_0_1: suvarṇarūpyamayairvā pratimāṃ kṛtvā devīnāṃ kanyasāṅgulapramāṇā yavaphalamātraṃ vā
S08bsu041_u:758_0_2: muktāphalaṃ vā pratimāṃ kṛtvā nauyānasamārūḍhā caturbhaginīnāṃ sabhrātṛsahitānāmantaśaḥ
S08bsu041_u:758_0_3: pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad yathābharaṇapraharaṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ devīnāṃ śucau deśe candanakuṅkumakarpūrodakābhyaṣikte
S08bsu041_u:758_0_4: taireva maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā atigupte sthāne mārgaśīrṣamāse kārttikapūrṇamāsyāṃ vā anye
S08bsu041_u:758_0_5: vā sitapakṣe prātihārakakusumāgame anye vā śukle 'hani praśaste tithau candrabhārgavavāre
S08bsu041_u:758_0_6: rohiṇīrevatyanurādhājyeṣṭhanakṣatrā bhikṣāhāreṇa udakasaktavāhāreṇa vā haviḥ phalabhakṣaṇe
S08bsu041_u:758_0_7: vā mocāmraphalasanālikeraiḥ pūrvaṃ jayāyāḥ akṣaralakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:758_1: japtā kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tathāgatabimbodayamaṇḍalaṃ tumbururdṛṣṭvā kṛtarakṣaḥ śuklāmbaradharaḥ sragvī mālatīkusumāvabaddhaśiraskaḥ ahorātroṣito bhūtvā sādhanamāviśet /
S08bsu041_u:758_2: pūrvavadarghaṃ kṛtvā jātīkusumaughaṃ mahākṛpāpiṇḍītagaranāgakesarapunnāgairvā eteṣāmanyatamena navairvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mālatīkusumānāṃ pañca pañca gṛhītvā devīnāṃ tāḍayet /
S08bsu041_u:759_1: ubhāvapyetau mahādevyau svamantrayonijau sarvakarmāṇi kurvanti pūrvavat /
S08bsu041_u:759_2: kintu eteṣāmayaṃ viśeṣaḥ / vijayāyāḥ pītapuṣpaiḥ ajitāyāḥ raktapuṣpaiḥ [Vaidya_422] tadvarṇaiścopakaraṇaviśaiṣaiḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayet /
S08bsu041_u:759_3_0: vijayāpyevamāhuḥ / pratimā pītaraktā kāryā / pūrvavat tathāgatamaṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tumburoḥ
S08bsu041_u:759_3_1: sārthavāhasya ajitāyāstāmramayī raktacandanamayīṃ vā mama kalpe tu rūpyarāgamayī
S08bsu041_u:759_6: vijayā ajitā ca / yathābhilaṣitamanasepsitaṃ sarvakarmāṇi sādhaya iti /
S08bsu041_u:760_0: aparājitā evamāha / ahamapi kalpaṃ bhāṣe / yanmayoditaṃ maṇḍale 'smiṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva kartavyaṃ svamantreṇaiva /
S08bsu041_u:760_1: śmaśa nāṅgāreṇa śmaśānabhasmenā vā devīnāṃ pratimāṃ likhya kṛṣṇapuṣpairabhyarcya śatrornāmaṃ gṛhya japet guhye pradeśe śmaśāne vā /
S08bsu041_u:760_2: tatkṣaṇānmṛyate / unmattako vā bhavati / apasmāreṇa vā gṛhyati / gotrotsādanaṃ vā karoti / sādhakasyecchayā tatraiva śmaśāne mahāmāṃsaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:760_3: arīn nāśayati stambhayati śoṣayati mahārākṣasena gṛhṇāpayati gotrotsādaṃ vā karoti sādhakasyecchayā /
S08bsu041_u:760_8: ayatnenaiva śmaśānāṅgāraṃ gṛhya caṇḍālakapāle nāmamālikhet pratibimbaṃ vā striyaḥ puruṣasya vā likhet /
S08bsu041_u:760_9: tatkṣaṇādeva sandhyanti / bhage 'ṅguliṃ datvā ca pratibimbe kapālasthe tatkṣaṇād dahyamānā strī āgacchati yojanaśatādapi /
S08bsu041_u:761_1: tad vadatu bhagavāṃ dharmasvāmī buddho svamantraṃ ca /
S08bsu041_u:761_2: yā cāsmākamanukampārthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca hitāya sukhāya svamantracaryāt /
S08bsu041_u:762_0: atha bhagavāṃ tathāgataḥ śākyādhirājatanayaḥ tāṃ kanyāṃmīṣadavalokya bhrātṛsahitāmimāṃ vācamudīrayanti sma /
S08bsu041_u:762_1: na yūyaṃ kanyakā bhrātṛpañcamā tathāgatasya guṇamahātmyaṃ mantracaryāprabhāvaṃ śrotuṃ caryāṃ vā pratipadyetum /
S08bsu041_u:762_2: ko 'nya sadevake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ śrotuṃ caryāṃ vā pratipadyetum /
S08bsu041_u:762_3_1: ko 'nyaṃ śaktaḥ śrotuṃ jñātuṃ vā nirdeśaṃ mantracaryāsamanupraveśamācakṣituṃ sarvasattvānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:762_4: varjayitvā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyak sambuddhānāṃ tatpratipannānāṃ ca sattvānāmutpāditavodhicittānām /
S08bsu041_u:762_5: na yūyaṃ kanyakāḥ śakyatha / tena hi bodhicittamutpādayadhvam /
S08bsu041_u:763_0: evamuktvā tāḥ kanyakāḥ tṛśaraṇaparigṛhītāḥ utpāditabodhicittāśca niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya tūṣṇīmbhūtā iti /
S08bsu041_u:766_2_0: atha tā devatā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ sarvāṃśca bodhisattvāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca
S08bsu041_u:766_2_1: triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ sthitāḥ abhūvaṃ
S08bsu041_u:766_3: bhāṣante sma svamudrāṇāṃ cauṣadhyo yathābhimataṃ bhāṣante sma /
S08bsu041_u:766_4: anujñātā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena sattvānāmarthāya sarvamudrāmantrapaṭalavisaraṃ bhāṣate sma svakaṃ svakaṃ mudrāpaṭalamoṣadhīnāṃ ca kalpaṃ bhāṣante sma /
S08bsu041_u:767_0_0: tumburuḥ sārthavāho evamāha - ādau tāvad gandhena hastāvudvartya candanamiśreṇa vānyairvā
S08bsu041_u:767_0_1: sugandhajātibhirdevīnāmagrataḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitvodaṅmukho vā vāmahastena dakṣiṇahastāṅguṣṭhaṃ
S08bsu041_u:767_0_2: muṣṭiyogena gṛhītvā avasavyena bhrāmayitvā nābhideśe sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:767_2: eṣa bhagavaṃ tumbureḥ sārthavāhasya samayamudrā mama /
S08bsu041_u:767_3: tadeva hastau karmārthasādhakā vāmahastenāṅguṣṭhamabhyantare prakṣipya dṛḍhaṃ pragṛhya muṣṭiyogena nābhideśe nyaset /
S08bsu041_u:767_4: eṣa bhagavaṃ mama jayāyā mudrā sarvakarmakarā /
S08bsu041_u:767_7: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ dvitīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya paścimāṃ diśi māvarjayet /
S08bsu041_u:767_8: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ sarvaduṣṭā nāgāṃ stambhayati nirviṣīkaraṇe ca prayoktavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:767_9: tṛtīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya uttarāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet sarvayakṣayakṣīkinnaramahoragakūṣmāṇḍāśca vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:767_12: caturthamaṅguliṃ vikāsya abhyantarasthitamaṅguṣṭhaṃ saṅkocya hastatale pūrvāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet /
S08bsu041_u:767_13: sarve devā vaśyā bhavanti / devānāmagrataḥ prāṅmukho bhūtvā darśayet /
S08bsu041_u:767_14: sarvabhūtā vaśyā bhavanti / sarvasattvānāṃ ca priyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:767_16: dvau hastau saṃyamya sarvamaṅguliṃ vikāsya añjalyākāreṇa mūrdhanyāspṛśet /
S08bsu041_u:767_17: ūrdhvamadhaścāvalokayet / ābrahmastambaparyantāt / adhaśca rasātalam / sarvadevadānavāṃ vaśamānayati /
