S08bsu041_u:789_0_1: dharmadhātunirahāratāṃ ca pratipapadyante buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarva eva dharmadeśanāsattvopāyapāyakāṃ
S08bsu041_u:789_2_0: yaduta tvavinayanāya sattvapākānuśāsanāya ca tatrabhavanto jinaputrāḥ yo 'yaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamahāsamayopaviṣṭāḥ
S08bsu041_u:789_2_1: tatra sarvaiḥ samagraiḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ ya eva kuśalākuśalagaveṣaṇairbhavitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:790_1: atha śāntamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vajrapāṇiṃ yakṣasenāpatiṃ vyavalokya tṛṣṇāmbhūtaḥ svake āsane niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S08bsu041_u:790_2: acintyā buddhadharmā iti manasikṛtya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:791_0: atha vajrapāṇirguhyakādhipatiḥ sarvaṃ tat parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhūyaḥ krodharājasya kalpaṃ bhāṣate sma /
S08bsu041_u:791_1_0: śṛṇvantu bhavanto devasaṅghāḥ ye sattvadhātunisṛtāśca sarve bhūtagaṇāḥ ādau tāvat
S08bsu041_u:791_1_1: kṛtarakṣaḥ taṃ paṭaṃ krodharājasya parigṛhya viveke sthāne sattvā ekaliṅge maheśvarasyāyatane
S08bsu041_u:791_1_3: ātmanā yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣaśirakapālena dakṣiṇahastena saprahāro bhūtvā vāmahastena
S08bsu041_u:791_1_6: pithayitvā nagnako muktaśikhaḥ maheśvaraliṅgaṃ vāmapādenākramya krodhamantraṃ tāvajjapet
S08bsu041_u:791_1_7: yāvanmaheśvaraliṅgo madhye sphuṭita iti dvividalībhūtaṃ mahāṃśca huṅkāraḥ śrūyate /
S08bsu041_u:791_2: tato na bhetavyam / tadeho eva duṣṭarājñaḥ anyo vā yaḥkaścinmahāyakṣaḥ aristatkṣaṇādeva jvareṇa gṛhyate /
S08bsu041_u:791_4: tatraiva muhūrtaṃ japed yāvat kṣaṇādeva śatrorjīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:792_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / madhyāhne tathaiva maheśvarāyatanaṃ gatvā nimbapatrairabhyarcya mahāmāṃsadhūpaṃ dattvā mantraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:792_3: yadi jāpaṃ na tyajate kruddho vā dakṣiṇamūrtaistiṣṭhate sa śatrurmṛyate gotrotsādo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:792_4: atha pratyāyanaṃ karoti / bhūyo liṅgamudakena prakṣālya suśītalena kṣīreṇa snāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:793_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / maheśvaraliṅgasya dakṣiṇāmūrttau madanakaṇṭakakaṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vaikaṅkatasamidhānāṃ viṣarudhirarājikābhyaktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:793_3: dvitīye divase mahājvareṇa mahāśūlena vā gṛhyante vividhairvā rogaiḥ amānuṣairvā māraṇāntikaiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:793_4: tṛtīye divase tṛbhiḥ sandhyaiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitaṃ tyajante /
S08bsu041_u:793_5: pratyāyane kṣīraṃ juhuyāt / śāntirbhavati / sarvajanapadeṣu sarvaśatravaśca svasthā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:793_6: evaṃ sarvadevānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yo yasya devatābhaktaḥ tamākramya kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:793_7: tasya nakṣatramantrasaṃjñatāṃ pādenākramya vāmena karma kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:793_9: sarveṣāṃ ca pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ vāmena gṛhītvā karma kuryānna cākrameṇāpi calaṃyeyetkadā sarvalaukikamantrāścākramya kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:793_10: asiddha eva krodharājā jāpamātreṇaiva karmāṇi karoti sarvamantrāṃ vināśayati sarvaśatrūṃ ghātayati sarvayantrāṃ pātayati /
S08bsu041_u:793_11: saṃkṣepato yathā yathā prayujyate sarvalaukikalokottaramantravidhānenāpi tat sarvaṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:793_14: manasecchayā śatruṃ ghātayati mahāśūlamudrayā saṃyuktaḥ sarvakarmāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:794_0: aparamami karma bhavati / madhyāhne śmaśānaṃ citāvekarātroṣitaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śmaśānakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya viṣarudhirāktāṃ rājikāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:794_2: [Vaidya_439] na bhetavyam / tato vaktavyaṃ śatruṃ me ghātayeti /
S08bsu041_u:794_4: tato muhūrtamātreṇa yojanasahasramapi gatvā śatruṃ ghātayanti kulānutsādayanti /
S08bsu041_u:795_0_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / viveke śucau deśe śucivastraprāvṛtena śūnyagṛhaṃ praviśya
S08bsu041_u:795_0_1: karpāsāsthyāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt tato taṃ bhasma ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ gṛhya
S08bsu041_u:795_1_0: dvau poṅgalikāṃ kṛtvā śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya mahākṛtarakṣāścātmano dravyaṃ ca gṛhamapraviśya
S08bsu041_u:795_1_1: mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā rātrau kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ vā citau sthitvā dakṣiṇābhimukhaḥ
S08bsu041_u:795_1_2: śarāvasampuṭaṃ gṛhītvā sthitako nagnako muktaśikhaḥ sa kruddho nirbhayo bhūtvā vidyā
S08bsu041_u:795_2: siddho bhavati / tad bhasma yadi kaścidamānuṣo dravyaṃ prārthayate na dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:795_3: haṭhaṃ karoti krodharājaṃ smṛtvā huṅkāraḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:795_7: prabhāte sūryodaye snātvā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena svagṛhaṃ praveṣṭavyam /
S08bsu041_u:795_9: tato yo dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena manuṣyādvipadacatuṣpadāṃ sarvaprāṇibhūtāṃ sadevanāgayakṣāṃ mūrdhnā tāḍayed vaśā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:795_10: yad vāmena hastena gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena sarveṣāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ strīṇāṃ mūrdhnā tāḍayed vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:795_11: dakṣiṇena yad gṛhītaṃ bhasma tena manuṣyāṇāṃ nābhideśe tāḍayet /
S08bsu041_u:795_12: napuṃsakā bhavanti / aṅgajātadeśena ca cūrṇayed asamartho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:795_13: grāmyadharmaniṣeviṇo yasyā striyāyāṃ abhiśakto bhavati tasyāṅgajāte guhyapradeśe bhasmanāvacūrṇayet /
S08bsu041_u:795_15: naṣṭavraṇā bhavati yāvantaṃ tadeva puruṣaṃ prāpnuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:795_19: so 'pi asamartho bhavati / paradārābhigamane parimlānamiva tiṣṭhate /
S08bsu041_u:795_20: tasya tadaṅgajātaṃ yāvad dātravaśāt tasyaiva tat punaḥ prādurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:795_21: striyasya vā puruṣaya vā yena vā tad bhasma punardattaṃ bhavati tasya vaśena varttati vā na vartati vā yatheṣṭaṃ vā taṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:795_22: yadi balāt kurvanti yeṣāṃ tu tad dattaṃ teṣāṃ guhyapradeśāni krimayaḥ prādurbhavante /
S08bsu041_u:795_24: māsābhyantareṇa pūtikā vā bhavanti durgandhakuṇapasadṛśāḥ mahāpradararogādibhiḥ puruṣavyādhibhiḥ puruṣā gṛhyante /
S08bsu041_u:795_25: mahāśvethuścopajāyate / yena teṣāṃ tenaivābādhena kālakriyā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:795_28: spṛṣṭamātro yadi na prāpnoti sparśanaṃ darśanapathe sthitā adarśane vā anuvāte ca bhasmamutsṛjet /
S08bsu041_u:795_29: yathā tasya bhasmanā īṣidavadhūlitaḥ manasā ca cintayitvā dātā bhasmamutsṛjet /
S08bsu041_u:795_30: yat tena cintitaṃ bhavati tat sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:795_31: parahastena vātmanā vā yathābhilaṣitaṃ tat sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:795_34_0: atha śayanāsanādīnāṃ astaraṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ vividhāni vālaṅkaraṇaviśeṣāṇi nānāvastrāṇi
S08bsu041_u:795_37: saptarātreṇa mṛyate / aśaktāḥ sarvavaidyāḥ sarvadevāśca nivārayitum /
S08bsu041_u:796_0_0: atha pratyāyanaṃ bhavati / yaṣṭīmadhuṃ nīlotpalaṃ śvetacandanaṃ caikīkṛtya śītalenāmbhasa
S08bsu041_u:796_0_1: pīṣayitvā taccharīraṃ mrakṣayet mūrdhnā prabhṛti yāvat pādatalam āryamañjuśriyamūlamantraṃ
S08bsu041_u:797_0: aparamapi karma bhavati / strīṇāmanuvātaṃ gatvā yatrepsatā sarvaduṣṭaḍākinistrīṇāṃ garvitānāṃ ca prayoktavyaṃ nānyeṣām /
S08bsu041_u:797_3: puruṣasyāpi puruṣendriyaṃ śmaśruromāṇi ca stanāni ca prādurbhavante /
S08bsu041_u:798_1: pareṇa vā kārāpayati / yatra vā prītirutpadyate tena vā kārāpayati /
S08bsu041_u:798_2: striyā vā puruṣeṇa vā / yatra vā cittasya nirvṛttirutpadyate tasya tad bhasmāṃ datvā yatheṣṭaṃ kārāpayati /
S08bsu041_u:798_4: manasā cintayitvā mūrdhni sparśanānmastakaśūlaḥ mukhasparśanānmukhapākaḥ evamanūpūrvyā yāvaddhṛdayaṃ hṛcchūlakukṣiśūlaṃ vā upajāyate /
S08bsu041_u:798_6: saṃkṣepato mārayati śoṣayati pācayati ākarṣayati vaśayati yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā tat sarvaṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:798_7: copaghātikaṃ ākarṣaṇavaśīkaraṇaṃ ca sudūre 'pi sthitaḥ karmāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:798_8: sudurgaṃ kuḍyasamīpaṃ gatvā, anuvāte sthitvā, tadeva bhasmotsṛjet / ubhau pāṇigṛhītaṃ prākāraṃ pratolī aṭṭālāṃśca prapatante /
S08bsu041_u:798_14: dāghajvareṇa vā gṛhyate / hastyaśvarathapatākādayaḥ senāpatiśca bhaṅgamupajāyate /
S08bsu041_u:798_15: grahaṇaṃ vā abhigacchati / evamanekaprakārāṇi yatheṣṭāni śatrunāśāya karmāṇi karoti /
S08bsu041_u:798_16: ātmano mahārakṣā ye ca svasenāyāṃ vā sakhāyānāṃ /
S08bsu041_u:798_17: atha pratyayanaṃ karoti / sarvataḥ sarveṣāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ kṣīrāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_52.2.1_0: naṭī naṭa tathā bhaṭṭa revatī cāpi viśrutā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_52.2.1_1: tamasurī tha lokā mekhalā cāpi sumekhalā /
S08bsu041_u:800_1: naṭikāyā mantraḥ - om naṭi mahānaṭi āgacchāgaccha divyarūpiṇi svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:800_2: asyopacāraḥ - phalake paṭṭake vā abhilikhya māṃsāhāreṇa vā kṣīrāhāreṇa vā vidyā aṣṭasahasraṃ japtavyā /
S08bsu041_u:800_3: ālekhyā ca sarvālaṅkārabhūṣaṇī śyāmāvadātā vṛkṣāśṛtā ekavastrā muktakeśā,
S08bsu041_u:800_4: saṃraktanayanā īṣismitamukhā sādhakaṃ tarjāyamānā dakṣiṇahastena vāmena pāṇinā vṛkṣaśākhāmavalagnā sarvāṅgaśobhanā vicitrapaṭṭanivastā /
S08bsu041_u:800_5_0: tasyeva krodharājasya paṭasyāgrataḥ unmanā uttarāmukhaṃ sthitvā palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ
S08bsu041_u:800_5_1: prajvālya gugguluguṭikānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ
S08bsu041_u:800_6: tataḥ saptame divase udārāṃ baliṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca prajvālya mantraṃ japatā tāvat tiṣṭhet yāvadardharātram /
S08bsu041_u:800_7: tataḥ sā yakṣiṇī svayameva mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā svarūpeṇāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:800_8: āgatā ca bravīti / kiṃ mayā kartavyam iti / tataḥ sādhakena vaktavyam - bhāryā me bhavasva iti /
S08bsu041_u:800_12: rasāyanaṃ prayacchate / yat pītvā divyarūpī bhavati mahāyakṣapratispardhī /
S08bsu041_u:800_13: yadi nāgacchati dvitīye vāre krodharājasahitaṃ japenniyatamāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:801_0: naṭṭāyā mantraḥ - om naṭṭe śuklāmbaramālyadhāriṇi maithunapriye svāhā / etasyaiṣa eva vidhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:802_0: bhaṭṭāyā mantraḥ - om bhaṭṭe bhaṭṭe ālokini kiṃ cirāyasi ehyehi āgacchāgaccha mama kāryaṃ kuru svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:802_2: śiraḥsthāne maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gugguludhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāmaṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:802_3: mauninā ekākinā śucinā dvāraṃ pidhāya māsena rātrau niyatāmāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:802_4: āgatā ca kāmayitavyā bhāryā bhavati sarvakāmadā /
S08bsu041_u:802_7: pañcavarṣaśatāni jīvati / tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati / sarvājñāṃ sampādayati / tena saha yatreṣṭaṃ tatra gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:803_0: revatyā mantraḥ - namaḥ sarvayakṣīṇām / om rakte raktavabhāse raktānulepane svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_52.3.2_1: kāmadā bhogadā nityaṃ varadāṃ tām abhinirdiśet //
S08bsu041_u:804_0: pūrvavat paṭamabhilikhya etasyā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - raktapaṭṭanivastā raktapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyā raktāvabhāsā ca varṇataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:805_0: mekhalāyāḥ mantraḥ - om mekhale mahāyakṣiṇi mama kāryaṃ sampādaya svāhā //
S08bsu041_u:806_0: sumekhalāyā mantraḥ - om mekhale sumekhale mahāyakṣiṇi sarvārthasādhani om samayamanusmara svāhā //
S08bsu041_u:807_1: ālokinyā mantraḥ - om lokini lokavati svāhā / eteṣāmeta eva vidhiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:808_0: tamasundaryāyā mantraḥ - om ghuṇu guhyake ghuṇu ghuṇu guhye ehyehi guhyake svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:808_1: asyopacāraḥ na / etāyā paṭavidhāno 'sti ādau tāvat śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena pūrṇamāsyāṃ vivikte sthāne dvāraṃ pidhāyitvā andhakāre ālokavarjite vidyāṃ daśasahasrāṇi japet /
S08bsu041_u:808_2: pūrvasevā kṛtā bhavati / tataḥ sādhanamārabhet / pūrvamāsyādārabhya yāvadaparā pūrṇamāsī atrāntare karma bhavati /

S08bsu041_u:808_10: bhāryā bhavati sarvakāmadā / divyaṃ cāsya sukhasaṃsparśam adarśanenaiva sarvakāryāṇi sampādayati /
S08bsu041_u:808_18: tenaiva saha saṃvaset / yadi gacchenmaraṇonmattiṃ vā prayacchante /
S08bsu041_u:808_21: dine dine ekaikāṃ yakṣiṇīṃ kṣaviṭiṃ preṣayati /

S08bsu041_u:808_23: sarveṣāmeva eva vidhiḥ / kiṃ tarhi teṣāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_52.4.3_0: paryaṭanti imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtsnāṃ caiva medinīm /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_52.4.5_1: na tāsāṃ kiñci duḥsādhyaṃ sarvakarmakarāḥ śubhāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:809_0: guhyavāsinyā mantraḥ - om guhile guhamati guhavāsi ānaya bhagavati mayāntikaṃ samayamanusmara svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:809_1: khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya pṛyaṅgupuṣpāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ māsamekam /
S08bsu041_u:809_2: pūrvasevā kṛtā bhavati / tataḥ paścāt sādhanamārabhet /

S08bsu041_u:810_0_0: aparamapi karma asyā / asyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vigatārcidhūmavigataiḥ
S08bsu041_u:810_0_1: aṅgāraiḥ dakṣiṇahastatale manacchilayā pratikṛtimabhilikhya nāma ca puruṣasya striyā
S08bsu041_u:811_1: tathaiva etasyā patamabhilikhya varjayitvā guhālayaṃ aśokavṛkṣāśṛtā likhāpayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:811_2: etasyāḥ ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - sarvaṃ tathaiva karma yathā guhavāsinyā /

S08bsu041_u:813_2: kumārī ardhabarbarāśirā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā ekavastrā dakṣiṇahastena bījapūrṇāvasaktaphalā vāmahastenāśokavṛkṣaśākhāvalagnā /
S08bsu041_u:813_5: śvetacandanena ca maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā trisandhyaṃ jātīkusumairabhyavakīrya gugguludhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāmaṣṭasahasrakam japet yāvanmāsamekam /
S08bsu041_u:813_6_0: tato pūrṇamāsyāṃ jātīkusumaiḥ mahatī pūjāṃ kārayitvā ghṛtapradīpāṃśca nivedyāṃśca
S08bsu041_u:813_6_1: datvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena rātrau tāvajjaped yāvat svarūpeṇaiva kumārī pañcaśataparivārā
S08bsu041_u:813_9: tataḥ sādhakena vaktavyam - trayāṇāṃ vārāṇāmanyatamamekaṃ varaṃ prārthayitavyā /

S08bsu041_u:814_10: tataḥ sā divyarūpī abhinavabadhvā vayātsamānā paricārikaiḥ parivāritā pradīpahastā svaprabhodyotitālokā śayanāsanaparigṛhītā vicitrābharaṇojjvalā āgatya ca mantrāpayate /

S08bsu041_u:815_0: manojñāyā mantraḥ - om manohare madonmādakari vicitrarūpiṇi maithunāpreye svāhā /

S08bsu041_u:815_20: deśāntare / yatreṣṭaṃ tatra dadāti / svayaṃ vā karoti / na ca mantrā dātavyā / atha dadāti chinnavidyo bhavati /

S08bsu041_u:816_1: asyāmupacāraḥ - khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /

S08bsu041_u:850_12: na cāsya śakrabhayaṃ bhavati sarvadhūrttataskarabhayo vā /
S08bsu041_u:850_14: yamarājopanītabhayaṃ vā / na cāsyāsurabhayaṃ vā bhavati,
S08bsu041_u:850_17: sarvagaraviṣabhayaṃ vā / na cāsya rogabhayaṃ bhavati jvarātīsārajīrṇāṅgapratyaṅgabhayo vā /
S08bsu041_u:850_18: ime daśānuśaṃsā veditavyā, yatrāyaṃ mahākalpaviśare dharmakośastathāgatānāṃ pustakagato tiṣṭheta,
S08bsu041_u:850_20: guhyatamo 'yaṃ dharmakośastathāgatānāṃ mantrānuvartanatayā punareṣāṃ sarvataḥ ācāryasamayānupraviṣṭānām /
S08bsu041_u:850_22: yat kāraṇam / rahasyametat / guhyavacanametat / sarvajñavacanametat / mā haiva sattvā pratikṣepsyante,
S08bsu041_u:850_23_0: avajñasyanti, na pūjayiṣyanti, na satkariṣyanti, mahadapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyante, guhyanivaraṇasattvopaghātananṛpatisūcana
S08bsu041_u:851_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvotthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.2_0: na paśyase paraṃ guhyametaṃ dharmavaraṃ varam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.4_1: na bhūtaṃ vidyate kaścid yaḥ kalpavisarādiha //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.5_1: prāpnuyāt puṣkalāṃ kīrttiṃ divyāṃ mānuṣikāṃ tathā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.7_0: idaṃ sūtraṃ dhāraṇāt puṇya anuśaṃsā syādime tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.7_1: na cāsya sarvakāye vai na viṣaṃ na hutāśanam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.8_0: na vetāḍā grahāścaiva na pūtanā mātarā hi ye /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.9_0: piśācā vāsya hiṃsyeyuḥ yasta sūtramimaṃ paṭhet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.9_1: dhārayedvāpi pūjayed vā na punaḥ punaḥ vividhā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.10_0: vādya pūjya pūja iṣu pūjayed vā viśaradaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.11_0: āturo mucyate rogān duḥkhito sukhino bhavet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.11_1: daridro labhate arthān baddho mucyeta bandhanāt //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.12_1: kṣemaṃ śivaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyādacalaṃ padam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.14_1: pūjitvā labhate puṇyaṃ tatsarvamidaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhanādiha //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.20_0: tatpramāṇād bhavet sarve teṣāṃ pūjāṃ tathaiva ca /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.20_1: tat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyānmartya yasya pustaka gataṃ kare //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.22_0: teṣāṃ ca pūjā satkṛtya kaści jantu punaḥ punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.23_0: na śakyaṃ kalpakoṭyaiste ratnai jinavaraiḥ sadā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.25_1: akhinnamanaso bhūtvā yo imāṃ sādhayet bhuvi //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.28_0: yo 'smān kalvavarā hyekaṃ mantraṃ dhāraye nṛpa /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.29_1: na cāsya hanyate śastrairna viṣaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamaiḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.31_1: kāyaṃ na hanyate tasya nṛpatervā jantuno 'pi vā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.32_0: ya imaṃ sūtravarāgraṃ tu dhārayed vācayet tathā /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.32_1: rājā ca kṛtayā mūrdhnāṃ saṅgrāme samupasthite //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.33_0: chatraṃ śirasi māvedya namaskuryāt punaḥ punaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.35_0: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vidviṣaḥ sarve nivartanteyuste pare janāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.37_1: yudhi prāptaṃ samastaṃ vai tasmiṃ kāle 'vatārayet //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.38_0: naśyante dṛṣṭamātraṃ vai muhyante vā samantataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.45_1: kathitaṃ dharmakośaṃ tu mānuṣā tu bhūtale //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.47_1: muniśreṣṭhe tadā pṛcchet kāśyapaṃ taṃ jinottamam //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.54_0: tataste nu smarto se smṛta tattvagato tataḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.55_0: yatra sau bhagavāṃ tasthuḥ maghavāṃścaiva sureśvara /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.55_1: āgatā bhāṣate mantrāṃ vanditvā jinavaraṃ tadā //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.56_0: praṇamya jinavarāṃ sarvāṃ kāśyapaṃ ca mahādyutim /
S08bsu041_u:852_1: om hana hana sarvabhayān sādayotsādaya trāsaya moṭaya chinda bhinda jvala jvala huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā /
S08bsu041_u:853_0: samanantarabhāṣiteyaṃ mantrā kumārabhūtena mañjuśriyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S08bsu041_u:853_2: sarvāṃśca buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ kṣetrānantāparyantā salokadhātudiśaparyantāṃ sarvaiśca buddhairbhagavadbhiradhiṣṭhitāni ca imāni mantrapadāni /
S08bsu041_u:854_0_0: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ vigatabhayaromakarṣaḥ āścaryādbhutaprāptaḥ utphullanayanaḥ
S08bsu041_u:854_0_1: utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ
S08bsu041_u:854_0_2: sammukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāni ca mantrapadāṃ gṛhya manasīkṛtya ca punareva syandanamadhiruhya
S08bsu041_u:854_0_3: yena te 'surāḥ prādravitaḥ sarve 'surā yena pātālaṃ mahāsamudrāśrayādharapuraṃ svakaṃ
S08bsu041_u:854_1: hatavidhvastamānasaḥ sainyabhayākulitavihvalaniṣaṇṇavadanadarpaḥ vigataśastrā dṛṣṭā taṃ sureśvaraṃ jvalantamiva pāvakaṃ nirvartya svālayaṃ gatā abhūt /
S08bsu041_u:855_0: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ devāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmantrayate sma /
S08bsu041_u:855_3: āgacchantu bhavantaḥ krīḍatha ramatha paricārayatha svaṃ svaṃ bhavanavaraṃ gatvā /
S08bsu041_u:855_4: svālayaṃ cetaste devā hṛṣṭamanasaḥ punareva nivartya svālayaṃ gatā /
S08bsu041_u:856_1: yanvahaṃ taṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ bimbākāraṃ kṛtvā dhvajāgre sthāpayeyaṃ,
S08bsu041_u:856_3_0: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ mahatā maṇiratnadyotigarbhaprabhodyotanaṃ nāma gṛhītvā kumārākārapratibimbaṃ
S08bsu041_u:856_3_1: kārayitvā upari prāsādasya mūrdhani [Vaidya_520] sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ sudarśanasya
S08bsu041_u:856_3_2: mahānagarasya madhye taṃ dhvajocchritasuvinyastaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayāmāsa /
S08bsu041_u:857_0: tataste asurā prahrādavemacitriprabhṛtayaḥ pātālaṃ nordhvagacchati na ca tāṃ devānabhidravante na ca śekuḥ ṛddhivikurvāṇaṃ raṇābhimukhaṃ vā gantum /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.57_0: ye narā mūḍhacitto vai pratikṣepsyanti varamimam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.60_1: gacchate janā tatra ye narā dharmadūṣakāḥ //
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.62_0: pacyante te janāstasmin yo dharmaṃ lopayedimam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.75_0: yo hīhimaṃ sūtravaraṃ mukhyaṃ dharmakośaṃ jinorjitam /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.75_1: pratikṣeptāro bhuvi martyāṃ vā avīcau narakāntakau /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.76_0: yadā kāle tu martyāḥ kadācit karhacid bhavet /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.77_0: durgandho 'tha bībhatsa vyaṅgo andha eva saḥ /
S08bsu041_u:mmk_54.77_1: bhīmarūpī sadārūpī sadārūkṣaḥ preta va dṛśyate bhuvi //
S08bsu041_u:859_1_0: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S08bsu041_u:859_1_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ utphullanayanaḥ
S08bsu041_u:860_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavaṃ yāvat paramaṃ subhāṣito 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:860_1_0: tad bhagavaṃ bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani sattvā viṣamalobhābhībhūtāḥ sattvāḥ pañcakaṣāyodriktamanaso
S08bsu041_u:860_1_1: 'śrāddhāḥ kuhakāḥ khaṭukāḥ kuśīlāḥ te mantrāṇāṃ gatimāhātmyapūjita kāladeśaniyamaṃ
S08bsu041_u:860_4: te duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyanti /
S08bsu041_u:860_6: teṣāṃ bhagavaṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyam mahākāruṇikāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:860_7: / atha bhagavāṃ śākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ mūrdhni parāmṛśyāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu khalu punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthe hitāya pratipannaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:860_8: sādhu punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ praśnasi /
S08bsu041_u:860_10: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S08bsu041_u:860_11_0: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S08bsu041_u:860_11_2: maraṇakālasamaye ca smarttavyo 'yaṃ vidyārājā paramarahasyaṃ kumāra tvadīyamūlakalpapaṭalavisara
S08bsu041_u:861_2: lahu lahu bhrūṃ bhrūṃ hūṃ hūṃ jinajit mañjuśrīya suśriya tāraya māṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ phaṭ phaṭ śamaya śamaya /
S08bsu041_u:862_0_0: eṣa mañjuśrīḥ tvadīyaṃ paramahṛdaya sarvaśāntikaraṃ sarvapāpakṣayaṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocanamāyurārogyaiśvaryaparamasaubhāgyavākyasañjananaṃ
S08bsu041_u:862_0_1: sarvavidyārājasattejanaṃ ca samanantarabhāṣite śākyamuninā buddhena bhagavatā /
S08bsu041_u:862_4: na ca tasmin samaye saddharmapratikṣepeṇa cittaṃ bhaveyuḥ /
S08bsu041_u:862_5: na ca mārā pāpīyāṃsaḥ avatāraṃ lapsante /
S08bsu041_u:862_8: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ acintyabuddhā bodhidharmā cintayituṃ vā pratikṣeptuṃ vā buddhā bhagavanto jñāsyantīti /
S08bsu041_u:863_0: āryamañjuśrīmūlakalpād bodhisattvapiṭakāvaṃtaṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt pañcāśatimaḥ anuśaṃsāvigarhaṇaprabhāvapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti /
S08bsu041_u:866_1: sa vaśo bhavati / strīvaśīkaraṇe aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt ;
S08bsu041_u:866_2: sā vaśā bhavati / kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śvetapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasreṇāryamañjuśrīḥ lalāṭe hantavyaḥ ;
S08bsu041_u:866_3: rājapatnī vaśā bhavati / apatitagomayena śivaliṅgaṃ kṛtvā tasyāgrato gomayena triśūlena śvetasarṣapāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ saptāhutiṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:866_6: sā vaśā bhavati / madhūcchiṣṭamayīṃ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā ātmana ūrū sthāpya aṣṭasahasraṃ /
S08bsu041_u:866_9: yamicchati sa vaśo bhavati / śaṅkhanābhirocanātagarumekīkṛtya pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:866_10: aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā annena vā pānena vā yasya dīyate sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_12: sā vaśā bhavati / bhasmānāṃ saptajaptena yāṃ striyaṃ cūrṇayati ;
S08bsu041_u:866_13: sā vaśā bhavati / striyā puruṣasya vāgrataḥ sthitvāṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt ;
S08bsu041_u:866_14: sa vaśo bhavati / caturaṅgulaṃ kāṣṭhikāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ tayā yamākarṣati ;
S08bsu041_u:866_15: sa vaśo bhavati / śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭaśataṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:866_16: tatraikaṃ puṣpaṃ gṛhya striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā āvarttayet /
S08bsu041_u:866_17: āgacchati sa vaśo bhavati / kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ pakkamekaṃ valmīkamṛttikāmayaṃ vā pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā tatopaviṣṭastāvajjaped yāvad vāsukicalitaḥ siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_21: bhogān labhati / māsena bhikṣāhāraḥ śuklacaturdaśyāmekarātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrato mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pratimāyā pādau gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvaccalitācalitevādṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_23: manasāhāramutpadyate / pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati / gaṅgānadīmavatīrya lakṣamekaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:866_24: paścāt tatraiva paṭe vālukāmayaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā madhu kṣīraṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:866_25: sarvanāgā āgacchanti / yad bravīti tat sarvaṃ kurvanti /
S08bsu041_u:866_26: parvataśikharamāruhya paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tailāktaṃ candaśakalikāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:866_27: yakṣā āgacchanti / yad bravīti tat sarvaṃ kurvanti /
S08bsu041_u:866_28: vane paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya madhupippalīṃ caikataḥ kṛtvāṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:866_29: sarvavidyādharā āgacchanti / ājñākarā bhavanti / ekavṛkṣe pratītya samutpādagarbhacaityapratiṣṭhāpya lakṣamekaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:866_30_0: lakṣaparisamāptau poṣadhikena rūpakāreṇāśvatthakāṣṭhamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ lakṣaṇopetaṃ kṛtvā
S08bsu041_u:866_30_1: sapātābhihūtaṃ kṛtvā paurṇamāsyāṃ sugandhagandhaiḥ samupalipya yathā vibhavataḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ
S08bsu041_u:866_30_2: pūjāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇahaste kṛtvā sakalāṃ rātriṃ sādhayet /
S08bsu041_u:866_31: yāvajjvalatīti / jvalite mahādevo bhavati / bhūtādhipatirbhavati / durdāntadamakaḥ apratihataḥ sarvasattveṣu /
S08bsu041_u:866_34: maṇiratnaṃ vā dadāti / tena gṛhītena vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_37: prātihārakapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāmudārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:866_38: tataḥ tasmiṃ hastaṃ prakṣipya yamicchati tat sarvaṃ prādurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_41: yasyāṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vālukāmayaṃ vā pūrṇamāsyāṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:866_42: tatraiva paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sphaṭīkamaṇimṛṇmayā vā dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti /
S08bsu041_u:866_44: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:866_45: prātihārakapakṣapūrṇamāsyāṃ vidhivat pūjāṃ kṛtvā pradīpamālāṃ ca udārāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇahastena dhvajaṃ śuklavastrāvalambitaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalati /
S08bsu041_u:866_46_0: dhvajavidyādharo bhavati / sarvatrāpratihataḥ / prātihārakapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ
S08bsu041_u:866_46_1: mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatyā prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ sugandhagandhaiḥ pralipya sugandhapuṣpamālābhiḥ
S08bsu041_u:866_47: vidyādhararājā bhavati / yatrecchati tatra gacchati / bodhisattvacaryācārī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:866_48: kumārīṃ prāsādikāṃ susnātālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vāmahastena gṛhya sthitastāvajjaped yāvat tayā saha jvalati /
S08bsu041_u:866_50: ekaliṅgasyopari hastaṃ datvā tāvajjaped yāvat sakhāyā na paśyanti /
S08bsu041_u:866_52: trayodaśyāṃ candragrahe sūryagrahe vā haritālaṃ bodhivṛkṣapatrāntaritaṃ kṛtvā maheśvarāyatane sadhātuke caityai tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
S08bsu041_u:866_54: kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ samudrataṭe vṛkṣamūle sahasraṃ japet trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:866_56: yatheṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt / mudgāhāraḥ parvataśikharamāruhya aṣṭasahasraṃ japed viṃśatirātram /
S08bsu041_u:866_58: tato hastaśirasi kṛtaṃ tasyopari upaviṣṭa aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:867_0: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya madhūcchiṣṭakena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā nirdhūmāṅgāreṣu kṣipet saptarātraṃ sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:867_1: vastrakāmaḥ śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ aparimarditānāṃ sakṛt parijapya udake kṣipet saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:867_5: na ca dadyate / tenaiva cābhyakto jalaṃ praviśati stambhito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:867_7: āyasaṃ pradeśamātraṃ khaḍgaṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthapatraiḥ pradakṣiṇāvarttaiḥ khaḍgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalita iti /
S08bsu041_u:867_10_0: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ
S08bsu041_u:867_10_1: bhikṣaṃ bhojya manaḥśilāyāṃ bhūmau padmaṃ śatapatraṃ lekhya padmakarṇikāyāṃ upaviśya
S08bsu041_u:867_12: taiḥ parivṛtaḥ utpati / yāvantaḥ satvāṃ paśyati yaiśca dṛśyate taiḥ sārdhaṃ gacchati /
S08bsu041_u:867_14: vimāturakalpaṃ jīvati / bhinnadehe svecchayā upapati gṛhṇāti /
S08bsu041_u:867_16: puṣpyati phalati ca / śuṣkanadīmavatīrya japed udakaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:867_17: nadīprataraṇe japet / śrāntasya sthalo bhavati / rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmena paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmārabhya [Vaidya_525] puṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:867_19: niyataṃ rājā vaśī bhavati / tāmevāṣṭamīmārabhya gorocanā trisandhyaṃ aṣṭaśatikena japed yāvadekādaśī /
S08bsu041_u:867_20: tena tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ vīkṣyati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:867_21: yadicche dārakadārikāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ siddhārthakānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:867_22: tāsāṃ pādapāsuṃ gṛhya puttalikāṃ kṛtvā yasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ karoti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:867_23: meghārthinā gavyaghṛtaṃ gṛhya candragrahe sūryagrahe vā tāmrabhājane prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:867_24: ūṣmāyamāne śrutidharo 'yaṃ yaṃ śṛṇoti taṃ gṛhṇāti /
S08bsu041_u:867_28: dīnāraśataṃ labhate / paṭasyāgrataḥ śālitandulānāṃ ghṛtābhyaktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:867_29: pañca dīnārāṃ labhate / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_0: kulapatiṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_1: kulapatirvaśībhavati / lokapatyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dūrvāpravālānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_3: āryasaṅghaṃ vaśīkartukāmena arkapuṣpāṇāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_6: suvarṇasahasraṃ labhate / paṭasyāgrataḥ kundurudhūpaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_7: nidhānaṃ labhate / paṭasyāgrataḥ arkakāṣṭhasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhya sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_8: dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / śatruvaśīkaraṇe poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ trisandhyaṃ rājasarṣapāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_9: sarvaśatravo vaśā bhavanti / lākṣāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_10: sarvajanapriyo bhavati / śālitandulānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_11_0: kārṣāpaṇaśataṃ labhati / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā mṛtakapuruṣaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_11_1: akṣatāṅgaṃ gṛhya snānālaṅkṛtaṃ kṛtvā sugandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya vāmapādenorasimākramya
S08bsu041_u:868_13: jātarūpaṃ suvarṇaṃ labhati / atha necchati vaktavyam - chardasva iti /
S08bsu041_u:868_14: tataścintāmaṇi nirgacchati / taṃ śirasi kaṇṭhe vā kṛtvā anyatra vā baddhvā yaṃ cintayati taṃ prādurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_15: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ samudragāminiṃ nadīṃ aṃsamātramudakamavatīrya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_16: daśamāṣakaṃ labhate, suvarṇasahasraṃ vā / śuklapratipadamārabhya samudragāminyā nadyā padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_17: nidhānasaṅghāṭakaṃ labhate / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tāmeva nadīmavatīrya puṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_18: daśa grāmāṇyālabhate / aśokapuṣpaiḥ caṇakamātrāṃ guṭikāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_19: yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhate / apāmārgasamidhānāmeṣa vidhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_20: suvarṇasahasraṃ labhate aśokaguṭikāvyatimiśraiḥ apāmārgatandulaiḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ tryaktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi [Vaidya_526] juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_22: rājānaṃ samantriṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ aśokasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya aśokapuṣpāṇāmeva dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśa sahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_23: sa mantrī vaśamāgacchati / paṭasyāgrataḥ agniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidbhiḥ śatapuṣpāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_24: svagṛhe nidhānaṃ paśyati / samudragāminyāṃ nadyāṃ kaṭīmātramudakamavatīrya daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_25: ye tāṃ jighranti / vāmahastena muṣṭiṃ badhvā lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_26: tataḥ siddho bhavati / muktvā dṛśyati / sadhātuke caitye nadītaṭe vā parvate vā paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_27: śriyaṃ paśyati / etenaiva vidhinā nīlotpalānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_30: vastrāṇāṃ koṭiṃ labhate / gugguludhūpena aṣṭaśatikena manobhilaṣitāṃ ca pūrayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_34: dīnāraśataṃ labhati / lavaṇamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ chitvā chitvā juhuyāt aṣṭasahasram /
S08bsu041_u:868_35: yamicchati sa vaśo bhavati strī vā puruṣo vā /
S08bsu041_u:868_36: ubhayārdraṃ hastasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt divasatrayam /
S08bsu041_u:868_37: sarvavighnopaśamanam / udake ekapādaṃ prakṣipya sthale eka eva tāvajjped yāvadudakasthaṃ pādaṃ laghurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_38: tataḥ pāpānmukto bhavati / arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya rājikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_39: karmāvaraṇaṃ kṣīyate / brāhmīguḍūcīpippalīcūrṇaṃ samabhāgāni kṛtvā madhunā sahāryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ ekaviṃśativārān parijapya lihet saptāham /
S08bsu041_u:868_42: paṭasyāgrataḥ pratimāyā vā aṣṭasahasraṃ japaṃ kṛtvā paścāt pibet /
S08bsu041_u:868_43: evaṃ dinedine maunī japet / meghāvī bhavati / baddho ruddho vā japenaiva mucyati /
S08bsu041_u:868_44: caurāṃ dṛṣṭvā japet / corairna muṣyati / tailamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā śiraṃ mrakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_45: sarvajanapriyo bhavati / bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ ye spṛśanti te sarve vaśyā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_46: anenaiva mantreṇa śastrāhatasya puruṣasya tailamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritena mrakṣayed vraṇo naśyati /
S08bsu041_u:868_47: na vedanā bhavati / anena loṣṭaṃ parijapya saptavārāṃ jale prakṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:868_51: candragrahe sadhātuke caitye guñjānāṃ ślakṣṇacūrṇīkṛtānāṃ dhṛtamadhumiśrā guḍikāṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_56: śuklapratipadamārabhya trirātroṣitaḥ aśvatthapatravṛkṣasyādhastāda yūthikākalikānāṃ ghṛtadadhikṣīrābhyaktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_57: rūpakaśataṃ labhate / atha na siddhyati karmakuryāt rūpakaśataṃ labhate paśyati vā piśācajvarabhūtagrahavināśakaṃ sūtreṇa mokṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_58: nāryā aprasavamānāyā tailamaṣṭaśataṃ parijapya nābhiṃ kaṭipradeśaṃ vā mrakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_59: viśalyā bhavati / kumbhīradhāraṇaṃ loṣṭaśatābhimantritena anantāvetasībrāhmīvacābṛhatīmadhusaṃyuktā sadhātuke caitye candramapaśyatā [Vaidya_527] tāvajjaped yāvanmukta iti /
S08bsu041_u:868_61: saṅgrāme pratisarāṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā granthiṃ haste badhvā ahatabalo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_63: samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya gatvā kṣīrayāvakāhāreṇa pakṣamupoṣya vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ udake nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_64_0: nidhānaṃ paśyati / pañcagavyena kāyaśodhanaṃ kṛtvā śuklapratipadamārabhya yāvat pūrṇamāsīti
S08bsu041_u:868_64_1: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ ante trirātroṣitaḥ kumārīkartitasūtraṃ gṛhya sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_64_2: vā gṛhe daśasahasrābhimantritena haste badhvā adṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_65: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmānāṃ triṃśatsahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_67: yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhate / pratipadamārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīti
S08bsu041_u:868_68: / trirātroṣitaḥ sadhātuke caitye udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udumbarībhiḥ samidhābhiḥ agniṃ prajvālya ghṛtāhutiṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_69: grāmaṃ labhate / samudragāminyā nadītīre stūpasahasraṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_70: pratidinamekaikasya stūpasya gandhapuṣpadhūpādīṃ datvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_74: tāvajjaped, yāvat svarūpeṇa tiṣṭhati / sa yaṃ varaṃ yācate taṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:868_77: aṭavīṃ gatvā bhikṣāhāraḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ araṇyagomayānāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_79: sa ca nidānaṃ dadāti / na gṛhetavyam / svayamevamupatiṣṭhasveti / rājyaṃ dhanaṃ vānyaratnāni vā dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_83: agarukāṣṭhapratimāgrataḥ bhagavataḥ vatsalaṇḍakānāṃ madhughṛtāktānāṃ saptasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_84: kapilā kāmadhenurāgacchati / yadi nāgacchati punarapi vatsalaṇḍaṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_85: āgatā ca siddhā bhavati / puruṣasahasrasya kṣīraṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_88: vikasitapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt sadhātuke caitye buddhābhiprasannā devatā varadā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_89: āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ saptābhimantritānāṃ saṅgrāme prakire /
S08bsu041_u:868_90: śāntirbhavati / pratihārakapakṣe śuklatrayodaśyāṃ gandhapuṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vikasitānāṃ padmānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_91: bhasmaṃ ca gṛhītvātmanaḥ lalāṭe tilakaṃ kṛtvā grāmaṃ nagaraṃ praviśet /
S08bsu041_u:868_92: sarve vaśā bhavanti / kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ prabhṛti yāvat pañcadaśīti ekarātroṣitena vṛkṣa syādhastāccaturhastamātraṃ maṇḍalakamupalipya,
S08bsu041_u:868_93: gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ datvā āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā yakṣāṇāṃ baliṃ datvā mānuṣāsthiṃ gṛhītvā triśūlaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_94: vāmahastena prakṣipya saptarātratrirātroṣitena vā jātīpuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_95: tena śūlaṃ jvalati / tataḥ siddho bhavati / icchayā yaṃ nirmiṇoti taṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:868_96_0: divyaṃ gṛhaṃ candrasūryagrahe sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāṃ vā gṛhe kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ
S08bsu041_u:868_96_1: goghṛtapalaṃ gṛhya sauvarṇabhājane sthāpya bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candramapaśyatā
S08bsu041_u:868_101: pratihārakapakṣamārabhya saṃvatsaraṃ bhagavato āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādīnāṃ dadatā aṣṭāṅgapoṣadhasamanvāgatena pūrṇe saṃvatsare siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_103: āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā pratipadamārabhya yāvat paurṇamāsī dine dine 'dhikapūjā kāryā /
S08bsu041_u:868_104: bhikṣavaśca bhojayitavyāḥ / siddho 'smīti vāṅnissarati / ghṛtāhutīnāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_105_0: parasya śāntirbhavati / prātihārakapakṣe bhagavato buddhasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ āryamañjuśriyasya
S08bsu041_u:868_107: saptarātraṃ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ poṣadhikena āmalitaghṛtena pātraṃ pūrayitvā śuklavarttinā dīpaṃ prajvālya kumārakumārikānāṃ darśāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_116: gandhapuṣpadhūpādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ante trirātroṣitena maunavrataṃ kurutā mantraṃ japatā prāticārakebhyo baliṃ haste datvā mahāpathaṃ gatvā bhūtaṃ krūraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_117: pratīccheti vaktavyaḥ / gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ droṇaṃ gṛhītvā daśa diśo 'dhastācca kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:868_119: tathaiva kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ gandhakuṭiṃ praviśya bhagavato 'grataḥ sahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_120: gandhapuṣpādibhirbalividhānaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ svapne paśyati bhagavānāryamañjuśrīḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_121: vasiśākhamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe poṣadhikena kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ sadhātuke caitye gandhapuṣpadīpādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣavaśca dine dine bhojayitavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_123: sarvauṣadhibījāni prakṣipya rātrau ekaikamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā akākolīne putradāradārikāṃ sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_124: rājyam / pakṣābhyantarayoḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā śmaśānāgniṃ prajvālya śatapuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_125: annapānaṃ akṣayaṃ bhavati / tameva bhasmaṃ grahāya ātmanaḥ parasya vā lalāṭe puṇḍrakaṃ kṛtvā saṅgāme 'vataret sarve vaśā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_127: agnigatāṃ nāśayati / mālatīpuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_128: ṣaṇmāsaṃ gomūtrāhāraḥ / dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / śuklapratipadamārabhya nīlotpalānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_129: yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_130: pañcakālakānāṃ trisandhyaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_131: prātihārakapakṣe paṭasyāgrataḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ trisandhyaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ tāvajjaped yāvad bhagavānāgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:868_132_0: dīpaśikhā varddhate / pṛthivī kampate / paṭaṃ vā pracalati / siddheti vāṅ niścarati /
S08bsu041_u:868_132_2: caitye bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ ṣaṇmāsābhyantareṇa dīnārāṇāṃ pañcasahasrāṇi
S08bsu041_u:868_133: sadhātuke caitye pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_136: sarvakāmaprado bhavati / sarvavyādhiṣu praśamanaṃ kartukāmenāṣṭaśatasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_138: saubhāgyaṃ pratilabhate / vyādhiśca praśamati / samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya kṛṣṇatilānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_139_0: dhanadhānyaṃ pratilabhate / sadhātuke caitye śuklapratipadamārabhya pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣitena
S08bsu041_u:868_141: pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ yadi te tilā diśi vidiśaṃ gacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_142: tataḥ siddho bhavati / sarvasattvā vaśīkaroti / āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūrvaṃ śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_143: tataḥ candragrahe ghṛtamaṣṭapalāni datvā tāvajjaped yāvat phenāyati pītvā śrutidharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_147: śrīmāṃ bhavati / apāmārgasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ pratidinaṃ aṣṭamasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_149: vacāṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt / tena bhasmanā tilakaṃ kuryād antarhito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_151: candragrahe nadītīraṃ gatvā bilvasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya bilvapuṣpāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_152: yakṣakumārī āgacchati / ardharātre punarapi aṣṭasahasraṃ japitvā tata ekā āgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:868_154: nidhisthāne mantramaṣṭasahasraṃ japet puṣpadhūpagandhādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ balividhānaṃ kṛtvā japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_155: piśācā āgachanti / tataḥ khanet / nidhāna uttiṣṭhati / gṛhītvātmanā trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_156: evaṃ paṭṭabandhamapi karma / bhagavato 'grataḥ vibhītakakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya tilataṇḍulānāṃ pratidivasaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_157: raṇḍā vaśā bhavati / amātyavaśīkaraṇā gaurasarṣapāṃ juhuyāt vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_160: agastikāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya dīpavartīnāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ dīnāraśataṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:868_162: pratidinaṃ triḥ kālam / suvarṇaśataṃ labhati / samudragāminīṃ nadīṃ gatvā śataśatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_166: ānantaryānmucyati / bodhivṛkṣamūle bhagavataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā apāmārgasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_167: ātmānamuddiśya / sarvapāpairmukto bhavati / sapta sapta maricāni abhimantrya akākolīne bhakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_169: tacca yāvajjīvaṃ dhārayati bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ śatasahasraṃ japaṃ kṛtvā pannagabandhaṃ karoti /
S08bsu041_u:868_171: ardharātre pañca dīnāraśatāni pratilabhate ardhaṃ ratnatrayopayojyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_174: kārttikaśuklapakṣe kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣito vaikaṅkataphalānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_176_0: grāmasvāmī bhavati / ardhaṃ ratnatrayopayogam / śucau bhūpradeśe gocarmamātraṃ maṇḍalamupalipya
S08bsu041_u:868_176_1: tanmadhye padmākārāṃ vediṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpadhūpavicitrabaliṃ kṛtvā vaikaṅkatasamidhānā
S08bsu041_u:868_180: evaṃ siddho bhavati / gaṅgāyāmaṃsamātramudakamavatīrya lakṣaṃ japet yāvadākāśādityamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyati /
S08bsu041_u:868_182: yadi na paśyati na sidhyati ekavārāhiṃ gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpabalividhānaṃ kṛtvā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_183: yāvaduśvaśatiṃ / tataḥ siddho bhavati / sarvasādhaneṣu sā ca vaktavyā /
S08bsu041_u:868_185: sarvaṃ vyayīkartaśyam / anyathā na dadāti / palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya araṇyagomayānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_186: gośataṃ labhati / mātulaṅgaphalānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt palāśāgnau /
S08bsu041_u:868_187: yāvad gaṇapatirāgacchati / sa vaktavyaḥ - mama dine dine dīnāramekaṃ dehi /
S08bsu041_u:868_188: dadāti / sarvaḥ vyayīkartavyaḥ / bhagavataḥ pādau spṛśeti vaktavyaḥ tataḥ siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_189: athavā na dadādi bilvaphalānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ ekarātroṣitaḥ vaikaṅkatasamidhāgniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_191: viṣayādhipatirbhavati / kiṅkirāṭapuṣpāṇi dine dine aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_192: dināni sapta / aṣṭau paṇaṃ pratilabhate / śāntikaṃ kartukāmo lājāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_193: śāntirbhavati / puṣṭimicchatā kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāmagniṃ prajvālya trisandhyaṃ tilataṇḍulānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_194: divasāni trīṇi / puṣṭirbhavati / āmrakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya dūrvāṅkurāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_195: vivāde uttara vādī bhavati / astamite vrīhituṣāṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā vāmahastena juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_196: saptarātraṃ vaśo bhavati / rājasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya tilataṇḍulānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_198_0: gaṅgāyāmusalaśabdarahite śucau pradeśe ubhayakūlamṛttikāṃ gṛhya sacaturasrāṃ saptahastāṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_198_1: vedikāṃ kṛtvā madhye sahasrapatraṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā tasyopari sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ pañcalohitakaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_198_2: cakraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya maṇḍalamadhye paṭasyāgrataḥ sādhayitavya gandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetacandanairarcayitvā
S08bsu041_u:868_198_3: mandārakaraktapuṣpamālāṃ datvā tato gandhādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpamālā sapta
S08bsu041_u:868_199: caturdiśaṃ catvāraḥ kalaśāḥ sarvabījapūrṇakā ratnāni ca prakṣipya sthāpayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:868_201: balividhānaṃ kṛtvā caturdiśaṃ pūrvoktena dadhibhakto 'pūpakaṃ deyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_205: tataḥ palāśasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidhānāṃ saptābhimantritānāṃ ghṛtānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_206_0: nāmaṃ grahāya / vaśo bhavati / rājavṛkṣasamidbhirigniṃ prajvālya lavaṇamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_206_1: kṛtvā śirādārabhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ saptābhimantritāṃ yāvaccaraṇāviti nāmaṃ grahāya
S08bsu041_u:868_208_1: sadhātuke caitye āryamañjuśriyasya rajatamaye vā bhājane kapilāyāḥ goḥ samānavatsāyāḥ
S08bsu041_u:868_208_2: kumārīmathitaṃ navanītaṃ gṛhya kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vāmahastena bhājanaṃ gṛhyaṃ dakṣiṇahastenānāmikāyāmaṅguhyā
S08bsu041_u:868_209: tat pātavyam / medhāvī bhavati / sakṛduktaṃ gṛhṇāti / atha dhūmāyati vaśīkaraṇam / atha jvalati antardhānaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_212: samiśrīkṛtvā kārayitavyā / aṣṭaśatābhimantritāṃ vācāṃ dakṣiṇahaste badhvā yāvat sarvatrottaravādī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_214: saṅgrāme 'parājito bhavati / kumārīkartitasūtreṇa saptābhimantritena granthayaḥ kartavyāḥ bandhitavyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_216: dāruṇena sarpeṇa daṣṭasya nāmaṃ grahāya saptābhimantritamudakacūrṇakaṃ pānāya deyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_217: mṛto 'pyuttiṣṭhati / tathaiva caturdiśābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pānāya deyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_218: takṣakenāpi daṣṭo jīvati / stanagaṇḍikāyāṃ saptābhimantritayā mṛttikayā lepayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_219: mucyati / vedanā na bhavati / māryupadrave nagaramadhye vā ardharātrau sthaṇḍilakamupalipya śuklaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā kṣīravṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya kṣīrāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_220: māryupaśamayati / athanopaśamayati / tato 'nyatamasmin divase madhyāhnavelāyāṃ śleṣmātakasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya siddhārthānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_221: sadyo māriṃ praśamayati / anena vidhinā kṛtena viṣamabandhaḥ yāvantaḥ sattvā te tasya vaśā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_224: pretā vaśyā bhavanti / piśācavaśīkaraṇe śmaśānacelakānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_225: piśācā vaśā bhavanti / yakṣavaśīkaraṇe vaṭavṛkṣasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_226: yakṣā vaśā bhavanti / apasmārojehāravaśīkaraṇe ūrṇāhutīnāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_229: vīrakrayakrītāṃ manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvārājavṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālyaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadagnivarṇā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_230: tataḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kapilāyāḥ kanyāmathitena navanītena kṛtvā tasmiṃ ghṛte nirvāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_232_0: tataḥ anenaiva rakṣāṃ kṛtvā samudgake sthāpya candragrahe trirātroṣitena sadhātuke
S08bsu041_u:868_232_1: caitye āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā uttarāmukhenāśvatthapatracatuṣṭaye sthāpya
S08bsu041_u:868_235: rocanayā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ - śuklapañcadaśyāṃ padmapatre sthāpya āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ karasampuṭena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_237_0: saptarātraṃ pañcalohena padmaṃ kṛtvā kuṅkumarocanakarpūramudake piṣṭvā padmaṃ mrakṣayitvā
S08bsu041_u:868_237_1: tataḥ śuklāṣṭamyāmupoṣadhikena triḥkālasnāyinā śucivastraprāvṛtena sadhātuke caitye
S08bsu041_u:868_237_2: āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītena tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalati /
S08bsu041_u:868_240: evaṃ śailaraktacandanaṃ guggulaṃ nandyāvartamūlaṃ girikarṇikātuṣaṃ vrīhikuṣṭhatagaraṃ madhu pippalī turuṣkaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā samabhāgāni kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_241: tataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya kanyāmathitena navanītena modayitvā gulikāṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_242: akṣatailena dīpo dātavyaḥ / tata upoṣadhikena śuklacaturdaśyāmahorātropitaḥ aśvatthapatrāntaritā gulikāṃ kṛtvā āryamañjuśriyasyāgratastāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati /
S08bsu041_u:868_244: antarhito bhavati / atha jvalati ākāśagāmī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_245: aparo vidhiḥ / sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ poṣadhikenodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ khadirasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_247: siddhā eva siddho bhavati / evaṃ poṣadhikena lakṣaṃ japtavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_248: parataḥ karmāṇi bhavanti / anayā pūrvasevayā siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_249: atha rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā rājavṛkṣasamidhānāṃ iṅgudatailāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_252: caturvarṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ pāyasaṃ haviṣyānnamānīya peyakrasarā ceti juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_254: sarvābandhanānmocayati / krodhamupaśamanaṃ piṇḍakatuṣahomena vā kanyāvaśīkaraṇe tilāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_256: aṣṭasahasraṃ saptarātraṃ vacāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ yācayati taṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:868_257: nityajāpena pratyaṅgirā padmasūtrādinā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena yasya haste badhnāti tasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_259: saptarātram kulapatikāmaḥ gandhāṃ juhuyāt saptarātam dhṛtāktāṃ /
S08bsu041_u:868_260: grāmaṃ labhati / puṣpamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_261_1: rājadvāre vastraya mālabhaṃ strīpuruṣaprayuktavaśīkaraṇaṃ yuddhavijayakaraṇam dhvajamaṣṭasahasravārāṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_261_2: parijapya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ cābhimantrayitvā sapta dadhikuṇḍeṣu ardhyaṃ visajayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_263: kṛṣṇatilāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yasya nāmaṃ grahāya bhakṣayati savaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_264: aṣṭasahasrajaptā sarvabījāni sarvauṣadhyaḥ sarvagandhāni ca surabhipuṣpāṇi padmaṃ vā sarvāṇi akālamūlakalaśe prakṣipya,
S08bsu041_u:868_266: svayaṃ vā snāpayet / anyaṃ vā snāpayet / sarvopadravebhyo mukto bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_267: padmaṃ vā padmapatraṃ vā nirdhūmeṣu aṅgāreṣu yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_272: sa vaśo bhavati / kumārīvaśīkaraṇe kesarapuṣpāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_282: tato 'ṣṭamyāṃ [Vaidya_533] prabhṛti vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_285: deśaṃ labhati / trirātroṣitaḥ saktavāhāreṇa vā homaḥ kartavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_288: suvarṇakoṭiṃ labhate / prātarutthāya prayataḥ snāto brahmacāryagniṃ prajvālya,
S08bsu041_u:868_291: dravyaṃ prabhūtaṃ ca / govatsalaṇḍānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_292: gośataṃ labhate / priyaṅgunāgakesarasamidhānāṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti;
S08bsu041_u:868_293: sa vaśyo bhavati / khadirasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ paṭasyāgrato 'ṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_299: bhogānutpādayati / tilataṇḍulānekīkṛtya paṭasyāgrato 'ṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_301: vaśā bhavanti / yakṣāṇāṃ paṭasyāgrato guggulugulikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_303: yakṣiṇī vaśā bhavati / śrīvāsakaṃ paṭasyāgrato juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_304: kinnarā vaśā bhavanti / devānāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ, mūlapaṭasyāgrato 'garusamidhānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt trisandhyamekaviṃśatirātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_306: pretā vaśā bhavanti / sarjarasaṃ juhuyāt / vināyakā vaśā bhavanti / piṇyākahomena sarvāṃ vaśīkaroti /
S08bsu041_u:868_309: saptarātram / vaśā bhavanti / yaducyanti tat karoti / rājakanyāvaśyārthe paṭasyāgrato rājikāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_319: arthaṃ labhate / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ rātrau divasaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_322: arthaṃ labhate / sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_324: utpalānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt / grāmaṃ labhati / paṭasyāgrataḥ gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ vā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ padmaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_327: yaṃ manasā cintayati; taṃ labhate / paṭasyāgrato bilvānāṃ sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_328: nidhānaṃ paśyati / paṭasyāgrato dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_331: paṭaḥ prakampate / sragdāmacalanaṃ vā / tataḥ siddho bhavati / yaṃ manasā cintayati, taṃ dadāti / mahāpuruṣavaśīkaraṇe paṭasyāgrataḥ jātīpuṣpāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_333: karṇikārapuṣpāṇāṃ juhuyāt / dīnāraśataṃ labhate / senāpatikāmaḥ kundapuṣpāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_334: saināpatyaṃ labhate / tārāvarttapuṣpaṃ juhuyāt / dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / mucilindalakṣaṃ juhuyāt / suvarṇasahasraṃ labhati / śvetakaravīrapuṣpahomena tripaṭṭe baddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_335: viṣayamapi labhate paṭasyāgrata ādhārako 'gnimupasamādhāya pratidinaṃ varddhamānā pūjā kāryā /
S08bsu041_u:868_337: yāvad bhagavāṃ varadaḥ / tataḥ vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_338: yaṃ prārthayati / rajatacūrṇaṃ juhuyāt / rājyaṃ dadāti / āyasaṃ cūrṇaṃ juhuyāt / dīnārasahasraṃ labhati / kuṅkumāhutiṃ gandhatailāktāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_339: yāvataḥ prārthayati, taṃ labhati / sarvagandhāhutīnāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_342: dīnāralakṣaṃ labhati / candanasamidhānāṃ gandhatailāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_345: śrutidharo bhavati / dhāsakasamidhānāṃ gandhatailāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_346: mahāvyādhyupaśamo bhavati / nimbaphalānāṃ gandhatailāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt sarvabandhanānmocayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_348: lakṣābhimantritaṃ pibet / medhāvī bhavati / arkapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_351: sa vaśo bhavati / poṣadhikaḥ śuklapañcadaśyāṃ sadhātuke caitye 'patitagomayena maṇḍalakamupalipya,
S08bsu041_u:868_358: vaśo bhavati / vaiśyavaśīkaraṇe yavadadhimiśraṃ haviṣyaṃ caikīkṛtya juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_359: vaśo bhavati / śatruṃ dṛṣṭvā japet / stambhito bhavati / udakena saptābhimantritena sarvāśā pūrayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_362: sarvagrahā na prabhavanti / bhasmanā saptajaptena maṇḍalabandhaḥ śikhābandhenātmarakṣā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_365: sukhaṃ prasavati / mūḍhagarbhayā ṛtukālasamaye krāntasnātāyā gokṣīramaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_367: pānāya deyam / paramānnaṃ ca ghṛtamiśraṃ bhojayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_368: tataḥ putraṃ prasavati / prāsādikaṃ śuklapratipadamārabhya pūrvābhimukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpyaḥ,
S08bsu041_u:868_370: trisandhyam / yamicchati taṃ dadāti / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_371: gandhapuṣpadhūpabaliṃ datvā, paṭasyāgrato 'garusamidhānāmaṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṇāṃ turuṣkatailāktānāṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_372: rājyaṃ dadāti / vidyādharamantardhānaṃ vā pādapracārikaṃ vā śrutidharatvaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_373: atha gulikāṃ sādhayitukāmena karṇikārakesaraṃ nāgakesaraṃ śvetacandanaṃ gajamadaṃ cekīkṛtya,
S08bsu041_u:868_374: chāyāśuṣkāṃ guḍikāṃ kṛtvā, śucivastrāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_377: paṭasyāgrato japed; yāvat khaṭakhaṭāyati / tāṃ gṛhya, bhagavato ekaṃ datvā, mukhe prakṣipyāntarhito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_382: daśavastrayugāni labhati / paṭasyāgrataḥ jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_384: viṣayaṃ dadāti labhati / kumudapuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_386: rājavaśīkaraṇe, rājasarṣapāṃ juhuyāt / saptarātram / brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe karaṇṭakapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_391: rājakule gacchet / sarve vaśā bhavanti / dūrvāṅkurāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_392: śāntirbhavati parasya / ātmanaḥ śāntiṃ karttukāmena trisandhyaṃ kṣīraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_393: śāntirbhavati / mahādevasya dakṣiṇāṃ mūrttiṃ tāmrabhājane ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_394: sahasraṃ japet / sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ nivedyā ca /
S08bsu041_u:868_395: ghṛtaṃ calati / tataḥ siddho bhavati / lalāṭe tilakaṃ kṛtvā, sarvajanapriyo bhavati / medhāvīkaraṇe bhagavataścāmitābhasyāryamañjuśriyasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_396: rajate vā tāmre vā ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_397: tāvajjaped; yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ / taṃ pītvā medhāvī bhavati / dhūmāyamāne 'ntardhānam / jvalitenākāśagamanam / manaḥśilāṃ sādhayitukāmena kṣīrayāvakāhāro lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_400: ayantrita ātmanaḥ sakhāyānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped,
S08bsu041_u:868_401: yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ / jvalitena daśavarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:868_402: ayomayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā, triśūlaṃ vā, udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā, paṭasyāgrataḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭastāvajjapet,
S08bsu041_u:868_403: yāvad ciṭaciṭāyati / jvalati / taṃ gṛhītvā vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_407: tāvadākarṣayet / yāvadāgaccheti / siddhā bhavati / tayā yamākārṣayati; sa āgacchati / rocanāṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_408: gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ datvā, tāvajjaped, yāvajjvalitamiti / tayā ca siddhayā pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:868_411: tasyāgrato gṛhītvā, kṛtapuraścaraṇastāvajjaped; yāvajjvalatīti gṛhītvā sarvavidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_413: sarvavidyādharāṇāmadhṛṣyaḥ / udakena viṣacikitsā / jvarādeśanaṃ svasthāveśinaṃ sakṛjjaptenātmarakṣā /
S08bsu041_u:868_416: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitena kapilāyā goḥ samānavatsāyā apatitagomayenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_417: pūrvābhimukhaṃ sthāpya, mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, tasyāgrato lakṣaṃ [Vaidya_536] japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_420: tataḥ siddho bhavati / yaṃ cintayati; taṃ sarvaṃ karoti / bhagavāṃ varado bhavati / sarvecchāṃ sampādayati / svapne ca śubhāśubhaṃ kathayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_423: darśanaṃ bhavati / īpsāṃ sampādayati / paṭasyāgrataḥ saptarātraṃ kundurukamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_424: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ / ekapradeśe rājā bhavati / trisandhyaṃ kaṇānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_425: sarvarātram / dīnāraśataṃ labhati / āṭaruṣakakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya āṭaruṣakapuṣpāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_426: suvarṇaṃ labhati / kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāmahorātroṣitena ghṛtāktānāṃ rājikāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_427: rūpakasahasraṃ labhati / athavā grāmaṃ bhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ śleṣmātakakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya,
S08bsu041_u:868_433: śrīmāṃśca bhavati / subhagaśca bhavati / nadyāyāṃ raktapuṣpāṇi homayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_434: raktāni vastrāṇi labhate / śuklāṣṭamyāṃ śuklapañcadaśyāṃ vā viviktabhūpradaśe,
S08bsu041_u:868_435: śvetārkasyādhastādāryamañjuśriyasya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca datvā mālyaṃ cāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_438: tato valmīkamṛttikāṃ gṛhya, gandhodakena mardayet / tasyā mṛttikayā pūrvakṛtaṃ pratimāmudramarkakṣīreṇa pratimudrāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_440: yāvadaṣṭamīti triḥ kālaṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_445: grāmaṃ labhate / śrīmāṃ bhavati / arthamutpādayitukāmena goṣṭaṃ gatvā kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ parebhyaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāro lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_446: aparasmiṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ te tato 'horātroṣitena tatraiva śatasahasraṃ japtavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_448: yamicchati / suvarṇaṃ vā grāmaṃ vā labhati /
S08bsu041_u:868_455: yamicchati; taṃ sampādayati / gaṅgānadītīre, samudrapuline vā, anupahate mānuṣavarjite / vālukāyāṃ sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_458: evaṃ dine dine gandhādīn dattvā yāvadaṣṭottaraṃ stūpasahasraṃ pūrṇamiti paṭṭabandhamavāpnoti tilānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_459: yasyecchati ; sa vaśo bhavati / sadhātuke caitye pūjāṃ kṛtvāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_460: śubhāśubhaṃ kathayati / āpyāyanaṃ karttukāmo bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_464: tatra gatvā, daśasahasrāṇi japet / mahānidhānaṃ prayacchati / kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ sadhātuke caitye saṃvatsaraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_465: tatraiva paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_469: na bhetavyaṃ ca sthāpya, tasyopari supiṇḍaṃ paryaṅkaṃ badhvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_475: vidyādhararājā bhavati / sarvavidyādharā pūjayanti / mahākalpasthāyī bhavati / anena vidhinā cakrakhaḍgamudgarādayaḥ praharaṇaviśeṣāḥ sādhyāḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_476: sā ced vidyā sādhyamānā na siddhyati;
S08bsu041_u:868_477: tāmanena mantreṇa sametaṃ bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ paṭasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_479: ūnātiriktaṃ yaṃ vā mṛgayati, tatra sthāne yakṣayakṣiṇīsahitā pūrvasevaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_481: āgacchati / yatheṣṭaṃ vaktavyā / adhyeṣyatāṃ prayacchati / tāṃ bhakṣya kalpāyurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_482: atha nāgacchati; saptarātraṃ kuryāt / āgacchati / atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ bhagavato 'grataḥ kṣīrāhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ gandhodakena vābhyukṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_483: śāntirbhavati / pallavena mayūracandrakena vā sarpadaṣṭaṃ umārjayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_484: nirviṣo bhavati / valmīkaśikharamāruhya nirāhāra ekapāda pūrvāhnād yāvadaparāhṇaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_485: niyadavedanīyaṃ kṣīyate / tatra sthāne yatra tiṣṭhati /
S08bsu041_u:868_486: tatra pūrvasevaḥ / tatra gatvā maṇḍalakamupalipya gaurasarṣapāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_487: yakṣā āgacchanti / pūrvasthāpitena gandhodakena kalaśenārghyo deyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_489: āhūtāḥ sma / vaktavyam yakṣā vai ājñākārā bhavantu /
S08bsu041_u:868_491: siddhā bhavanti / yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ dadāti / divyā rasarasāyanānyoṣadhavidhānāni prayacchanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_493: yanmṛgayati; tat sarvaṃ prayacchati / evaṃ vaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇayorekatareṇa trirātroṣitaḥ kṛtarakṣaḥ suyantritaḥ paṭasyāgrato nirdhūmāṅgārairguggulugulikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_494: ghṛtāktānām / ardharātrau devatāgacchati / vaktavyā / oṣadhīṃ prayacchanti / yaṃ vā mṛgayati / vastrārthīṃ dūrvakāṇḍānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyād,
S08bsu041_u:868_495: vastrāṇi labhati / vacāmaṣṭasahasrābhimantrite kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya,
S08bsu041_u:868_501: candrasūryagrahe vā, śrotāñjane mukhe prakṣipya, tāvajjaped, yāvanmukta iti / poṣayitvā rakṣāṃ kṛtvāñjanamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_502: akṣīṇyañjayet / adṛśyo bhavati / sarvagandhānāṃ paṭasyāgrato lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_503: śriyaṃ paśyati / yaṃ varaṃ mṛgayati / taṃ labhati / maunī bhikṣāhāro lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_505: puṣpāvakīrṇaṃ kṛtvā, udakacūlakāḥ saptābhimantritāḥ pātavyāḥ divasāni sapta /
S08bsu041_u:868_506: medhāvī bhavati / pūrvādhītaṃ ca na naśyati / brahmīrasakarṣaṃ kṣīrakarṣamaṣṭaśataṃ [Vaidya_538] parijapya,
S08bsu041_u:868_507: pātavyam / dinedine meghā varddhate / yāvadekaviṃśatirātraṃ pañcaśatāni /
S08bsu041_u:868_508: dhārayati gṛhṇāti / rakṣā udakena saptajaptena śirasi dātavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_511: saptajaptena śvetapuṣpeṇa gugguludhūpena vā grahagṛhītānāṃ snāpayata /
S08bsu041_u:868_512: sūtrakaṃ bandhitavyam / śvetasarpaṣāṃ tilamiśrāṃ ghṛtāktāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_513: vagdo bhavati / rātrau homaḥ / sadhātuke caitye pūrṇamāsyāṃ sagauraveṇa maṇḍalakamupalipyāṣṭau pūrṇakalaśā aṣṭau ca puṣpamālāgaruturuṣkacandanakundurudhūpaṃ duhatā tāvajjapet /
S08bsu041_u:868_515: sadhātuke caitye kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ yathāvi bhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_518: lakṣaṃ japet / vaśīkaraṇaṃ antardhānaḥ śilādiṣu prayogeṣu susamartho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_520: nāgā vaśyā bhavanti / ye mṛgayati taṃ labhate / dakṣiṇahastādaṅgulimaṣṭābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_521: gajānaṃ tarjayed; vaśyo bhavati / anenaiva vidhinā gajavyāghramahiṣādīstambhayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_522: tilahomena naranārīvaśīkaraṇaṃ viśitavikrayena rakṣā ātmarakṣā pararakṣā,
S08bsu041_u:868_524: yuddhe rājakule vivāda japamānasya vijayo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_525: ātmanā abhiṣekaṃ karttukāmaścatvāraḥ kalaśā akālanadīpalvalaprasravaṇodake vā sarvagandhavījāni prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāni kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_531: vetāḍasya hṛdaye upaviśya, āyasena sruveṇa lohacūrṇaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_536: vidyādhararājā bhavati / ekādaśa varṣakoṭīṃ jīvati / kālaṃ gataśca deveṣūpapadyate /
S08bsu041_u:868_539: sahasrasampātāhutiṃ bhagavato 'grataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_548: nirviṣo bhavati / sarvakalikalahavigrahavivādeṣu pañjaraṅgikaṃ sūtramaṣṭa śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_551: nirviṣo bhavati / arthakāmaḥ, śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtenāhorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ kundurukadhūpo deyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_554: sarvamudrā bhedabhasmanā bhogārthī nadīsaṅgame taḍāgānāmekatame 'nyatra vā śucipradeśe paṭaṃ [Vaidya_539] pratiṣṭhāpya jāpahomaṃ samārabhet /
S08bsu041_u:868_556: dvilakṣaṃ vā / tataḥ sarvakāmamavāpnoti / lakṣatrayahomena rājyaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_559: ekaviṃśatirātram / puṣṭirbhavati / dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / kuḍye prakṣeptavyaḥ / sarvaśatravaḥ stambhitā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_560: gomayamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā, sūtrakaṃ gṛhya, maṇḍalamadhye sthāpya gugguludhūpaṃ datvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_561: mantraṃ japet / yadi jīvati; sūtrakaṃ nartati / na jīvati, na nartati / gomayena maṇḍalakamupalipya, caturhastapramāṇaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ dattvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_563: śastraṃ saptavāra parijapya, dharaṇyāḥ sthāne nikhanitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_572: tailaṃ japet / tena tailena mukhaṃ mrakṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_573: arikulaṃ praviśet / maitracittamutpadyate / anenaiva vidhānena pratisarāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_574: haste badhvā, saṅgrāme 'vataret / aparājito bhavati / kālyamutthāya sadhātuke caitye gomayamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_576: mititavyam / anālapataḥ pibitavyam / prātarvelākāle tato bhojane prathamamālāpaṃ trayo vārāṃ parijapya bhoktavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_578: sarvakarmāṇi viśudhyati / vākyapariśuddhirbhavati / dine dine ślokaśataṃ gṛhṇāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_579: evaṃ divasāni sapta udakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya,
S08bsu041_u:868_580: tato 'ṅgulisiddhā bhavati / tato 'ṅgulyāmākarṣati / yaṃ spṛśati, sa vaśyo bhavati / mṛttikāṃ parijapya bandho deyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_582: svastho bhavati / trayo vārāṃ cīvarakarṇakaṃ parijapya cīvarakarṇikaṃ bandhitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_583: corā baddhā bhavanti / tailaṃ parijapya śarīre deyam /
S08bsu041_u:868_584: yaṃ dadāti, taṃ labhate / gomayamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā, puṣpāvatīrṇaṃ lohabhājanaṃ bhasmanā paripūrayitvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_586: tasyopari sthātavyam / gugguludhūpaṃ datvā, mantraṃ japatā acchoṭikā dātavyā /
S08bsu041_u:868_588: sa vaśyo bhavati / sarvasattvā stambhanaṃ manasīkaraṇe śuklapūrṇamābhyāṃ paṭasyāgrato bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya,
S08bsu041_u:868_591: caturṣu diśāsu nikhanet / sīmābandhaḥ kṛto bhavati / maṇḍalabandhaḥ / udakenaikaviṃśatijaptena sattvānāmutsāraṇaṃ /
S08bsu041_u:868_593: atha rājānaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ, paṭasyāgrato 'rkakāṣṭhasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_594: vaśo bhavati / aṅgulisādhanam / paṭasyāgrato gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ datvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_596: daśa sahasrāṇi japet / dīnāravastrānyātmanā tṛtīyasya prayacchati /
S08bsu041_u:868_604: tāvajjaped ; yāvad raśmirniścarati / tataḥ siddho bhavati / rājyaṃ vidyādharatvaṃ yanmanasā cintayati;
S08bsu041_u:868_605: taṃ labhate / paṭhitamātreṇa sarvapāpamitrāḥ stambhitā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_606: sarvavighnavināyakā hatā / raktasūtreṇa pariveṣṭya śarāvasampuṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_611_0: varṣasahasraṃ jīvati / yojanasahasraṃ gacchati / daśapuruṣabalo bhavati / jvalite
S08bsu041_u:868_611_1: kalpatrayaṃ jīvati / vidyādharo bhavati / adharpaṇīyaśca bhavati / pūrṇapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_611_2: poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_613: varaṃ dadāti / mātā vā bhaginī vā grahetavyā /
S08bsu041_u:868_615: ante trirātropitaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyā pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_620: varṣasahasraṃ jīvati / candragrahe, samānavatsāyā gornavanītaṃ gṛhya,
S08bsu041_u:868_626: śeṣaṃ kālaṃ sarvaṃ japet / pañca dīnāraśatāni labhate / poṣadhikena pūjāṃ kṛtvā, sahasraṃ japtavyam / svapne śubhāśubhaṃ kathayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_628: aṣṭasahasraṃ japet / rājānaṃ vaśamānayati / madanaputtalikāṃ sarvālaṅkāropetāṃ rājavṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śalākayā viddhā tāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_629: yathā na galati / aṣṭaśatikena jāpena trisandhyaṃ pātālādapyākarṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_631: tāṃ gṛhya, parvataśikharamāruhya, śatasahasraṃ japet / kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ lakṣajāpena grāmaṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:868_639: mukhe prakṣipitavyam / udake eṣaiva siddhiḥ / vivāde sūtrakaṃ aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_640: trayo granthayaḥ kāryāḥ / uttaravādī bhavati / gavyaghṛtapalaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ bhājane kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_642_0: aṣṭottaravārāṃ parijapya, pibe / pītvā ca na svaptavyam / medhāvī bhavati / divasāni
S08bsu041_u:868_642_1: sapta jvarapreṣaṇaṃ bhūtapreṣaṇaṃ ātmarakṣā vetāḍotthāpanaṃ bilapraveśaṃ vanapraveśaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_642_2: rakṣā sīmābandhaḥ diśābandhaḥ coravyāghraḍākinīnāṃ jāpena stambhitā bhavatīti /
S08bsu041_u:868_644: badhnīyāt / antarhito bhavati / paṭasyāgrato lakṣaṃ [Vaidya_541] japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_645: tataḥ śatapuṣpāyā vīrakraye krītvā dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_647: tacchataguṇamūlaṃ bhavati / divasāni sapta homaṃ kāryam /
S08bsu041_u:868_649: arthaṃ labhati / paṭasyāgrato māsaṃ japet / dīnāracatuṣṭayaṃ labhate / marīcaphalaṃ saptavārānabhimantrya mukhe prakṣipya yasya alāpaṃ dadāti /
S08bsu041_u:868_650: sa putravanmanyate / sadhātuke caitye buddhapratimāyā agrataḥ kṛtvā udake kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:868_654: matkuṇā na bhavanti / puṣpeṇa phalena vā lakṣajaptena maśakā na bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_655_0: vaśīkaraṇam / rājadvārikaṃ dantakāṣṭhabhakṣaṇaṃ phaladānaṃ gandhadānaṃ bhūmibandhaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_655_1: corabandhaṃ sarvadaṃṣṭrāstambhanaṃ upajambhanaṃ nigaḍasphoṭanaṃ udakastambhanaṃ agnistambhanaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_655_2: viṣomārjanaṃ viṣasaṅkramaṇaṃ viṣabandhaḥ bhūtavaśīkaraṇaṃ ḍākinīgrahamokṣaṇaṃ naṣṭavidyāyā
S08bsu041_u:868_655_3: gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhitvā bhagavato 'grataḥ sadhātuke caitye śatavārāṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_656: prabhāte pūrṇā bhavati / saptajaptvā siddhārthakāṃ grāme vā nagare vā kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:868_657: te mṛtā iva svapante / yāvat sūryodayam / striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo yasya yato bhāge gṛham;
S08bsu041_u:868_659: darśanaṃ deyam / evaṃ divasāni sapta vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_661: oṣadhabandhaṃ manasā nidhānabandhaṃ khadirakīlakairekaviṃśatisaptanidhānasthāneṣu caturṣu koṇeṣu nikhanet /
S08bsu041_u:868_663: candragrahe bhikṣuṇā śrāvayitavyāḥ sarvairetaiḥ kalpasthāyī brahmacāryapratihatagatiryatheṣṭaṃ vicarati /
S08bsu041_u:868_677: tāvajaped; yāvajjvalati / vidyādharo bhavati / evaṃ yatra sthāsyati; tatra vṛddhirbhavati / evamaprameyāni guṇāni bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_678: atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ, dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sugandhikusumānāṃ vāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_681: aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt / paramapuṣṭirbhavati / paṭena vā vinā paṭena / poṣadhikastriśaraṇaparigṛhītabodhicito daśasahasrāṇi japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_682: tataḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ candagrahe vā sarvakāmikāṃ baliṃ datvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_686: ākāritamātreṇa jīvāpayati / saptajaptamudakaṃ preṣayet / āturaḥ pītvā svastho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_689: niyamastho lakṣaṃ japet / asurakanyā nirgatya praveśayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_690: vacāmukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat [Vaidya_542] trividhā siddhiḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_691: ūṣmāyamāne vaśīkaraṇam / dhūmāyamāne 'ntardhānam, jvalamānenākāśagamanam / sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_692: śuklāṣṭamyāmārabhya, padmānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt / rājā bhavati / raktacandanamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_696: tāvajjaped; yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ / ūṣmāyamāne sarvavādiṣūttaravādī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_697: dhūmāyamānenāntardhānam / jvalitenākāśagamanam / śuklapaṭaṃ samantāt prāvṛtaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_699: rājā vā rājamātro vā vaśī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_700: kṣīrāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_702: kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ labhati / guggulugulikānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_704: yamicchati / sarvajanasya priyo bhavati / rājakule cottaravādī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_706: subhago bhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ śuklapratipadamārabhya kṣīrayāvakāhārastriḥkālasnāyī tricelaparivarttī,
S08bsu041_u:868_709: surabhipuṣpāṃ jalajāni vā sthalajāni vā sugandhī nivedyaṃ vā gāvyaghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ ca /
S08bsu041_u:868_711: yaṃ prārthayati; taṃ labhate / saṅghabhaktaśca yathāśaktyā kāryaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_714: tataḥ paṭādarciṣo niḥsarati, bhūmikampaḥ, pradīpajvālā ca niścarati / puṣpamālā calati / etairnimittaiḥ siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_716: māsamekaṃ japet / cīrṇavrato bhavati / gugguludhūpena daṣṭamāveśayati /
S08bsu041_u:868_718: strīvaśyārthaṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ lalāṭāṃ madhvāktānāmekaviṃśati āhutī juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_719: vaśyā bhavanti / evameva raṇḍāyāḥ puruṣasya / paṭasyāgrato rājārkasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtā(ktā)nāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_720: vaśyā bhavati / rājapatyādīnāṃ lavaṇamekaviṃśatirātraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_721: vaśo bhavati / rājadvāre trīṇi saptavārāṃ śiramabhimantrya praviśet /
S08bsu041_u:868_724: lakṣatrayaṃ japet / gṛdhrasī apanayati / jvaritasya kuśairapamārjanaṃ kanyākartitasūtraṃ badhnīyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_727: puṣpalohamayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā, sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08bsu041_u:868_729: / cakrasphuliṅgā niḥsaranti / tāvad yāvat prajvalitamiti / tataḥ siddho bhavati / sarvavidyādharagaṇāḥ sannipatanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_730: saparivāra utpatati / vidyādhararājā, kalpasthāyī, apratihatagatiḥ / prātarūtthāya [Vaidya_543] saṃvatsaraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_734: antarhito bhavati / vyādhitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ ekaviṃśatilakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_736: rasarasāyanaṃ vā labhati / taṃ bhakṣayitvā balīpalitavarjito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_739: varjayitvā kāmopasaṃhitam / paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_741: vighnā na bhavanti / piṇyākāṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt / sarvajanapriyo bhavati / trayāṇāṃ vārāṇāṃ yamicchati; taṃ labhati / vidyādharatvaṃ rājyamathavā yādṛśo bhagavān tādṛśo bhavāmi /
S08bsu041_u:868_742: eṣā siddhiḥ kāruṇikena sarvasattvānāṃ nirāmiṣacittena dānaṃ dadatā sidhyati /
S08bsu041_u:868_749: tena samālabdhagātraḥ saṅgrāme dūte aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_750: aparājito bhavati / apamṛtyurna bhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ nāgapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasreṇa narapatirvaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_752: vyūpasamaṃ gacchati / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ pañcagavyena kāyaśodhanaṃ kṛtvā,
S08bsu041_u:868_753: triḥ kālasnāyī payobhakṣaḥ mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭaśatiko japo deyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_754: paścādaṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ yathāśaktya pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_758: yadi cakravartī bhavati / tataḥ sādhakakuṭī prajvalati /
S08bsu041_u:868_760_0: paṭasyāgrataḥ śvetacandanena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhadhūpapuṣpabalivilepanaṃ ca datvā
S08bsu041_u:868_760_1: keśarapuṣpāṇāṃ śatatrayaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ ghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ prajvālya
S08bsu041_u:868_760_2: udumbassamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya ekaikaṃ puṣpamaṣṭaśatabhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtābhyaktānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_762: yaḥ trikālaṃ parivartayati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi tanvībhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:868_765: cakṣuṣāṃ yaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_770: śrautraṃ pratilabhate / āryamañjuśriyaṃ pūrvoktena vidhānena paṭake phaleka vā aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_772: kuśasaṃstaraśāyī kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ triḥkālasnāyī śucivastraprāvṛtenāṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena pratipadamārabhya japo deyaḥ yāvat pañcadaśīti /
S08bsu041_u:868_773_0: tataḥ / vyādhiṃ praśamayati / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīragomūtrāhāraḥ yāvakāhāro vā triḥkālasnāyī
S08bsu041_u:868_773_1: poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratidinaṃ ghṛtapradīpo prajvālayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_776: paurṇamāsyāṃ trirātropitena udārāṃ [Vaidya_544] pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvarātriko jāpo deyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_778: vidyādharo bhavati / vidyādharasahasraparivṛtaḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ avadhyaḥ sarvavidyādharāṇām /
S08bsu041_u:868_779_0: āveśanaṃ dhūpena vipanāśanaṃ pallavena ātmarakṣā jāpena śuklacaturdaśyāmārabhya yāvat
S08bsu041_u:868_779_1: pañcadaśīti śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena aṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena paṭasyāgrato yaṃ mṛgayati
S08bsu041_u:868_781: divasāni sapta / medhāvī bhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ mallikapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasra juhuyāt saptarātram /
S08bsu041_u:868_782: dravyamutpadyate / śuklacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udumbarakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya udumbarasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_783: pañca dīnāraśatāni labhati / aṃdhaḥ poṣadhiko kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ dīpānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ prajvālya dīpavartīnāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_784: paścājjāpo deyaḥ / tataḥ cakṣuḥ pratilabhati / vadhiraḥ pustakaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ praveśayitvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritānāṃ padmānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_785: śāntirbhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ mālatīpuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_786_0: śāntirbhavati / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S08bsu041_u:868_786_1: mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ baliṃ nivedya bāhyā sarvabhautikāṃ baliṃ nivedya priyaṅgucūrṇena
S08bsu041_u:868_787: maṇḍalabandhaṃ diśābandhaṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadulkāpātaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_792_1: kṛtvā akṣataṃ sarvaṃ gṛhya gandhapuṣpairalaṅkṛtya dhūpena ca dakṣiṇahastena gṛhya
S08bsu041_u:868_793: paṭasyāgrataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya rocanāṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjalitamiti /
S08bsu041_u:868_794: tataḥ grahetavyam / gṛhītamātreṇa ca nāgabalo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_796: yaṃ mantro payati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_800: saptāhaṃ kanyāṃ yāmicchati sā vaśā bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:868_801_0: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā apatitagomayena maṇḍalamupalipya akṣatakapālaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_801_1: gṛhya raktacandanena prakṣālya raktapuṣpadhūpaiścābhyarcya tata upaviśya taṃ kapālaṃ
S08bsu041_u:868_803: yamaṅgulyāmākarṣati sa āgacchati tat sarvaṃ karoti śāntiṃ kartukāmena paṭasyāgrataḥ lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:868_804: tato paṭacalanaṃ bhavati / tathāgatapratimācalanaṃ vā / kalpasiddhirbhavati / aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ nīlaśāṭake granthiṃ kuryāt /
S08bsu041_u:868_805: mallasya jayo bhavati / ekaviṃśatijaptaṃ bhasmaṃ mallasya śiraśi dāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:868_806: yuddhe jayo bhavati / śuklapratipadamārabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ ghṛtakṣīrasahitāṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpya aṣṭaśatajaptpaṃ kṛtvā pibed divasāni sapta /
S08bsu041_u:868_809: vidyādharo bhavati / kāmarūpī apratihataḥ trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:868_810: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitaḥ nirbhayena bhūtvā tato vidyādhareṇa saptābhimantritena siṃhastāḍayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_813: nālikāntaraṃ vijño bhavati / tataḥ sādhakena saptavārāṃ mantramuccārayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:868_817: yadā mriyati tadā yatrecchati tatra utpadyati /
S08bsu041_u:869_0: siṃhasādhanam / punaḥ siṃhasādhanaṃ kartukāmena śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ atyantamaunī kṣīrayāvakāhāro yāvadaparā paurṇamāsīti lakṣaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_1: maunī pauṣadhiko vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ gṛhya kṣīre saptadivasāṃ sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_2: tatodhṛtya śvetamṛttikayā candanodakaparivartitayā vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ snāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_3: tataḥ sādhakaḥ poṣadhikena rūpakāreṇa siṃhaḥ kārayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:869_4: tataḥ puṣyanakṣatre ratnatrayasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakabhikṣavo bhojayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:869_5: paṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā nānābali nivedya tataḥ sādhakena śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena siṃhamavaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat siṃhavaccalati /
S08bsu041_u:869_8: sarṣapā āgacchanti / mantraṃ japatā siṃhaḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:869_9: strī bhavati / sā bravīti / kiṃ karomīti / sā vaktavyā śarīrāntargatā bhavasveti /
S08bsu041_u:869_15: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitya paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya paścāmānā mukhe pratiṣṭhāpya adṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_16: varṣasahasraṃ jīvati / kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ parvataśikhare paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpairdhūpairabhyarcya lakṣatrayaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_17: tataḥ bhasma balmīkamṛttikayā ca poṣadhiko gṛhya kṣīreṇāloḍya mardayitvā sugatavitastipramāṇāṃ mayūraḥ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:869_18_0: vivikte pradeśe gatvā paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya sarvabhūtikāṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_18_1: baliṃ datvā tataḥ śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena paṭasyāgrataḥ mayūraṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped
S08bsu041_u:869_19: tato vidyādhareṇa aparājitapuṣpaiḥ pūrvaparijaptayā mūrtā śarāvasampuṭāṃ dakṣiṇahastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat śivārutaśabdaḥ śrūyate /
S08bsu041_u:869_20: mantraṃ japatā sakhāyebhyo sattvā ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_22: padmakesarasauvīramañjanaḥ śilāṃ samāṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikakanyāhaste pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_23_1: mūrttau sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpaiśca pūjāṃ kṛtvā śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya
S08bsu041_u:869_24: bhagavata ekā nivedya sakhāyebhyo vibhajya ātmanaśca apāmārgasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_26_0: vaṃśarocanāṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitānāṃ guḍikānāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śuciśuklavāso śmaśānaṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_26_1: gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sārvabhautikaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā gulikā kapālasampuṭā
S08bsu041_u:869_27: na bhetavyam / sahāyebhyo 'pi vibhajya ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_28: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati / ulūkanetraṃ gṛhya añjanena saha kumārīhaste pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_29: tṛlohapariveṣṭitāṃ kṛtvā, guṭikāṃ śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya maheśvarasya dakṣiṇīyāṃ mūrttau saptarātraṃ yakṣiṇīmākarṣayati /
S08bsu041_u:869_30: kāṣṭhamaunī ṣaṇmāsāṃ japet / abhilaṣitaṃ dravyaṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_31: rājārkamayīṃ pratimāṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ kṛtvā aśleṣakairvarṇakaiścitrāpayitvā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā tasyāgrataḥ ṣaṇmāsāṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_32: maṇḍalikaṃ rājyaṃ labhate / vidyādharatvaṃ vā / paṭasyāgrataḥ maunī ṣaṇmāsāṃ vāmakaratalamabhimantrya ayutaṃ parijapyaṃ sunihitaṃ nidhānaṃ labhati /
