S08bsu041_u:869_33: rājārkānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya arkapuṭe juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_34: ādityo varado bhavati / tāmeva nadīṃ kaṭimātramudakamavatīrya tilapuṣpāṃ pravāhayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_35: pitāmaho varado bhavati / mandārapuṣpāṃ juhuyāt / śakro varado bhavati / tatraiva jale mandārapuṣpairdhanado varado bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_39: mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā cakraṃ svastikamaśvatthapatre sthāpya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajvalitamiti /
S08bsu041_u:869_40: tena gṛhītamātreṇa ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ uditādityavarṇaḥ vidyādharacakravartī bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_41: yaiśca dṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati /
S08bsu041_u:869_42: sudarśanamūlikāṃ gṛhya hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāva sahasrajaptāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_43: kuśamayaṃ cakraṃ gṛhītvā sahasraṃ japtvā jale prakṣipya nāgamuttiṣṭhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_44: kiṃ karomīti bravīti / lakṣaṃ me dehīti vaktavyam / bhikṣāhāraḥ parvataśikharamāruhya śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_46: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yat sādhayati tat sidhyati /
S08bsu041_u:869_51: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ brahmīsakarṣagāvyaghṛtakarṣaṃ kṣīrakaṣaṃ aṣṭaśataṃ parijapya pibed divasāni sapta /
S08bsu041_u:869_52: śrutidharo bhavati / paṭasyāgrataḥ nānāprakārasya bhakṣabhojyapiṭakaṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvad bhaktamantarhitaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_53_0: paścād bhaktaṃ saṅkrāmati / vrīhijātayaśca / kṛtapuraścaraṇastrilohamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_53_1: cakraṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ tripathe pūjāṃ kṛtvā upaviṣṭaḥ kalāpamātrāṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_53_2: manaḥśilāṃ mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvanmukhaṃ sphuṭati /
S08bsu041_u:869_54: manaḥśilāṃ siddhā bhavati / tilakaṃ kṛtvā adṛśyaḥ kāmarūpī pañcavarṣaśatāni jīvati /
S08bsu041_u:869_56: avare kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā triśūlasya mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena tṛśūlaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvat tṛśūlād raśmirniścarati /
S08bsu041_u:869_57: tataḥ siddho bhavati / rātrau nikhaned divyaṃ gṛhaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_58: śucau deśe paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā bilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_59: aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt / bhagavato mañjuśriyasya lalāṭād raśmirniścarati /
S08bsu041_u:869_60: tataḥ siddho bhavati / aparimitaṃ suvarṇaṃ dravyaṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_61: ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ karavīrapuṣpāṇāmekaṃ gṛhya nāgasthānaṃ gatvā puṣpaṃ nāgahrade prakṣipya mantramāvartayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_64: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ ahorātroṣitaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyā jvaraṃnāśayitukāmo girikarṇikāpuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_68: sakṛjjaptenodakena mokṣaḥ / vastre bhūrjapatre vā likhitvā dhvajāgre badhnīyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_69_0: parasenā stambhitā bhavati / udakasaktavāhāraḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā trirātroṣita
S08bsu041_u:869_69_1: ekaliṅgaṃ gatvā liṅgopari dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrtiṃ pādaṃ sthāpya vālaśollakena bandhayet
S08bsu041_u:869_69_2: muṣṭiṃ badhvā tāvajjaped yāvad rāvo niścarati marāmīti /
S08bsu041_u:869_72: maheśvaragaṇaśca / gorocanayā sahasrābhimantritayā viśeṣakaṃ yaṃ paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:869_73: sarve vaśā bhavanti / prātarutthāyodakaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhaṃ prakṣālya yasya darśanaṃ dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_74: evaṃ tailenāhārakāma udakacūlake saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibet /
S08bsu041_u:869_75: aprārthitamannaṃ labhate / rājakulaṃ praviśatā cīvarāttaṃ gṛhya ekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapya vāmahastena granthiṃ kṛtvā apratihatavākyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_76_0: coramadhye smarttavyam / baddhaṃ ca mocayati / cchinnabhinnādhikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ śālivrīhiśvetakaravīrasiddhārthakaiḥ
S08bsu041_u:869_78: gosahasraṃ labhati / anenaiva vidhānena ghṛtasarjarasaṃ dahatā śatasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_79: dvādaśa grāmavarāṃ labhate / anenaiva vidhānena stūpaṃ kṛtvā candanābhyaktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_80: deśādhipatyaṃ labhate / sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ ca dahatā campakapuṣpāṇāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_81: suvarṇasahasraṃ labhati / sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā pratikṛtimālikhya vāmapādenāvaṣṭabhya aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_82: gotreṇa vaśamāgacchati / sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vivāhalājānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmagnāvaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_83: bhasmanā ca maṇḍalabandhaḥ / prabhāte snātvā anenaiva mantreṇa nirmathya navanītaṃ grahāya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ dahatāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ dantairaspṛśya graset /
S08bsu041_u:869_85: muktvā kāmopasaṃhitam / sarvagandhānāṃ vīravikrayakrītānāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya svayameva mantraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_86: tena puttalikāṃ kṛtvā saptānāmuparyaśvatthapatrāṇāmupario sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat prasandhitā iti /
S08bsu041_u:869_87: taṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ spṛśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_88: anenaiva vidhinā nāgakesaracūrṇasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā dhūpaśarāveṣu aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_89: yamanucintya sa vaśaḥ / anenaiva vidhinā apāmārgasamidhānāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_90: artthakāmaḥ / goṣṭhaṃ gatvā paṭasyāgrataḥ apatitagomayena hastocchritaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā gugguluṃ dahatāṃ śatasahasraṃ japtavyam /
S08bsu041_u:869_92_0: asaṃvatsarajātasya pradeśinīmaṅgulīṃ gṛhya hastapramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā śmaśāne vidhivat
S08bsu041_u:869_92_1: pūjāṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ kuśasaṃstare tāmaṅguliṃ nivedya pradeśinyāṅgulyāvaṣṭabhya
S08bsu041_u:869_93: dīpaśikhā vardhate / kṛtarakṣāstā rājyaṃ gṛhya prabhāte tayāṅgulyā yamākarṣayati sa vaśaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:869_94_0: trirātroṣitaḥ samānavatsāyā goḥ payasvinyāḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya paṭasyāgrataḥ maṇḍalakaṃ
S08bsu041_u:869_94_1: kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya kuśasaṃstarasthamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mṛdbhājane
S08bsu041_u:869_96_0: tato maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā caturṣu diśāpālān [Vaidya_548] sthāpya dvitīyamaṇḍale prabodhako
S08bsu041_u:869_96_1: sarṣapahastaḥ tṛtīyamaṇḍale susahāyo vā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛtarakṣaḥ prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ
S08bsu041_u:869_97: prathamenāñjitākṣaḥ yaṃ paśyati ye ca paśyanti sarve te vaśā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:869_100_1: kalpāntarasthāyī aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā śatrumadhye praviśed bhayaṃ na bhavati
S08bsu041_u:869_101: āveśanaṃ śvetapuṣpeṇa nṛtyāpanamudakena trijaptena karavīrapuṣpeṇa trijaptenāharet /
S08bsu041_u:869_103: añjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ vīrakrayakrītaṃ sauvīrāñjanaṃ gṛhya prāṇakānyapanīya pañcagavyenottaramukhayā pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_104: anāmikayāṅgulyā catasro gulikā kṛtvā padmapatreṇācchādya śoṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_105: paṭasyāgrataḥ vidhivadagniṃ prajvālya sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭabhirdigbhiḥ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śikkakaṭipradeśe sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_106: śukrabandhaḥ kṛto bhavati / cīvarakarṇakenasaptajaptena granthiṃ kṛtvā viṣabandhaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:869_109: aṅguliṃ parijapya yaṃ tarjayati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_112: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tasyāgrata udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_113: rājyaṃ labhati / asiddhe sahasrapiṇḍaṃ grāmaṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_114: gorocanā manaḥśilāṃ vā paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_115: tena tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_117: rūpakasahasraṃ labhate / śuklāṣṭamyā ahorātroṣitaḥ samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_118: rājyaṃ labhati / puruṣavaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ekarātropitaḥ bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kumudānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_119: vaśo bhavati / strīvaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇadvādaśyāṃ saugandhikapuṣpaiḥ āryamañjuśriyaṃ hanet /
S08bsu041_u:869_122: niravaśeṣā vyayīkarttavyā / arghaṃ ratnatrayopayogāya / paṭasyāgrataḥ māsamekaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_125: / kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ śleṣmātakaṃ kalikaṃ gṛhya raktasūtrakena veṣṭayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_126: tataḥ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kīlakaṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ekaikaṃ khaṇḍamekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapyāgnau prakṣipya prabhāte dīnāraśatāni labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_129: sarvaja (na) priyo bhavati / sāmānyamañjanamabhimantrya yaṃ prathamaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_131: vivaradvāre lakṣaṃ japet / yathāniyataṃ parvataśikhare vā goṣṭhe pratītyasamutpādagarbhacaityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣaṃ japed dīnāralakṣaṃ labhati /
S08bsu041_u:869_132: nāgasthāne paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sukṛtarakṣāvidhānaḥ jambukāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya trimadhurāṃ [Vaidya_549] baliṃ datvā nāgapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_134: sa ca bravīti / vaktavyaṃ ca dine dine sapta dīnārāṃ prayaccha /
S08bsu041_u:869_136: śenāpativaśīkaraṇe bṛhanmaṇḍalaka pralipya tasya padapāṃsumānīya vāmahastenāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_137: vaśyo bhavati / sāmānyastrīvaśīkaraṇe lavaṇena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā chitvā chitvā vāmahastena juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_138: vaśyo bhavati / dāsīvaśīkaraṇe punnāgakesarayavagodhūmānekīkṛtya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_139: vaśyo bhavati / śālipiṣṭamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā chitvā chitvā juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_141: vaśo bhavati / śrotāñjanaṃ ekacaitye aśvatthapatrāntaritāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ yadi punarapi sādhayati dviguṇāyurbhavati /
S08bsu041_u:869_142: dhānyāgāraṃ praviśya śucau pradeśe paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya maunī kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ pakṣamekaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_143: tataḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udāratarīṃ ca baliṃ nivedya paryaṅkaṃ badhvā tāvajjapet yāvad raśmirniścaranti /
S08bsu041_u:869_145: tataḥ siddho bhavati / mahārājyaṃ labhati / apratyarthiko bhavati / rocanāmaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā dhūpena dhūpayitvā dantāntare sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:869_146: uttaravādī bhavati / sarve cāsya vaśyā bhavanti / śuklāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ akākolīnāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:869_147: dīnāramekaṃ labhati / paṭasyāgrataḥ trirātroṣitaḥ śuklacaturdaśyāṃ gugguludhūpaṃ dahatā balāgniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ karavīrapuṣpāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:869_148: tato 'gnikuṇḍaṃ yat padmapramāṇaṃ karavīrasadṛśo manaḥśilāṃ dṛśyati /
S08bsu041_u:869_149: mantraṃ japatā grahetavyam / tayā gṛhītayā uditādityavarṇo dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_2: madhusikthamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā striyā vā puruṣo vā vivikte pradeśe agniṃ prajvālya abhimantrya dāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_4: vaśyā bhavanti / yaṃ prārthayati taṃ labhate /
S08bsu041_u:870_6: pañcakārṣāpaṇāni labhati / kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ priyaṅgukāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vaikaṅkatasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_8: duḥkhaprasavāyāḥ striyā udakaṃ aṣṭasatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā deyam /
S08bsu041_u:870_9: sukhena prasavayati / śuklapratipadamārabhya dine dine sahasravṛddhyā japet /
S08bsu041_u:870_10: yāvat pañcadaśīti / avasāne trirātroṣitaḥ guḍikāyogena gulikāṃ kṛtvā sādhayitvā mukhe prakṣipya antarhito bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_11: nīlāśokakusumaṃ kṛṣṇasārapittaṃ cakravākahṛdayaṃ śrotriyārasahitaṃ samabhāgāni puṣpalohena veṣṭayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_12_0: punaḥ trilohaveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā sādhayitukāmaḥ sadhātupratimāyā agrataḥ tatraiva paṭaṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_12_1: pratiṣṭhāpya śuklāṣṭamyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saptāśvatthapatreṣu sthāpya maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā
S08bsu041_u:870_12_2: tasya madhye akṣatāṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ sthāpya vāmapādena urasi mākramya kṛtarakṣaḥ mantramāvartayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_15: tataḥ chardayati / taṃ pītvāntarhito bhavati / trirātroṣitaḥ somagrahe nābhimātramudakamavatīrya tāvajjaped yāvanmukta iti /
S08bsu041_u:870_17: āvartayecchobhanaṃ labhati / lavaṇamiśreṇodakenāṣṭaśataṃ snātvodvarttitaṃ kṛtvā gandhamālyaiśca pūjayitvā pūrvasādhitaṃ pāyasaṃ bhojayitavyam /
S08bsu041_u:870_19: tataḥ chardayati / taṃ bhuktvā mahākalpasthāyī vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_25: sarvaśāstrābhijñaḥ sarvavijñānopetaḥ kalpasthāyī cyutaśca pañcajātiśatānyapāyagāmī na bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_27: ayācito labdhamanaḥśilāṃ gṛhya saptabhiraśvatthapatreṣu sthāpya sādhayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_28: sandhyāyāṃ ye śṛṇoti jighrati sarve vaśā bhavanti /
S08bsu041_u:870_29: tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ samudraṃ bhitvābhyudgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:870_30: śmaśāne ṣoḍaśahastaṃ aṣṭahastaṃ vā maṇḍalakamupalipya mṛtakamuttarāśiraṃ sthāpya mukhe vāmaṅgulikāṃ prakṣipya dakṣiṇena pādenorasi mākramya tāvajjaped yāvanmṛtakaścalitaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_34: mṛtakamakṣatāṅgamanīya mṛtakasyopari pādaṃ datvā tāvajjaped yāvaduttiṣṭhati /
S08bsu041_u:870_35_0: kṛtvā tatra mantraṃ kuṅkumenālikhya kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā poṣadhikaḥ niyamasthaḥ
S08bsu041_u:870_35_1: na kenacit sārdhamekākī parvataśikharamāruhya varjayitvā diśāpālāṃ aṣṭahastaṃ vā
S08bsu041_u:870_35_2: maṇḍalakamupalipya vālukāmayaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā yathāśaktitaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukho
S08bsu041_u:870_35_3: dakṣiṇakahastena khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā ūrdhvabāhuḥ caityasyāgrato mantramāvartayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_36: yāvadakṣarāṇyantarhitāni / tat patraṃ khaḍgabhūtaṃ prajvalitaṃ gṛhītvā yatheṣṭagāmī vidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_37: sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ avadhyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ adhṛṣyaḥ kāmarūpī kalpasthāyī yojanasahasrān paśyati /
S08bsu041_u:870_38: vetasapatraiḥ kaṭukatailāktaiḥ māmupaśamaḥ śālitandulena parvatasampattiḥ lakṣajaptaiḥ sarṣapaiḥ āsurāṇi mantrāṇi ghātayati /
S08bsu041_u:870_39: aśanivajropalādīni aṣṭaśatajaptena śareṇa yatrecchati tatra pātayati /
S08bsu041_u:870_40: saptajaptena bhasmanā yasyāṃ kṣipati diśā tatra kāṇḍavāraṇakṛtaṃ bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_43: tataḥ nakhacchedyaṃ tālapatraṃ khaḍgaṃ sarvasasyasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ dvipadacatuṣpadakīṭamūṣikādīnāṃ lehyaṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā udakaṃ kṣipet /
S08bsu041_u:870_45: lakṣajāpena yamicchati; taṃ bandhanānmocayati / ādityagrahe samānavatsāyāḥ gorghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvanmuktaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_47: pūrvoktena vidhinā sadhātuke caitye poṣadhikaḥ śrīpiṣṭasarjarasasaṃmiśrāṇāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_48: dīnārasahasraṃ labhati / śvetasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_50_0: grahetavyam / sadhātuke caitye samudragāminyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukayā vā pratītya samutpādagarbhaṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_50_1: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikaḥ śuciḥ yathāśaktitaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāhāraḥ
S08bsu041_u:870_51: sarvakarmasamartho bhavati / mahāśmaśānapracenena maṇḍalādidiśi vidiśābandhaḥ sarvaviṣacikitsā umārjanagrahajvaranāśanaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_52: mahānadīprataraṇe japet / sukhena tarati / japenaiva tarikaśaulkikagaulmikādīnāṃ pūjyo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_54_0: nidrāśukrabandhamūtrakena sahasrajaptena khadirakīlakaiḥ aṣṭasahasrajaptaiḥ na mantravaśīkaraṇe
S08bsu041_u:870_54_1: yavānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ navanītamayīṃ aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṃ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā
S08bsu041_u:870_55: yāvat sphurati / tāṃ dantairaspṛśya grahet / tatkṣaṇādeva abhirūpā āgacchati /
S08bsu041_u:870_56: sarvakāmapradā bhavati / bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya bilvasamidhānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_57: bhogān labhati / sarvasādhaneṣu rakṣacoravyāghranakramakarakumbhīreṣu maṇḍalabandhaḥ sīmābandhaḥ tuṇḍabandhaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_58: nidhānagrahaṇam / yatra sthāne vidhānaḥ tatra gatvā upavasitaḥ maṇḍalakamupalipya bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_60: nidhānamavāpnoti / rājamahiṣī saparivārāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ kuśamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā vāmahastenāvaṣṭabhya sahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:870_61: saparivārā vaśā bhavati / brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe tilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saparivāraḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_63: vaśo bhavati saparivāraḥ / vaiśyavaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇasarṣapāṇāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_64: vaśo bhavati saparivāraḥ / śūdravaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇavrīhituṣāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_65: vaśo bhavati / divasatrayaṃ ekākinā homaḥ / tasyaiva kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ mālatīkusumaṃ ekīkṛtya saptāhutiṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_66: śvetasarṣapāṃ saptābhimantritaṃ yasya śirasi dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_67: rājā vaśīkaraṇe pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā vāmahastenāvakramyāṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:870_68: saparivāro vaśī bhavati / sugālitaṃ pānīyamabhimantrya saptāhaṃ dhārayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_70: tatastaṃ kṣīraṃ ca vivikte pradeśe kalaśe japet /
S08bsu041_u:870_71: tato virolayitvā brāhmaṇakanyayā padmabījaṃ tagaraṃ padmakesaraṃ candanaṃ madhunā saha pīṣayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_72: guṭikāṃ kṛtvā tāmbūlena sārdhaṃ abhimantrya yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_73: puṣpamālāṃ parijapya yasya śirasā dadāti sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_74: raktacandanaṃ campakakusumaṃ padmakesaraṃ raktaśālituṣāgirikarṇikākoraṇḍakabījaṃ vrīhimāṣāṃ kuṣṭhatagaraṃ turuṣkatailaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā samabhāgāni kārayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_75: jātikāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_76: pañca dīnāraśatāni labhate / āmrakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya nadītaṭe dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ arkasamidhānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_78: aśokasamidhānāṃ śuklacaturdaśyāṃ ārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīti dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_79: dīnāraśataṃ labhati / karavīrakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya karavīralatikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_80: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ ārabhya yāvacchuklacaturdaśīti dīnārāṇāṃ sahasraṃ labhate dine dine aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_81: yāvaccaturdaśīti / anekakarmaṇā kupitaṃ rājakulaṃ kupitaṃ mitravat prasādayati /
S08bsu041_u:870_82_0: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ vidyuhatavṛkṣasya ṣaḍaṅgulapramāṇaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ gṛhya tāvajjapet trirātroṣitaḥ
S08bsu041_u:870_82_1: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya taṃ kīlakaṃ tṛlohabandhanaṃ kṛtvā sarvauṣadhiparipūrṇaṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_83: tat kīlakaṃ vāmapādenākramya vāmahastena gṛhya ca tāvajjaped yāvannaśyati /
S08bsu041_u:870_85: tato dadyānmahābalim / prabhāte dāḍimaṃ bhakṣayet / tat kīlaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati / araṇyaṃ nikhaned gṛhaṃ bhavati kāmadam /
S08bsu041_u:870_87: uddhṛtena sarve naṃ pītvā snātvā ca punarapi sa eṣopacāraḥ /
S08bsu041_u:870_88: yāvat sakalā rātriḥ / [Vaidya_552] prabhāte saṅghoddiṣṭakā bhikṣavo bhojayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:870_91: śrutidharaḥ / samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya dakṣiṇahastena muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā trayodaśadivasāṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:870_94: icchayā mucyamānaḥ / aśokavṛkṣasyādhastāt trirātroṣitaḥ marīcānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_95: maricamekaṃ mukhe prakṣipya yamanimiṣaṃ vyavalokayati sa vaśo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:870_97: yā strī na rocate tasyā nāmaṃ gṛhītvā ghṛtaṃ parijapya dāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_98: subhago bhavati / vajrasādhanam / puṣpalohamayaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśāṅgulikaṃ trisūcikaṃ samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya sugandhapuṣpaṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_100: dantairaspṛśya graset / dine dine pañcagranthaśatāni gṛhṇāti /
S08bsu041_u:870_102: tato yatra nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra gatvā kālamūlakaṃ kalaśaṃ sarvagandhairlipya ca śvetacandanodakena pūrayet /
S08bsu041_u:870_108: dīnārasahasraṃ labhate / navanītāhutīnāṃ juhuyāt / pañca grāmāṃ labhate / piṇḍārakapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_112: kumudānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt / patnī sahiraṇyaṃ labhate / piṇḍārakapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_114: yasmin deśe japati tasmiṃ deśe yo rājā sa putratvenopatiṣṭhati /
S08bsu041_u:870_115: śrīkārapadmaṃ juhuyāt / padmaśriya āgacchati / jayakāmo nityaṃ dadhiṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_116_0: nityaṃ jayo bhavati / puṣṭikāmo ghṛtaṃ juhuyāt / arthāvāptirbhavati / śucinā nityakālaṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_116_1: pañcarātreṇa rājānaṃ saptarātreṇa piśācāṃ navarātreṇa yakṣarākṣasāṃ dvāraśarātreṇa
S08bsu041_u:870_116_2: nāgarājānaṃ ardhamāsena gandharvāṃ apsarasāṃ ekaviṃśatidivasena devadānavāsuragaruḍakinnaradivyāṃ
S08bsu041_u:870_118: rājakanyāṃ labhate / bilvānāṃ bilvāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_119: gṛhe śrī utpadyate / śatapuṣpāṇāṃ dadhnāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:870_120: dīnāraśataṃ labhate / sauvarcalikāṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvāñjitākṣaḥ sarvasattvāṃ vaśīkaroti /
S08bsu041_u:871_1_0: śikhāṃ japya bandhayet / sarvatra rakṣā / sarvasattvastambhanam / raṇḍāṃ vaśīkarttukāmaḥ /
S08bsu041_u:871_1_1: māṣāṃ juhuyāt / sarve vaśibhavanti / yakṣiṇīṃ vaśīkarttukāmaḥ padmānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ
S08bsu041_u:871_3_0: sā ca varadā bhavati / yathepsitaṃ mṛgayet / kanyākāmaḥ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt / īpsitāṃ
S08bsu041_u:871_3_1: kanyāṃ labhate / atha vetālaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ akṣatāṅgaṃ mṛtakaṃ gṛhya śmaśāne ekavṛkṣe
S08bsu041_u:871_3_2: vā catuḥpathe vā ekaliṅge vā sarvabhūtikāṃ balimupahṛtya mahādevasya dakṣiṇamūrtau
S08bsu041_u:871_3_3: maṇḍalakamupalipya baliṃ datvā snānābhyalaṅkṛtaṃ kṛtvā bhasmanā maṇḍalakaṃ likhya
S08bsu041_u:871_3_4: tasya madhye [Vaidya_553] pūrvaśiraṃ sthāpya śuklapaṭapracchāditasādhakaḥ śuklavāsasasakhāyaḥ
S08bsu041_u:871_4: kṛtakṣasyopari upaviśya tasya mukhe tilasarṣapāṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:871_6_0: tāṃ gṛhyātmano mukhe prakṣipya sarvabhūtikabalimupāhṛtya dakṣiṇamūrtau sthitaḥ haritālamanaḥśilāñjanamañjiṣṭhārocanāmekatrayaṃ
S08bsu041_u:871_6_1: gṛhya aśvatthapatrāntaritāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiriti ūṣmāyati dhūmāyati
S08bsu041_u:871_10: sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ prabhuḥ kalpasthāyī upamupari lakṣaṃ japamānaḥ pañcābhijño bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:871_13: gṛhītavākyaśca bhavati / kanyākāmaḥ jātīkusumānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
S08bsu041_u:871_15: sarvagrahamudrayā vācayā sandeśena rocanayā agniṃ stambhayati /
S08bsu041_u:871_16: nāvāṃ stambhayati / ākarṣayati ca daṣṭamadaṣṭaṃ vāveśayati /
S08bsu041_u:871_17: mṛtakamutthāpayati / vācayā jvaraṃ preṣayati / kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ lakṣaṃ japet trirātroṣitena śucivāsasā sādhakagarbhaliṅge sthāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aparimitaṃ japet /
S08bsu041_u:871_21: vyādhimupaśamayati / ahorātroṣitaḥ khaḍgaṃ khadiraṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ śmaśāne tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalitam tena gṛhītena apratihatagatiḥ khaḍgavidyādharo bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:871_23: athavā candrasūryoparāge kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ prabhāte utthāya paṭasya pūjā kṛtvā bhikṣavo bhojayitavyā /
S08bsu041_u:871_24: sadakṣiṇaṃ siddhiṃ mṛgayet / tato vādhikeṣu karmasu siddho bhavati /
S08bsu041_u:871_26: bandhanānmocayati paramātmānaṃ ca khaḍgamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā vivaradevakulanagaradvāreṇa vā sthāpayet /
S08bsu041_u:871_30: sarvamudrāṃ stambhayati / sarvamantrāṃ cūrṇayati / asurakanyāṃ vaśīkaroti / sarvagandhābhihutābhiśatena kulastriyo vaśyā bhavanti /

S08bsu041_u:874_0: svasti śrīrājamaṅgalakāvasthitena mārgaśīrṣaśuklā + + + padānakṣatre siṃhasthe 'pi gurau mañjuśrīkalpaṃ samāptamiti /
S08bsu041_u:874_1: śrīmūlaghoṣavihārādhipatinā śrībo + + + madhyadeśād vinirgatena paṇḍitaravicandreṇa likhitamiti /
